script

	;show the whole map
	restrict_strat_radar false

;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;1. Faction AI Script. Hick;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;

;factions ai script
monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType slave
and I_TurnNumber = 1
and not I_IsFactionAIControlled teutonic_order
and  I_IsFactionAIControlled lithuania
and  I_IsFactionAIControlled novgorod
and  I_IsFactionAIControlled norway
link_faction_ai lithuania pagan
link_faction_ai novgorod pagan
link_faction_ai norway pagan
console_command diplomatic_stance teutonic_order norway war
console_command diplomatic_stance teutonic_order lithuania war
console_command diplomatic_stance teutonic_order novgorod war
add_money teutonic_order 50000
end_monitor

monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType slave
and I_TurnNumber = 1
and  I_IsFactionAIControlled teutonic_order
and not I_IsFactionAIControlled lithuania
and  I_IsFactionAIControlled novgorod
and  I_IsFactionAIControlled norway
link_faction_ai teutonic_order pagan
link_faction_ai novgorod pagan
link_faction_ai norway pagan
console_command diplomatic_stance lithuania norway war
console_command diplomatic_stance lithuania novgorod war
console_command diplomatic_stance lithuania teutonic_order war
add_money lithuania 50000
end_monitor


monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType slave
and I_TurnNumber = 1
and  I_IsFactionAIControlled teutonic_order
and  I_IsFactionAIControlled lithuania
and not I_IsFactionAIControlled novgorod
and  I_IsFactionAIControlled norway
link_faction_ai teutonic_order pagan
link_faction_ai lithuania pagan
link_faction_ai norway pagan
console_command diplomatic_stance novgorod teutonic_order war
console_command diplomatic_stance novgorod lithuania war
console_command diplomatic_stance novgorod norway war
add_money novgorod 50000
end_monitor


monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType slave
and I_TurnNumber = 1
and  I_IsFactionAIControlled teutonic_order
and  I_IsFactionAIControlled lithuania
and  I_IsFactionAIControlled novgorod
and not I_IsFactionAIControlled norway
link_faction_ai teutonic_order pagan
link_faction_ai lithuania pagan
link_faction_ai novgorod pagan
console_command diplomatic_stance norway teutonic_order war
console_command diplomatic_stance norway lithuania war
console_command diplomatic_stance norway novgorod war
add_money norway 50000
end_monitor

monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType slave
and I_TurnNumber > 1
and  I_IsFactionAIControlled turks
link_faction_ai turks orc
link_faction_ai moors orc
add_money turks 30000
end_monitor

monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType egypt
and I_TurnNumber = 1
and  I_IsFactionAIControlled egypt
and  I_IsFactionAIControlled teutonic_order
and  I_IsFactionAIControlled lithuania
and  I_IsFactionAIControlled novgorod
and  I_IsFactionAIControlled norway
					set_faction_standing egypt lithuania 9.9
					set_faction_standing lithuania egypt 9.9
					set_faction_standing egypt teutonic_order 9.9
					set_faction_standing teutonic_order egypt 9.9
					set_faction_standing egypt norway 9.9
					set_faction_standing norway egypt 9.9
					set_faction_standing egypt novgorod 9.9
					set_faction_standing novgorod egypt 9.9
link_faction_ai egypt catholic
link_faction_ai hungary catholic
add_money egypt 30000
end_monitor

monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType egypt
and I_TurnNumber > 1
and  I_IsFactionAIControlled egypt
and I_NumberOfSettlements denmark > 0
					console_command diplomatic_stance egypt novgorod allied
					set_faction_standing egypt denmark 9.9
					set_faction_standing denmark egypt 9.9
					end_monitor
					
					monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType hungary
and I_TurnNumber = 1
and  I_IsFactionAIControlled hungary
					link_faction_ai hungary default
					end_monitor

;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;

monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType england
and  I_IsFactionAIControlled england
and I_TurnNumber = 1
spawn_army
	faction		england
		character	random_name, admiral, age 32, x 67, y 207
		unit		Elven small ship				exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
		unit		Elven small ship				exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
	end
	
		spawn_army 
				faction england
				character	random_name, named character, x 67, y 207, label enggeneral123  ;command 8, dread 9, loyalty 7, piety 1
				traits	LoyaltyStarter 1, ReligionStarter 1, Upright 2, GoodCommander 1, PublicFaith 2, elf 1

unit		High elf Archers				exp 2 armour 1 weapon_lvl 0
unit		High elf Archers				exp 2 armour 1 weapon_lvl 0
unit		High elf Archers				exp 2 armour 1 weapon_lvl 0
end

	
		
			
	

	
terminate_monitor
end_monitor

	


;elf aide
monitor_event SettlementTurnStart SettlementName Fort_of_phoenix_king
and not I_SettlementOwner Fort_of_phoenix_king = england	

	spawn_army
	faction		england
		character	random_name, admiral, age 32, x 159, y 175,
		unit		Elven small ship				exp 4 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
		unit		Elven small ship				exp 4 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
	end
		
	
	spawn_army 
				faction england
				character	random_name, named character, x 153, y 168,  label enggeneral22  ;command 8, dread 9, loyalty 7, piety 1
				traits	LoyaltyStarter 1, ReligionStarter 1, Upright 2, GoodCommander 1, PublicFaith 2, elf 1

unit		High elf Archers				exp 2 armour 1 weapon_lvl 0

		end
		
	  siege_settlement enggeneral22, Fort_of_phoenix_king, maintain 
		

terminate_monitor		
end_monitor

;kislev aide
monitor_event SettlementTurnStart SettlementName Kislev
and not I_SettlementOwner Kislev = russia	
and  I_IsFactionAIControlled russia
and not SettlementIsLocal
		
	
	spawn_army 
				faction russia
				character	random_name, named character, x 118, y 102,  label kisgeneral2234567  ;command 8, dread 9, loyalty 7, piety 1

unit		Uragan				                  exp 4 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
end
		
		if not I_SettlementOwner Kislev = russia
	  siege_settlement kisgeneral2234567, Kislev, maintain 
	  wait 3
	  if not I_SettlementOwner Kislev = russia
	   siege_settlement kisgeneral23999999, Kislev, attack 
	   end_if
	   end_if
		

terminate_monitor		
end_monitor

;elf quests
monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal
and not I_IsFactionAIControlled england
and I_TurnNumber < 20
and I_SettlementOwner Skaeling = england
set_counter quest 1
terminate_monitor
end_monitor

	monitor_conditions I_CompareCounter quest = 1

	spawn_army

set_counter questt 0

and not I_IsFactionAIControlled england
and I_TurnNumber < 10
if not I_CharacterExists Duva of of Kvellig

	spawn_army

;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;3. Chaos script (union and immortal chaos) Hick;;;;;;;;;;;
;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;


;slaanesh immortal
declare_counter slaanesh_resurected
		set_counter slaanesh_resurected 0

		monitor_event FactionTurnEnd FactionType slave
and I_IsFactionAIControlled norway
and  I_IsFactionAIControlled teutonic_order
and  I_IsFactionAIControlled lithuania
and  I_IsFactionAIControlled novgorod
		if I_NumberOfSettlements teutonic_order = 0
		and I_NumberOfSettlements denmark = 0
		and I_TurnNumber < 28		
		inc_counter slaanesh_resurected 1
		end_if
		end_monitor

monitor_event FactionTurnEnd FactionType slave
and I_IsFactionAIControlled norway
and  I_IsFactionAIControlled teutonic_order
and  I_IsFactionAIControlled lithuania
and  I_IsFactionAIControlled novgorod
		if I_CompareCounter slaanesh_resurected >= 8
		and  I_IsFactionAIControlled teutonic_order
		and RandomPercent < 55
		and I_NumberOfSettlements denmark = 0
		and not I_CharacterExists chaosgeneral1
		add_events
		event emergent_faction teutonic_order
		date 0
		end_add_events
		add_money teutonic_order 50000
		spawn_army
		faction teutonic_order
		character random_name, named character, age 40, x 5, y 238, label chaosgeneral1, family ;command 8, dread 9, loyalty 7, piety 1
		traits GoodCommander 2 , Energetic 1 , Loyal 2, man 1

end_if
if I_NumberOfSettlements norway > 0

end_if
end_monitor

	monitor_event FactionTurnEnd FactionType denmark
and I_CompareCounter slaanesh_win = 2
and not I_SettlementOwner Nagenhof = denmark
and not I_SettlementOwner Krugenheim = denmark
		if I_CharacterExists chaosgeneral260
		and not I_SettlementOwner Nagenhof = denmark
siege_settlement chaosgeneral260, Nagenhof, maintain
wait 3
end_if
if I_CharacterExists chaosgeneral27
and not I_SettlementOwner Nagenhof = denmark
siege_settlement chaosgeneral27, Nagenhof, attack
end_if
if I_CharacterExists chaosgeneral30
and not I_SettlementOwner Krugenheim = denmark
siege_settlement chaosgeneral30, Krugenheim, maintain
wait 3
end_if
if I_CharacterExists chaosgeneral31
and not I_SettlementOwner Krugenheim = denmark
siege_settlement chaosgeneral31, Krugenheim, attack
end_if
console_command add_population Nagenhof -11500
console_command add_population Krugenheim -11500
terminate_monitor
end_monitor

		end
		

		
		

terminate_monitor		
end_monitor

monitor_event FactionTurnEnd FactionType denmark
	and I_CompareCounter slaanesh_win = 2
	and not I_SettlementOwner Fort_of_phoenix_king = denmark
	and not I_SettlementOwner Praag = denmark

	if I_CharacterExists chaosgeneral36
	and not I_SettlementOwner Fort_of_phoenix_king = denmark
		siege_settlement chaosgeneral36, Fort_of_phoenix_king, maintain
		wait 3
	end_if
	if I_CharacterExists chaosgeneral37
	and not I_SettlementOwner Fort_of_phoenix_king = denmark
		siege_settlement chaosgeneral37, Fort_of_phoenix_king, attack		
	end_if
	
		if I_CharacterExists chaosgeneral38
		and not I_SettlementOwner Praag = denmark
		siege_settlement chaosgeneral38, Praag, maintain
		wait 3
	end_if
	
		if I_CharacterExists chaosgeneral39
		and not I_SettlementOwner Praag = denmark
		siege_settlement chaosgeneral39, Praag, maintain
		wait 3
	end_if
	
		if I_CharacterExists chaosgeneral40
		and not I_SettlementOwner Praag = denmark
		siege_settlement chaosgeneral40, Praag, attack	
	end_if
console_command add_population Fort_of_phoenix_king -5000
console_command add_population Praag -5000	
	terminate_monitor		
end_monitor

	console_command give_ancillary Archaon oko
console_command give_ancillary Archaon korona
console_command give_ancillary Archaon armour
console_command give_ancillary Archaon horse	

if I_CharacterExists archa
	reposition_character archa, 75, 136
	reveal_tile 75, 136
	character_flash_start archa
	console_command	give_trait archa script
	end_if
	if I_CharacterExists united
	reposition_character united, 77, 134
	reveal_tile 77, 134
	character_flash_start united
	console_command	give_trait united script
	end_if
	if I_CharacterExists united2
	reposition_character united2, 76, 134
	reveal_tile 76, 134
	character_flash_start united2
	console_command	give_trait united2 script
	end_if
	if I_CharacterExists united3
	reposition_character united3, 79, 134
	reveal_tile 79, 134
	character_flash_start united3
	console_command	give_trait united3 script
	end_if
	if I_CharacterExists united4
	reposition_character united4, 79, 131
	reveal_tile 79, 131
	character_flash_start united4
	console_command	give_trait united4 script
	end_if
	if I_CharacterExists united5
	reposition_character united5, 80, 132

	and not I_SettlementOwner Drakenhof = hungary

monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType denmark
	and I_CompareCounter vardekattack = 3
	and not I_SettlementOwner Wurtbad = denmark
	

	if I_CharacterExists vardecro1
	and not I_SettlementOwner Lieske = denmark
		siege_settlement vardecro1, Lieske, maintain
		wait 3
	end_if
	if I_CharacterExists vardecro2
	and not I_SettlementOwner Lieske = denmark
		siege_settlement vardecro2, Lieske, attack
		wait 3
	end_if	
	terminate_monitor
	end_monitor


;;setup Chaos UNION counters
		
		add_events
			event	counter	chaos_union
			event	counter	slaanesh_recruitment
			event	counter	tzinch_recruitment
			event   counter khorn_recruitment
			event   counter nurgl_recruitment
	 		date	0
	 	end_add_events
		
		set_event_counter chaos_union 0
		set_event_counter slaanesh_recruitment 0
		set_event_counter tzinch_recruitment 0
		set_event_counter khorn_recruitment 0
		set_event_counter nurgl_recruitment 0
		declare_counter siege_chaos
		set_counter siege_chaos 0

and I_TurnNumber > 1
and not I_IsFactionAIControlled teutonic_order
		if I_SettlementOwner Aghol teutonic_order
		    and I_SettlementOwner Ost_Aghol teutonic_order

monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType hre
and I_TurnNumber = 49
and I_IsFactionAIControlled hre
and I_IsFactionAIControlled denmark
and I_IsFactionAIControlled teutonic_order
and I_IsFactionAIControlled novgorod
and I_IsFactionAIControlled lithuania
and I_IsFactionAIControlled norway
if  I_SettlementOwner Middenheim = denmark
		if I_CharacterExists reikgen
		and  I_SettlementOwner Middenheim = denmark
		siege_settlement reikgen, Middenheim, maintain
		wait 3
	end_if
	if I_CharacterExists reikgena
	and  I_SettlementOwner Middenheim = denmark
		siege_settlement reikgena, Middenheim, maintain
		wait 3
	end_if	
		if I_CharacterExists reikgenas
		and  I_SettlementOwner Middenheim = denmark
		siege_settlement reikgenas, Middenheim, attack
	end_if	
	end_if
	if  I_SettlementOwner Middenheim = egypt
		if I_CharacterExists reikgen
		and  I_SettlementOwner Middenheim = egypt
		siege_settlement reikgen, Middenheim, maintain
		wait 3
	end_if
	if I_CharacterExists reikgena
	and  I_SettlementOwner Middenheim = egypt
		siege_settlement reikgena, Middenheim, maintain
		wait 3
	end_if	
		if I_CharacterExists reikgenas
		siege_settlement reikgenas, Middenheim, attack
	end_if	
	end_if
	if  I_SettlementOwner Middenheim = slave
		if I_CharacterExists reikgen
		and  I_SettlementOwner Middenheim = slave
		siege_settlement reikgen, Middenheim, maintain
		wait 3
	end_if
	if I_CharacterExists reikgena
	and  I_SettlementOwner Middenheim = slave
		siege_settlement reikgena, Middenheim, maintain
		wait 3
	end_if	
		if I_CharacterExists reikgenas
		and  I_SettlementOwner Middenheim = slave
		siege_settlement reikgenas, Middenheim, attack
	end_if	
	end_if
	if not I_SettlementOwner Middenheim = denmark
	and not I_SettlementOwner Middenheim = egypt
	and not I_SettlementOwner Middenheim = slave
move reikgen, 41, 112
move reikgena, 43, 112
move reikgenas, 41, 111
move reikgenass, 41, 110
end_if
terminate_monitor
end_monitor


monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType hre
and I_TurnNumber = 50
and I_IsFactionAIControlled hre
and I_IsFactionAIControlled denmark
and I_IsFactionAIControlled teutonic_order
and I_IsFactionAIControlled novgorod
and I_IsFactionAIControlled lithuania
and I_IsFactionAIControlled norway
if  I_SettlementOwner Salzmund = denmark
		if I_CharacterExists reikgen
		and I_SettlementOwner Salzmund = denmark
		and I_CharacterTypeNearTile hre named_character, 10 42, 114
		siege_settlement reikgen, Salzmund, maintain
		wait 3
	end_if
	if I_CharacterExists reikgena
	and I_SettlementOwner Salzmund = denmark
	and I_CharacterTypeNearTile hre named_character, 10 42, 114
		siege_settlement reikgena, Salzmund, maintain
		wait 3
	end_if	
		if I_CharacterExists reikgenas
		and I_CharacterTypeNearTile hre named_character, 10 42, 114
		siege_settlement reikgenas, Salzmund, attack
	end_if	
	end_if
	if  I_SettlementOwner Salzmund = egypt
		if I_CharacterExists reikgen
		and I_SettlementOwner Salzmund = egypt
		and I_CharacterTypeNearTile hre named_character, 10 42, 114
		siege_settlement reikgen, Salzmund, maintain
		wait 3
	end_if
	if I_CharacterExists reikgena
	and I_SettlementOwner Salzmund = egypt
	and I_CharacterTypeNearTile hre named_character, 10 42, 114
		siege_settlement reikgena, Salzmund, maintain
		wait 3
	end_if	
		if I_CharacterExists reikgenas
		and I_CharacterTypeNearTile hre named_character, 10 42, 114
		siege_settlement reikgenas, Salzmund, attack
	end_if	
	end_if
	if  I_SettlementOwner Salzmund = slave
		if I_CharacterExists reikgen
		and I_SettlementOwner Salzmund = slave
		and I_CharacterTypeNearTile hre named_character, 10 42, 114
		siege_settlement reikgen, Salzmund, maintain
		wait 3
	end_if
	if I_CharacterExists reikgena
	and I_SettlementOwner Salzmund = slave
	and I_CharacterTypeNearTile hre named_character, 10 42, 114
		siege_settlement reikgena, Salzmund, maintain
		wait 3
	end_if	
		if I_CharacterExists reikgenas
		and I_CharacterTypeNearTile hre named_character, 10 42, 114
		siege_settlement reikgenas, Salzmund, attack
	end_if	
	end_if
	if not I_SettlementOwner Salzmund = denmark
	and not I_SettlementOwner Salzmund = egypt
	and not I_SettlementOwner Salzmund = slave
move reikgen, 50, 119
move reikgena, 51, 116
move reikgenas, 49, 114
move reikgenass, 49, 113
end_if
terminate_monitor
end_monitor

monitor_event FactionTurnEnd FactionIsLocal
and I_TurnNumber = 7
and I_IsFactionAIControlled norway
and not I_IsFactionAIControlled france
if I_CharacterExists chaosgeneral59
	reposition_character chaosgeneral59, 95, 110
	reveal_tile 95, 110
	character_flash_start chaosgeneral59
	end_if
	if I_CharacterExists chaosgeneral60
	reposition_character chaosgeneral60, 100, 110
		reveal_tile 100, 110
	character_flash_start chaosgeneral60
	point_at_character chaosgeneral60
	end_if	
		if I_CharacterExists chaosgeneral620000000
	reposition_character chaosgeneral620000000, 96, 107
	reveal_tile 96, 107
	character_flash_start chaosgeneral620000000
	end_if	
	if I_CharacterExists chaosgeneral620000000000
	reposition_character chaosgeneral620000000000, 91, 106
		reveal_tile 91, 106
	character_flash_start chaosgeneral620000000000
	end_if			
		if I_CharacterExists spaingeneral1
	reposition_character spaingeneral1, 97, 88
	character_flash_start spaingeneral1		
	end_if		
	campaign_wait 5
	snap_strat_camera 91, 106
	campaign_wait 10
	if I_CharacterExists chaosgeneral59
		character_flash_stop chaosgeneral59	
		end_if
			if I_CharacterExists chaosgeneral60
		character_flash_stop chaosgeneral60	
		end_if
			if I_CharacterExists chaosgeneral620000000
		character_flash_stop chaosgeneral620000000	
		end_if
			if I_CharacterExists chaosgeneral620000000000
		character_flash_stop chaosgeneral620000000000
		end_if	
		hide_all_revealed_tiles	
		historic_event abrek
	terminate_monitor
	end_monitor
	
	
	monitor_event FactionTurnEnd FactionIsLocal
and I_TurnNumber = 8
and I_IsFactionAIControlled norway
and not I_IsFactionAIControlled france
if I_CharacterExists chaosgeneral59
	reposition_character chaosgeneral59, 99, 88
	character_flash_start chaosgeneral59
	
	end_if
	if I_CharacterExists chaosgeneral60
	reposition_character chaosgeneral60, 98, 87
	character_flash_start chaosgeneral60
	
	end_if	
		if I_CharacterExists chaosgeneral620000000
	reposition_character chaosgeneral620000000, 97, 87
	character_flash_start chaosgeneral620000000
	
	end_if	
	if I_CharacterExists chaosgeneral620000000000
	reposition_character chaosgeneral620000000000, 97, 90
	character_flash_start chaosgeneral620000000000
	console_command	remove_trait chaosgeneral620000000000 script
	
	end_if		
		if I_CharacterExists spaingeneral1
	console_command	remove_trait spaingeneral1 script	
	end_if
	snap_strat_camera 97, 88
	point_at_settlement Bechafen
	campaign_wait 5	
	if I_CharacterExists chaosgeneral59
		character_flash_stop chaosgeneral59	
		end_if
			if I_CharacterExists chaosgeneral60
		character_flash_stop chaosgeneral60	
		end_if
			if I_CharacterExists chaosgeneral620000000
		character_flash_stop chaosgeneral620000000	
		end_if
			if I_CharacterExists chaosgeneral620000000000
		character_flash_stop chaosgeneral620000000000
		end_if
		set_counter bech 1
	terminate_monitor
	end_monitor
	


monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType norway
	and I_CompareCounter bech = 1
	and not I_SettlementOwner Bechafen = norway


		if I_CharacterExists chaosgeneral620000000
		siege_settlement chaosgeneral620000000, Bechafen, maintain
		end_if
	if I_CharacterExists chaosgeneral60
	and not I_SettlementOwner Bechafen = norway
		siege_settlement chaosgeneral60, Bechafen, maintain
		end_if	
	
	if I_CharacterExists chaosgeneral59
	and not I_SettlementOwner Bechafen = norway
		siege_settlement chaosgeneral59, Bechafen, attack
		end_if
	console_command	remove_trait chaosgeneral59 script
	console_command	remove_trait chaosgeneral60 script
	console_command	remove_trait chaosgeneral620000000 script
	
	
terminate_monitor	
end_monitor

terminate_monitor

monitor_event FactionTurnEnd FactionIsLocal
	and I_CompareCounter khorn_invansionwolfai = 1
	and not I_SettlementOwner Wolfenburg = norway
	if I_CharacterExists chaosgeneral64
	and not I_SettlementOwner Ferlangen = norway
	console_command auto_win attacker
		siege_settlement chaosgeneral64, Ferlangen, attack
		end_if
	
		
terminate_monitor	
end_monitor








;Praag and Erengard



;Erengrad
declare_counter eren
set_counter eren 0
add_events
	event	counter	erengard
	date	0
end_add_events
set_event_counter erengard 0

declare_counter eren_accepted
set_counter eren_accepted 0



monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType byzantium
and not I_IsFactionAIControlled byzantium
and I_IsFactionAIControlled teutonic_order	
and I_IsFactionAIControlled norway	
and I_IsFactionAIControlled novgorod	
and I_IsFactionAIControlled lithuania
and I_TurnNumber = 2
historic_event ERENGARD true factions { byzantium, }
set_counter eren_accepted 1
terminate_monitor
end_monitor


monitor_event FactionTurnEnd FactionIsLocal
and  I_IsFactionAIControlled russia
and I_IsFactionAIControlled teutonic_order	
and I_IsFactionAIControlled norway	
and I_IsFactionAIControlled novgorod	
and I_IsFactionAIControlled lithuania
and I_IsFactionAIControlled byzantium
and I_TurnNumber = 4

declare_counter praa

add_events
	event	counter	praag
	date	0
end_add_events
set_event_counter praag 0

declare_counter praag_accepted
set_counter praag_accepted 0



monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType russia
and not I_IsFactionAIControlled russia
and I_IsFactionAIControlled teutonic_order	
and I_IsFactionAIControlled norway	
and I_IsFactionAIControlled novgorod	
and I_IsFactionAIControlled lithuania
and I_TurnNumber = 1
historic_event PRAAG true factions { russia, }

and PercentageEnemyKilled > 70

and I_TurnNumber = 1

monitor_event FactionTurnEnd FactionIsLocal
	and I_CompareCounter khorn_invansion_emp = 1

	if I_CharacterExists chaosgeneral120
	console_command auto_win attacker
		siege_settlement chaosgeneral120, Baersonlings, attack
	end_if
	if I_CharacterExists chaosgeneral123
	console_command auto_win attacker
		siege_settlement chaosgeneral123, Varg, attack
	end_if
	if I_CharacterExists chaosgeneral124
	console_command auto_win attacker
		siege_settlement chaosgeneral124, Aesling, attack
	end_if
	
		if I_CharacterExists chaosgeneral125
		console_command auto_win attacker
		siege_settlement chaosgeneral125, South_Ost_Aghol, attack
	end_if
	if I_CharacterExists chaosgeneral126
	console_command auto_win attacker
		siege_settlement chaosgeneral126, Ost_Aghol, attack
	end_if
	if I_CharacterExists chaosgeneral127
	console_command auto_win attacker
		siege_settlement chaosgeneral127, Kvellig, attack
	end_if
	
		if I_CharacterExists chaosgeneral128
		console_command auto_win attacker
		siege_settlement chaosgeneral128, North_Tahmak, attack
	end_if
	if I_CharacterExists chaosgeneral129
	console_command auto_win attacker
		siege_settlement chaosgeneral129, Hastling, attack
	end_if
	if I_CharacterExists chaosgeneral130
	console_command auto_win attacker
		siege_settlement chaosgeneral130, Kul, attack
	end_if

	if I_CharacterExists chaosgeneral131
	console_command auto_win attacker
		siege_settlement chaosgeneral131, Tahmak, attack
	end_if
	
	if I_CharacterExists chaosgeneral132
	console_command auto_win attacker
		siege_settlement chaosgeneral132, South_Gharhar, attack
	end_if
	
	
	if I_CharacterExists chaosgeneral133
	console_command auto_win attacker
		siege_settlement chaosgeneral133, Notrh_Hastling, attack
	end_if

terminate_monitor
end_monitor



monitor_event FactionTurnEnd FactionIsLocal
and I_IsFactionAIControlled teutonic_order	
and I_IsFactionAIControlled lithuania
and I_SettlementOwner Skaeling = teutonic_order			
	
	
		
	spawn_army 
				faction teutonic_order
				character	random_name, named character, x 33, y 122, label chaosgeneral134  ;command 8, dread 9, loyalty 7, piety 1
				traits	LoyaltyStarter 1,  Upright 2, GoodCommander 1, PublicFaith 2, man 1, GoodCommander 4
				unit		Champion Knights of Tzeentch Bodyguard				exp 4 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
				unit		Marauder axe				exp 4 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
				unit		Marauder axe				exp 4 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
				unit		Warrior of chaos				exp 4 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
				unit		Warrior of chaos				exp 4 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
				unit		Warrior of chaos				exp 4 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
				unit		Warrior of chaos	exp 4 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
				unit		Warrior of chaos	exp 4 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
				unit		mounted marauders	exp 4 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
				unit		mounted marauders				exp 4 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
				unit		mounted marauders				exp 4 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
				unit		mounted marauders				exp 4 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
				unit		mounted marauders				exp 4 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
				unit		Knights of chaos				exp 4 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
				unit		Knights of chaos	exp 4 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
				unit		Knights of chaos	exp 4 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
				unit		Knights of chaos	exp 4 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
		end	
					

set_counter khorn_invansion_emp 2

if I_CompareCounter khorn_invansion_emp = 1000
	and I_CharacterExists chaosgeneral134
		siege_settlement chaosgeneral134, Dietershafen, maintain
		change_population_religion hre catholic 20 chaos
	end_if		

terminate_monitor		
end_monitor

monitor_event FactionTurnEnd FactionIsLocal
and I_IsFactionAIControlled teutonic_order	
and I_IsFactionAIControlled lithuania
and I_SettlementOwner Skaeling = lithuania		
	
	
		
	spawn_army 
				faction lithuania
				character	random_name, named character, x 33, y 122, label chaosgeneral135  ;command 8, dread 9, loyalty 7, piety 1
				traits	LoyaltyStarter 1,  Upright 2, GoodCommander 1, PublicFaith 2, man 1, GoodCommander 4
				unit		Champions Knights of Slaanesh Bodyguard				exp 4 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
				unit		Marauder axe				exp 4 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
				unit		Marauder axe				exp 4 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
				unit		Warrior of chaos				exp 4 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
				unit		Warrior of chaos				exp 4 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
				unit		Warrior of chaos				exp 4 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
				unit		Warrior of chaos	exp 4 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
				unit		Warrior of chaos	exp 4 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0

				unit		mounted marauders				exp 4 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0

				unit		Knights of chaos	exp 4 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
				unit		Knights of chaos	exp 4 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
		end	
					

set_counter khorn_invansion_emp 2

if I_CompareCounter khorn_invansion_emp = 2
	and I_CharacterExists chaosgeneral135
	console_command auto_win attacker
		siege_settlement chaosgeneral135, Dietershafen, attack
		change_population_religion hre catholic 20 chaos
	end_if		

terminate_monitor		
end_monitor





monitor_event FactionTurnEnd FactionIsLocal
and I_TurnNumber = 1
and not I_IsFactionAIControlled teutonic_order	
and I_IsFactionAIControlled norway	
and I_IsFactionAIControlled novgorod	
and I_IsFactionAIControlled lithuania

		
	
	spawn_army 
				faction lithuania
				character	random_name, named character, x 135, y 185, label chaosgeneral136  ;command 8, dread 9, loyalty 7, piety 1
				traits	LoyaltyStarter 1, ReligionStarter 1, Upright 2, GoodCommander 1, PublicFaith 2, man 1, GoodCommander 4
				unit		Champion Knights of Tzeentch Bodyguard			exp 4 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
				unit		Marauder axe				exp 4 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
				unit		Marauder axe				exp 4 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0

set_counter khorn_invansion_emp 1
terminate_monitor		
end_monitor

monitor_event FactionTurnEnd FactionIsLocal
	and I_CompareCounter khorn_invansion_emp = 1
	and not I_SettlementOwner Varg = teutonic_order	
	and not I_SettlementOwner Aesling = teutonic_order	
	and not I_SettlementOwner Baersonlings = lithuania

	if I_CharacterExists chaosgeneral136
	console_command auto_win attacker
		siege_settlement chaosgeneral136, Baersonlings, attack
	end_if
	
	if I_CharacterExists chaosgeneral137
	console_command auto_win attacker
		siege_settlement chaosgeneral137, Aesling, attack
	end_if	
		
	
	if I_CharacterExists chaosgeneral138
	console_command auto_win attacker
		siege_settlement chaosgeneral138, Kvellig, attack
	end_if
	
		if I_CharacterExists chaosgeneral140
		console_command auto_win attacker
		siege_settlement chaosgeneral140, North_Tahmak, attack
	end_if
	if I_CharacterExists chaosgeneral141
	console_command auto_win attacker
		siege_settlement chaosgeneral141, Hastling, attack
	end_if
	if I_CharacterExists chaosgeneral142
	console_command auto_win attacker
		siege_settlement chaosgeneral142, Kul, attack
	end_if
	
	if I_CharacterExists chaosgeneral143
	console_command auto_win attacker
		siege_settlement chaosgeneral143, Tahmak, attack
	end_if
	
	if I_CharacterExists chaosgeneral144
	console_command auto_win attacker
		siege_settlement chaosgeneral144, South_Gharhar, attack
	end_if
	
	
	if I_CharacterExists chaosgeneral145
	console_command auto_win attacker
		siege_settlement chaosgeneral145, Notrh_Hastling, attack
	end_if

terminate_monitor
end_monitor


monitor_event FactionTurnEnd FactionIsLocal
and I_TurnNumber = 1
and I_IsFactionAIControlled teutonic_order	
and not I_IsFactionAIControlled norway	
and I_IsFactionAIControlled novgorod	
and I_IsFactionAIControlled lithuania

terminate_monitor		
end_monitor

monitor_event FactionTurnEnd FactionIsLocal
	and I_CompareCounter khorn_invansion_emp = 1
	and not I_SettlementOwner Varg = teutonic_order	
	and not I_SettlementOwner Aesling = teutonic_order	
	and not I_SettlementOwner Baersonlings = lithuania
	
	if I_CharacterExists chaosgeneral164
	console_command auto_win attacker
		siege_settlement chaosgeneral164, Varg, attack
	end_if
	if I_CharacterExists chaosgeneral165
	console_command auto_win attacker
		siege_settlement chaosgeneral165, Aesling, attack
	end_if
	
		if I_CharacterExists chaosgeneral166
		console_command auto_win attacker
		siege_settlement chaosgeneral166, South_Ost_Aghol, attack
	end_if
	if I_CharacterExists chaosgeneral167
	console_command auto_win attacker
		siege_settlement chaosgeneral167, Ost_Aghol, attack
	end_if
	if I_CharacterExists chaosgeneral168
	console_command auto_win attacker
		siege_settlement chaosgeneral168, Kvellig, attack
	end_if	
		
	if I_CharacterExists chaosgeneral169
	console_command auto_win attacker
		siege_settlement chaosgeneral169, Hastling, attack
	end_if
	if I_CharacterExists chaosgeneral170
	console_command auto_win attacker
		siege_settlement chaosgeneral170, Kul, attack
	end_if	
	
	if I_CharacterExists chaosgeneral171
	console_command auto_win attacker
		siege_settlement chaosgeneral171, South_Gharhar, attack
	end_if
	
	
	if I_CharacterExists chaosgeneral172
	console_command auto_win attacker
		siege_settlement chaosgeneral172, Notrh_Hastling, attack
	end_if

terminate_monitor
end_monitor



;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;
;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;5. Garrison script. Hick;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;
;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;


;garrison script
declare_counter garrison_decided
monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal
and I_CompareCounter garrison_decided = 0
set_counter garrison_decided 1
terminate_monitor
end_monitor

declare_counter Aghol_siege
declare_counter Gharhar_siege
declare_counter Tong_siege
declare_counter Dolgan_siege
declare_counter Fort_of_phoenix_king_siege
declare_counter Kislev_siege
declare_counter Wolfenburg_siege
declare_counter Salzmund_siege
declare_counter Middenheim_siege
declare_counter Hergig_siege
declare_counter Altdorf_siege
declare_counter Talabheim_siege
declare_counter Bechafen_siege
declare_counter Wurtbad_siege
declare_counter Waldenhof_siege
declare_counter Wissenburg_siege
declare_counter Averheim_siege
declare_counter Karaz_a_Karak_siege
declare_counter Darklands_siege

declare_counter Aghol_Local
declare_counter Gharhar_Local
declare_counter Tong_Local
declare_counter Dolgan_Local
declare_counter Fort_of_phoenix_king_Local
declare_counter Kislev_Local
declare_counter Wolfenburg_Local
declare_counter Salzmund_Local
declare_counter Middenheim_Local
declare_counter Hergig_Local
declare_counter Altdorf_Local
declare_counter Talabheim_Local
declare_counter Bechafen_Local
declare_counter Wurtbad_Local
declare_counter Waldenhof_Local
declare_counter Wissenburg_Local
declare_counter Averheim_Local
declare_counter Karaz_a_Karak_Local
declare_counter Darklands_Local

monitor_event FactionTurnEnd FactionIsLocal
if I_CompareCounter garrison_decided = 1
inc_counter Aghol_siege -1
inc_counter Gharhar_siege -1
inc_counter Tong_siege -1
inc_counter Dolgan_siege -1
inc_counter Fort_of_phoenix_king_siege -1
inc_counter Kislev_siege -1
inc_counter Wolfenburg_siege -1
inc_counter Salzmund_siege -1
inc_counter Middenheim_siege -1
inc_counter Hergig_siege -1
inc_counter Altdorf_siege -1
inc_counter Talabheim_siege -1
inc_counter Bechafen_siege -1
inc_counter Wurtbad_siege -1
inc_counter Waldenhof_siege -1
inc_counter Wissenburg_siege -1
inc_counter Averheim_siege -1
inc_counter Karaz_a_Karak_siege -1
inc_counter Darklands_siege -1
end_if
end_monitor

;===============================================================
;============ Ensures Player Owned Settlements =================
;========== Are Local On Turn Start and Turn End ===============
;===============================================================


monitor_event SettlementTurnStart SettlementIsLocal
	and SettlementName Aghol
	set_counter Aghol_Local 1
end_monitor



monitor_event SettlementTurnStart SettlementIsLocal
	and SettlementName Gharhar
	set_counter Gharhar_Local 1
end_monitor



monitor_event SettlementTurnStart SettlementIsLocal
	and SettlementName Tong
	set_counter Tong_Local 1
end_monitor



monitor_event SettlementTurnStart SettlementIsLocal
	and SettlementName Fort_of_phoenix_king
	set_counter Fort_of_phoenix_king_Local 1
end_monitor



monitor_event SettlementTurnStart SettlementIsLocal
	and SettlementName Wolfenburg
	set_counter Wolfenburg_Local 1
end_monitor



monitor_event SettlementTurnStart SettlementIsLocal
	and SettlementName Salzmund
	set_counter Salzmund_Local 1
end_monitor



monitor_event SettlementTurnStart SettlementIsLocal
	and SettlementName Middenheim
	set_counter Middenheim_Local 1
end_monitor



monitor_event SettlementTurnStart SettlementIsLocal
	and SettlementName Altdorf
	set_counter Altdorf_Local 1
end_monitor



monitor_event SettlementTurnStart SettlementIsLocal
	and SettlementName Talabheim
	set_counter Talabheim_Local 1
end_monitor



monitor_event SettlementTurnStart SettlementIsLocal
	and SettlementName Bechafen
	set_counter Bechafen_Local 1
end_monitor



monitor_event SettlementTurnStart SettlementIsLocal
	and SettlementName Wurtbad
	set_counter Wurtbad_Local 1
end_monitor



monitor_event SettlementTurnStart SettlementIsLocal
	and SettlementName Waldenhof
	set_counter Waldenhof_Local 1
end_monitor



monitor_event SettlementTurnStart SettlementIsLocal
	and SettlementName Wissenburg
	set_counter Wissenburg_Local 1
end_monitor

monitor_event SettlementTurnStart SettlementIsLocal
	and SettlementName Darklands
	set_counter Darklands_Local 1
end_monitor

monitor_event SettlementTurnStart SettlementIsLocal
	and SettlementName Karaz_a_Karak
	set_counter Karaz_a_Karak_Local 1
end_monitor

monitor_event SettlementTurnStart SettlementIsLocal
	and SettlementName Averheim
	set_counter Averheim_Local 1
end_monitor



;===============================================================
;============== Ensures AI Owned Settlements ===================
;========== Are Local On Turn Start and Turn End ===============
;===============================================================


monitor_event SettlementTurnStart not SettlementIsLocal
	and SettlementName Aghol
	set_counter Aghol_Local 0
end_monitor



monitor_event SettlementTurnStart not SettlementIsLocal
	and SettlementName Gharhar
	set_counter Gharhar_Local 0
end_monitor



monitor_event SettlementTurnStart not SettlementIsLocal
	and SettlementName Tong
	set_counter Tong_Local 0
end_monitor



monitor_event SettlementTurnStart not SettlementIsLocal
	and SettlementName Fort_of_phoenix_king
	set_counter Fort_of_phoenix_king_Local 0
end_monitor



monitor_event SettlementTurnStart not SettlementIsLocal
	and SettlementName Wolfenburg
	set_counter Wolfenburg_Local 0
end_monitor



monitor_event SettlementTurnStart not SettlementIsLocal
	and SettlementName Salzmund
	set_counter Salzmund_Local 0
end_monitor



monitor_event SettlementTurnStart not SettlementIsLocal
	and SettlementName Middenheim
	set_counter Middenheim_Local 0
end_monitor



monitor_event SettlementTurnStart not SettlementIsLocal
	and SettlementName Altdorf
	set_counter Altdorf_Local 0
end_monitor



monitor_event SettlementTurnStart not SettlementIsLocal
	and SettlementName Talabheim
	set_counter Talabheim_Local 0
end_monitor



monitor_event SettlementTurnStart not SettlementIsLocal
	and SettlementName Bechafen
	set_counter Bechafen_Local 0
end_monitor



monitor_event SettlementTurnStart not SettlementIsLocal
	and SettlementName Wurtbad
	set_counter Wurtbad_Local 0
end_monitor



monitor_event SettlementTurnStart not SettlementIsLocal
	and SettlementName Waldenhof
	set_counter Waldenhof_Local 0
end_monitor



monitor_event SettlementTurnStart not SettlementIsLocal
	and SettlementName Wissenburg
	set_counter Wissenburg_Local 0
end_monitor

monitor_event SettlementTurnStart not SettlementIsLocal
	and SettlementName Darklands
	set_counter Darklands_Local 0
end_monitor

monitor_event SettlementTurnStart not SettlementIsLocal
	and SettlementName Karaz_a_Karak
	set_counter Karaz_a_Karak_Local 0
end_monitor

monitor_event SettlementTurnStart not SettlementIsLocal
	and SettlementName Averheim
	set_counter Averheim_Local 0
end_monitor



monitor_event ButtonPressed ButtonPressed siege_maintain_button



if I_SettlementUnderSiege Aghol
and I_SettlementOwner Aghol = teutonic_order
and I_CompareCounter Aghol_siege < 1
and I_CompareCounter garrison_decided = 1

and I_CompareCounter Aghol_Local = 0
create_unit Aghol, Warrior of chaos, num 3, exp 4, arm 0, wep 0
create_unit Aghol, Warrior of chaos halberd, num 3, exp 4, arm 0, wep 0
create_unit Aghol, Marauders, num 3, exp 4, arm 0, wep 0
set_counter Aghol_siege 10
end_if


if I_SettlementUnderSiege Gharhar
and I_SettlementOwner Gharhar = novgorod
and I_CompareCounter Gharhar_Local = 0
and I_CompareCounter Gharhar_siege < 1
and I_CompareCounter garrison_decided = 1

create_unit Gharhar, Warrior of chaos, num 3, exp 4, arm 0, wep 0
create_unit Gharhar, Warrior of chaos halberd, num 3, exp 4, arm 0, wep 0

end_if

and I_SettlementOwner Tong = lithuania

and I_CompareCounter Tong_siege < 1
and I_CompareCounter garrison_decided = 1

create_unit Fort_of_phoenix_king, High Elf Spearmen, num 3, exp 4, arm 0, wep 0

create_unit Karaz_a_Karak, Dwarven warriors, num 3, exp 4, arm 0, wep 0
create_unit Karaz_a_Karak, Slayers, num 3, exp 4, arm 0, wep 0
create_unit Karaz_a_Karak, Longbeards_axemens, num 3, exp 4, arm 0, wep 0
set_counter Karaz_a_Karak_siege 10
end_if



if I_SettlementUnderSiege Darklands
and I_SettlementOwner Darklands = turks
and I_CompareCounter Darklands_Local = 0
and I_CompareCounter Darklands_siege < 1
and I_CompareCounter garrison_decided = 1

create_unit Darklands, Savage Orcs boar boyz, num 3, exp 4, arm 0, wep 0
create_unit Darklands, Savage Orcs arrer, num 3, exp 4, arm 0, wep 0
create_unit Darklands, Orcz boyz, num 3, exp 4, arm 0, wep 0
set_counter Darklandsk_siege 10
end_if
end_monitor

declare_counter waagh
set_counter waagh 1

monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType turks
		and I_IsFactionAIControlled turks
		if I_CompareCounter waagh == 1	
		and I_SettlementOwner Darklands = turks
		and I_SettlementOwner Blasted_Wastes = turks 	

		spawn_army 
			faction turks
			character	random_name, general, age 36, x 183, y 65		
	         unit		Orcz boyz				exp 4 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
             unit		Goblinz Arrerz				exp 4 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
             unit		Goblinz Arrerz				exp 4 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
		end
	
		spawn_army 
			faction turks
			character	random_name, named character, age 29, x 189, y 66			 
	     unit		Orcz boyz				exp 4 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
             unit		Goblinz Arrerz				exp 4 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
             unit		Goblinz Arrerz				exp 4 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
		end
	create_unit Darklands, Orcz boyz, num 1, exp 4, arm 0, wep 0
	create_unit Blasted_Wastes, Orcz boyz, num 1, exp 4, arm 0, wep 0
		end_if
		if I_CompareCounter waagh == 2
		and I_SettlementOwner Darklands = turks
		and I_SettlementOwner Blasted_Wastes = turks
		spawn_army 
			faction turks
			character	random_name, general, age 36, x 183, y 65		
	         unit		Orcz boyz				exp 4 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
             unit		Goblinz Arrerz				exp 4 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
             unit		Goblinz Arrerz				exp 4 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
		end
	
		spawn_army 
			faction turks
			character	random_name, named character, age 29, x 189, y 66			 
	     unit		Orcz boyz				exp 4 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
             unit		Goblinz Arrerz				exp 4 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
             unit		Goblinz Arrerz				exp 4 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
		end
	create_unit Darklands, Orcz boyz, num 1, exp 4, arm 0, wep 0
	create_unit Blasted_Wastes, Orcz boyz, num 1, exp 4, arm 0, wep 0
		
end_if
inc_counter waagh 1 ;
	if I_CompareCounter month == 3
	set_counter waagh 1
	end_if
	end_monitor	
	
;orc expantion
monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType turks
		and I_TurnNumber = 1
		and I_IsFactionAIControlled turks		
		if I_CharacterExists Cracktooth Ironclaw
		siege_settlement Cracktooth Ironclaw, Brovska, attack
		end_if
		if I_CharacterExists Slookilla Cleverman
		move Slookilla Cleverman, 113, 7
		end_if
		if I_CharacterExists Badruk Eadsplitta
		move Badruk Eadsplitta, 117, 11
		end_if
		terminate_monitor
		end_monitor
		
		monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType turks
		and I_TurnNumber = 2
		and I_IsFactionAIControlled turks
		if I_CharacterExists Slookilla Cleverman		
		move Slookilla Cleverman, 98, 9
		end_if
		if I_CharacterExists Badruk Eadsplitta
		move Badruk Eadsplitta, 127, 17
		end_if
		terminate_monitor
		end_monitor
		
			monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType turks
		and I_TurnNumber = 3
		and I_IsFactionAIControlled turks
		if I_CharacterExists Badruk Eadsplitta
		siege_settlement Badruk Eadsplitta, Karaz_a_Karak, attack
		end_if
		if I_CharacterExists Slookilla Cleverman
			move Slookilla Cleverman, 78, 23
		end_if		
		terminate_monitor
		end_monitor

	reveal_tile 80, 27
	character_flash_start grimgor2
	console_command	give_trait grimgor2 script

	and I_CompareCounter orcattack = 1
	and not I_SettlementOwner Averheim = turks

	if I_CharacterExists grimgor6
	and not I_SettlementOwner Averheim = turks
		siege_settlement grimgor6, Averheim, maintain
		wait 3
	end_if
	if I_CharacterExists grimgor7
	and not I_SettlementOwner Averheim = turks
		siege_settlement grimgor7, Averheim, attack
	end_if

end_monitor

and I_TurnNumber > 0

monitor_event GeneralCaptureSettlement FactionType turks
   and SettlementName Brovska
   and not I_SettlementOwner Brovska = turks
   if I_EventCounter Brovska = 1
   console_command add_population Brovska -5000
   campaign_wait 1
disable_cursor
campaign_wait 1
      select_ui_element loot_settlement_occupy_button
   simulate_mouse_click lclick_down
   simulate_mouse_click lclick_up
   enable_cursor
   end_if
   if I_EventCounter Brovska = 2
   console_command add_population Brovska -11500
   campaign_wait 1
disable_cursor
campaign_wait 1
      select_ui_element loot_settlement_occupy_button
   simulate_mouse_click lclick_down
   simulate_mouse_click lclick_up
   enable_cursor
   end_if
   if I_EventCounter Brovska = 3  
   console_command set_building_health Brovska core_building 0
   campaign_wait 1
disable_cursor
campaign_wait 1
      select_ui_element loot_settlement_occupy_button
   simulate_mouse_click lclick_down
   simulate_mouse_click lclick_up
   enable_cursor
   end_if   
end_monitor

   and SettlementName Rome
   and not I_SettlementOwner Rome = turks
   if I_EventCounter Rome = 1
   console_command add_population Rome -5000
   campaign_wait 1
disable_cursor
campaign_wait 1
      select_ui_element loot_settlement_occupy_button
   simulate_mouse_click lclick_down

   end_if
   if I_EventCounter Rome = 2

campaign_wait 1

   end_if   
end_monitor

   console_command add_population Castlesigmar -11500
   campaign_wait 1
disable_cursor

      select_ui_element loot_settlement_occupy_button
   simulate_mouse_click lclick_down
   simulate_mouse_click lclick_up
   enable_cursor
   end_if

disable_cursor
campaign_wait 1
      select_ui_element loot_settlement_occupy_button
   simulate_mouse_click lclick_down
   simulate_mouse_click lclick_up
   enable_cursor
   end_if   
end_monitor

   simulate_mouse_click lclick_up
   enable_cursor
   end_if
   if I_EventCounter Sarl = 2
   console_command add_population Sarl -11500
   campaign_wait 1
disable_cursor
campaign_wait 1
      select_ui_element loot_settlement_occupy_button
   simulate_mouse_click lclick_down
   simulate_mouse_click lclick_up
   enable_cursor

;silvania script
monitor_event GeneralCaptureSettlement FactionType hungary
   and SettlementName Brovska
   and not I_SettlementOwner Brovska = hungary
   if I_EventCounter Brovska = 1
   console_command add_population Brovska -5000
   campaign_wait 1
disable_cursor
campaign_wait 1
      select_ui_element loot_settlement_occupy_button
   simulate_mouse_click lclick_down
   simulate_mouse_click lclick_up
   enable_cursor
   create_unit Brovska, Vampire skeleton, num 1, exp 0, arm 0, wep 0
create_unit Brovska, Vampire skeleton spears, num 1, exp 0, arm 0, wep 0
end_if
   if I_EventCounter Brovska = 2
   console_command add_population Brovska -11500
   campaign_wait 1
disable_cursor
campaign_wait 1
      select_ui_element loot_settlement_occupy_button
   simulate_mouse_click lclick_down
   simulate_mouse_click lclick_up
   enable_cursor
   create_unit Brovska, Vampire skeleton, num 2, exp 0, arm 0, wep 0
create_unit Brovska, Vampire skeleton spears, num 2, exp 0, arm 0, wep 0
end_if
   if I_EventCounter Brovska = 3 
   console_command add_population Brovska -8000
   campaign_wait 1
disable_cursor
campaign_wait 1
      select_ui_element loot_settlement_occupy_button
   simulate_mouse_click lclick_down
   simulate_mouse_click lclick_up
   enable_cursor
   create_unit Brovska, Vampire skeleton, num 1, exp 0, arm 0, wep 0
create_unit Brovska, Vampire skeleton spears, num 2, exp 0, arm 0, wep 0
 end_if   
end_monitor

   simulate_mouse_click lclick_down
   simulate_mouse_click lclick_up
   enable_cursor
   create_unit Edinburgh, Vampire skeleton, num 1, exp 0, arm 0, wep 0
create_unit Edinburgh, Vampire skeleton spears, num 1, exp 0, arm 0, wep 0
end_if
   if I_EventCounter Edinburgh = 2
   ;console_command set_building_health Edinburgh core_building 0
   console_command add_population Edinburgh -11500
      campaign_wait 1
disable_cursor
campaign_wait 1
      select_ui_element loot_settlement_occupy_button
   simulate_mouse_click lclick_down
   simulate_mouse_click lclick_up
   enable_cursor
   create_unit Edinburgh, Vampire skeleton, num 2, exp 0, arm 0, wep 0
create_unit Edinburgh, Vampire skeleton spears, num 2, exp 0, arm 0, wep 0

   create_unit Lieske, Vampire skeleton, num 2, exp 0, arm 0, wep 0
create_unit Lieske, Vampire skeleton spears, num 2, exp 0, arm 0, wep 0
end_if
   if I_EventCounter Lieske = 3  
   ;console_command set_building_health Lieske core_building 0
   console_command add_population Lieske -8000
      campaign_wait 1
disable_cursor
campaign_wait 1
      select_ui_element loot_settlement_occupy_button
   simulate_mouse_click lclick_down
   simulate_mouse_click lclick_up
   enable_cursor
   create_unit Lieske, Vampire skeleton, num 1, exp 0, arm 0, wep 0
create_unit Lieske, Vampire skeleton spears, num 2, exp 0, arm 0, wep 0
end_if   
end_monitor

monitor_event GeneralCaptureSettlement FactionType hungary
   and SettlementName Pfungzing
   and not I_SettlementOwner Pfungzing = hungary
   if I_EventCounter Pfungzing = 1
   ;console_command set_building_health Pfungzing core_building 0
   console_command add_population Pfungzing -5000
      campaign_wait 1
disable_cursor
campaign_wait 1
      select_ui_element loot_settlement_occupy_button
   simulate_mouse_click lclick_down
   simulate_mouse_click lclick_up
   enable_cursor
   create_unit Pfungzing, Vampire skeleton, num 1, exp 0, arm 0, wep 0
create_unit Pfungzing, Vampire skeleton spears, num 1, exp 0, arm 0, wep 0
end_if
   if I_EventCounter Pfungzing = 2
   ;console_command set_building_health Pfungzing core_building 0
   console_command add_population Pfungzing -11500
      campaign_wait 1
disable_cursor
campaign_wait 1
      select_ui_element loot_settlement_occupy_button
   simulate_mouse_click lclick_down
   simulate_mouse_click lclick_up
   enable_cursor
   create_unit Pfungzing, Vampire skeleton, num 2, exp 0, arm 0, wep 0
create_unit Pfungzing, Vampire skeleton spears, num 2, exp 0, arm 0, wep 0
end_if
   if I_EventCounter Pfungzing = 3  
   ;console_command set_building_health Pfungzing core_building 0
   console_command add_population Pfungzing -8000
      campaign_wait 1
disable_cursor
campaign_wait 1

   console_command add_population Ferlangen -8000
      campaign_wait 1
disable_cursor
campaign_wait 1
      select_ui_element loot_settlement_occupy_button
   simulate_mouse_click lclick_down
   simulate_mouse_click lclick_up
   enable_cursor
   create_unit Ferlangen, Vampire skeleton, num 1, exp 0, arm 0, wep 0
create_unit Ferlangen, Vampire skeleton spears, num 2, exp 0, arm 0, wep 0
 end_if   
end_monitor

   ;console_command set_building_health Zenres core_building 0
   console_command add_population Zenres -8000
      campaign_wait 1
disable_cursor
campaign_wait 1
      select_ui_element loot_settlement_occupy_button
   simulate_mouse_click lclick_down
   simulate_mouse_click lclick_up
   enable_cursor
   create_unit Zenres, Vampire skeleton, num 1, exp 0, arm 0, wep 0
create_unit Zenres, Vampire skeleton spears, num 2, exp 0, arm 0, wep 0   
   end_if   
end_monitor


monitor_event GeneralCaptureSettlement FactionType hungary
   and SettlementName Vidovdan
   and not I_SettlementOwner Vidovdan = hungary
   if I_EventCounter Vidovdan = 1
   ;console_command set_building_health Vidovdan core_building 0
   console_command add_population Vidovdan -5000
      campaign_wait 1
disable_cursor
campaign_wait 1
      select_ui_element loot_settlement_occupy_button
   simulate_mouse_click lclick_down
   simulate_mouse_click lclick_up
   enable_cursor
   create_unit Vidovdan, Vampire skeleton, num 1, exp 0, arm 0, wep 0
create_unit Vidovdan, Vampire skeleton spears, num 1, exp 0, arm 0, wep 0  
   end_if
   if I_EventCounter Vidovdan = 2
   ;console_command set_building_health Vidovdan core_building 0
   console_command add_population Vidovdan -11500
      campaign_wait 1
disable_cursor
campaign_wait 1
      select_ui_element loot_settlement_occupy_button
   simulate_mouse_click lclick_down
   simulate_mouse_click lclick_up
   enable_cursor
   create_unit Vidovdan, Vampire skeleton, num 2, exp 0, arm 0, wep 0
create_unit Vidovdan, Vampire skeleton spears, num 2, exp 0, arm 0, wep 0   
   end_if
   if I_EventCounter Vidovdan = 3  
   ;console_command set_building_health Vidovdan core_building 0
   console_command add_population Vidovdan -8000
      campaign_wait 1
disable_cursor
campaign_wait 1
      select_ui_element loot_settlement_occupy_button
   simulate_mouse_click lclick_down
   simulate_mouse_click lclick_up
   enable_cursor
   create_unit Vidovdan, Vampire skeleton, num 1, exp 0, arm 0, wep 0
create_unit Vidovdan, Vampire skeleton spears, num 2, exp 0, arm 0, wep 0 
   end_if   
end_monitor

   and SettlementName Akendorf
   and not I_SettlementOwner Akendorf = hungary

;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;
;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;8. Hunting, fishing, harvest. Isilendil;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;
;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;


declare_counter turn_end_mushrooms
set_counter turn_end_mushrooms 0


monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal
inc_counter turn_end_mushrooms 1
generate_random_counter hunt 1 5
generate_random_counter fishing 1 5

;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;летняя  ярмарка;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;

if I_CompareCounter month = 6
set_event_counter summer_market 1
historic_event SUMMER_MARKET_START false factions { southern_european, eastern_european, }
end_if
if I_CompareCounter month > 6
set_event_counter summer_market 0
end_if
if I_CompareCounter month < 6
set_event_counter summer_market 0
end_if
;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;Грибы;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;
if I_CompareCounter turn_end_mushrooms = 3
generate_random_counter mushrooms 1 5	
set_counter turn_end_mushrooms 0
end_if

if I_EventCounter mushrooms = 5
set_event_counter very_good_mushrooms 1
set_event_counter good_mushrooms 0
set_event_counter normal_mushrooms 0
set_event_counter bad_mushrooms 0
set_event_counter very_bad_mushrooms 0
end_if

if I_EventCounter mushrooms = 4
set_event_counter very_good_mushrooms 0
set_event_counter good_mushrooms 1
set_event_counter normal_mushrooms 0
set_event_counter bad_mushrooms 0
set_event_counter very_bad_mushrooms 0
end_if

if I_EventCounter mushrooms = 3
set_event_counter very_good_mushrooms 0
set_event_counter good_mushrooms 0
set_event_counter normal_mushrooms 1
set_event_counter bad_mushrooms 0
set_event_counter very_bad_mushrooms 0
end_if

if I_EventCounter mushrooms = 2
set_event_counter very_good_mushrooms 0
set_event_counter good_mushrooms 0
set_event_counter normal_mushrooms 0
set_event_counter bad_mushrooms 1
set_event_counter very_bad_mushrooms 0
end_if

if I_EventCounter mushrooms = 1
set_event_counter very_good_mushrooms 0
set_event_counter good_mushrooms 0
set_event_counter normal_mushrooms 0
set_event_counter bad_mushrooms 0
set_event_counter very_bad_mushrooms 1
end_if
;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;Охота;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;

if I_EventCounter hunt = 5
set_event_counter very_good_hunt 1
set_event_counter good_hunt 0
set_event_counter normal_hunt 0
set_event_counter bad_hunt 0
set_event_counter very_bad_hunt 0
end_if

if I_EventCounter hunt = 4
set_event_counter very_good_hunt 0
set_event_counter good_hunt 1
set_event_counter normal_hunt 0
set_event_counter bad_hunt 0
set_event_counter very_bad_hunt 0
end_if

if I_EventCounter hunt = 3
set_event_counter very_good_hunt 0
set_event_counter good_hunt 0
set_event_counter normal_hunt 1
set_event_counter bad_hunt 0
set_event_counter very_bad_hunt 0
end_if

if I_EventCounter hunt = 2
set_event_counter very_good_hunt 0
set_event_counter good_hunt 0
set_event_counter normal_hunt 0
set_event_counter bad_hunt 1
set_event_counter very_bad_hunt 0
end_if

if I_EventCounter hunt = 1
set_event_counter very_good_hunt 0
set_event_counter good_hunt 0
set_event_counter normal_hunt 0
set_event_counter bad_hunt 0
set_event_counter very_bad_hunt 1
end_if


;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;Рыбалка;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;

if I_EventCounter fishing = 5
set_event_counter very_good_fishing 1
set_event_counter good_fishing 0
set_event_counter normal_fishing 0
set_event_counter bad_fishing 0
set_event_counter very_bad_fishing 0
end_if

if I_EventCounter fishing = 4
set_event_counter very_good_fishing 0
set_event_counter good_fishing 1
set_event_counter normal_fishing 0
set_event_counter bad_fishing 0
set_event_counter very_bad_fishing 0
end_if

if I_EventCounter fishing = 3
set_event_counter very_good_fishing 0
set_event_counter good_fishing 0
set_event_counter normal_fishing 1
set_event_counter bad_fishing 0
set_event_counter very_bad_fishing 0
end_if

if I_EventCounter fishing = 2
set_event_counter very_good_fishing 0
set_event_counter good_fishing 0
set_event_counter normal_fishing 0
set_event_counter bad_fishing 1
set_event_counter very_bad_fishing 0
end_if

if I_EventCounter fishing = 1
set_event_counter very_good_fishing 0
set_event_counter good_fishing 0
set_event_counter normal_fishing 0
set_event_counter bad_fishing 0
set_event_counter very_bad_fishing 1
end_if

;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;Урожай;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;

if I_CompareCounter month = 8
generate_random_counter harvest 1 5
end_if


if I_EventCounter harvest = 5
and I_CompareCounter month = 8
set_event_counter very_good_harvest 1
set_event_counter good_harvest 0
set_event_counter normal_harvest 0
set_event_counter bad_harvest 0
set_event_counter very_bad_harvest 0
historic_event HARVEST_VERY_GOOD false factions { southern_european, eastern_european, }
end_if

if I_EventCounter harvest = 4
and I_CompareCounter month = 8
set_event_counter very_good_harvest 0
set_event_counter good_harvest 1
set_event_counter normal_harvest 0
set_event_counter bad_harvest 0
set_event_counter very_bad_harvest 0
historic_event HARVEST_GOOD false factions { southern_european, eastern_european, }
end_if

if I_EventCounter harvest = 3
and I_CompareCounter month = 8
set_event_counter very_good_harvest 0
set_event_counter good_harvest 0
set_event_counter normal_harvest 1
set_event_counter bad_harvest 0
set_event_counter very_bad_harvest 0
historic_event HARVEST_NORMAL false factions { southern_european, eastern_european, }
end_if

if I_EventCounter harvest = 2
and I_CompareCounter month = 8
set_event_counter very_good_harvest 0
set_event_counter good_harvest 0
set_event_counter normal_harvest 0
set_event_counter bad_harvest 1
set_event_counter very_bad_harvest 0
historic_event HARVEST_BAD false factions { southern_european, eastern_european, }
end_if

if I_EventCounter harvest = 1
and I_CompareCounter month = 8
set_event_counter very_good_harvest 0
set_event_counter good_harvest 0
set_event_counter normal_harvest 0
set_event_counter bad_harvest 0
set_event_counter very_bad_harvest 1
historic_event HARVEST_VERY_BAD false factions { southern_european, eastern_european, }
end_if


if I_CompareCounter month = 11
set_event_counter harvest 0
end_if

end_monitor

			event	counter	rykarth_denmark
			event	counter	rykarth_novgorod
			event	counter	rykarth_lithuania
			event	counter	rykarth_teutonic_order
			event	counter	rykarth_norway
	 		date	0
	 	end_add_events

		set_event_counter rykarth_capitan 0

monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal
and I_IsFactionAIControlled spain
and I_IsFactionAIControlled scotland
and I_IsFactionAIControlled portugal
and I_IsFactionAIControlled venice
and I_IsFactionAIControlled hre
and I_IsFactionAIControlled sicily
and I_IsFactionAIControlled milan
and I_IsFactionAIControlled saxons
and I_IsFactionAIControlled france
and I_IsFactionAIControlled hungary
and I_IsFactionAIControlled england
and I_IsFactionAIControlled turks
and I_IsFactionAIControlled byzantium
and I_IsFactionAIControlled kalmar_union
and I_IsFactionAIControlled poland
and I_IsFactionAIControlled russia
and I_IsFactionAIControlled moors
and I_IsFactionAIControlled mongols
and I_IsFactionAIControlled papal_states
and not I_CharacterExists Rykarth the_Unbreakable
and RandomPercent < 6
and Treasury > 5000
and I_EventCounter rykarth_capitan = 0
historic_event rykarth_recruitment true
terminate_monitor
end_monitor

and I_EventCounter rykarth_capitan = 1
and not I_CharacterExists Rykarth the_Unbreakable
set_event_counter rykarth_capitan 0
historic_event rykarth_recruitment_end
terminate_monitor
end_monitor

and I_EventCounter rykarth_capitan = 0

	declare_counter bronzino_ai 0

if I_EventCounter bronzino_recruitment_declined = 1
generate_random_counter    bronzino_ai 1 9
end_if

and I_IsFactionAIControlled spain
and I_IsFactionAIControlled scotland
and I_IsFactionAIControlled portugal

and I_IsFactionAIControlled sicily
and I_IsFactionAIControlled milan
and I_IsFactionAIControlled saxons
and I_IsFactionAIControlled france
and RandomPercent = 1

end_if

;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;Gotrek;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;

		add_events
			event	counter	gotrek_capitan
	 		date	0
	 	end_add_events

		set_event_counter gotrek_capitan 0

monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal
and I_LocalFaction poland
and not I_CharacterExists Gotrek Gurnisson
and I_EventCounter gotrek_capitan = 0
and RandomPercent < 3
historic_event gotrek_recruitment true
terminate_monitor
end_monitor

monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal
and I_EventCounter gotrek_capitan = 1
and not I_CharacterExists Gotrek Gurnisson
set_event_counter gotrek_capitan 0
historic_event gotrek_recruitment_end
terminate_monitor
end_monitor


monitor_conditions I_EventCounter gotrek_recruitment_accepted = 1
and I_EventCounter gotrek_capitan = 0
and I_LocalFaction poland
add_money poland -1000
spawn_army 
faction poland
character Gotrek Gurnisson, named character, age 29, x 127, y 10, direction S, battle_model Gotrek, portrait Gotrek
traits Gotrek 1
unit		Gotrek Slayers				exp 9 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
end
historic_event dub
spawn_character poland Felix, spy, age 30, x 125, y 11

console_command give_trait "Felix" Dulgu 1
console_command give_trait "Felix" GoodSpy 5

set_event_counter gotrek_capitan 1
terminate_monitor
end_monitor


monitor_event  FactionTurnStart FactionType Slave
and I_IsFactionAIControlled poland
and RandomPercent = 1
add_money poland -1000
spawn_army 
faction poland
character Gotrek Gurnisson, named character, age 29, x 127, y 10, direction S, battle_model Gotrek, portrait Gotrek
traits Gotrek 1
unit		Gotrek Slayers				exp 9 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
end

spawn_character poland Felix, spy, age 30, x 125, y 11

console_command give_trait "Felix" Dulgu 1
console_command give_trait "Felix" GoodSpy 5

set_event_counter gotrek_capitan 1
historic_event gotrek_recruitment_ai
terminate_monitor
end_monitor

		add_events
			event	counter	vancam_spain
			event	counter	vancam_scotland
			event	counter	vancam_portugal
			event	counter	vancam_venice
			event	counter	vancam_hre
			event	counter	vancam_sicily
			event	counter	vancam_milan
			event	counter	vancam_saxons
			event	counter	vancam_france
			event	counter	vancam_russia
			event	counter	vancam_capitan
	 		date	0
	 	end_add_events

		set_event_counter vancam_capitan 0

monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal
and I_IsFactionAIControlled hungary
and I_IsFactionAIControlled novgorod
and I_IsFactionAIControlled lithuania
and I_IsFactionAIControlled norway
and I_IsFactionAIControlled teutonic_order
and I_IsFactionAIControlled england
and I_IsFactionAIControlled turks
and I_IsFactionAIControlled sicily
and I_IsFactionAIControlled byzantium
and I_IsFactionAIControlled kalmar_union
and I_IsFactionAIControlled poland
and I_IsFactionAIControlled moors
and I_IsFactionAIControlled mongols
and I_IsFactionAIControlled papal_states
and not I_CharacterExists Vancam
and RandomPercent = 1
and Treasury > 5000
and I_EventCounter vancam_capitan = 0
historic_event vancam_recruitment true
terminate_monitor
end_monitor

monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal
and I_EventCounter vancam_capitan = 1
and not I_CharacterExists Vancam
set_event_counter vancam_capitan 0
historic_event vancam_recruitment_end
terminate_monitor
end_monitor

and I_IsFactionAIControlled spain

and I_IsFactionAIControlled saxons
and I_IsFactionAIControlled france
and I_IsFactionAIControlled russia
and RandomPercent = 1

end_if

monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal
and I_IsFactionAIControlled hungary
and I_IsFactionAIControlled novgorod
and I_IsFactionAIControlled lithuania
and I_IsFactionAIControlled norway
and I_IsFactionAIControlled teutonic_order
and I_IsFactionAIControlled england
and I_IsFactionAIControlled turks
and I_IsFactionAIControlled byzantium
and I_IsFactionAIControlled kalmar_union
and I_IsFactionAIControlled poland
and I_IsFactionAIControlled russia
and I_IsFactionAIControlled moors
and I_IsFactionAIControlled mongols
and I_IsFactionAIControlled papal_states
and not I_CharacterExists Rihter
and RandomPercent = 1
and Treasury > 5000
and I_EventCounter rihter_capitan = 0
historic_event rihter_recruitment true
terminate_monitor
end_monitor

monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal
and I_EventCounter rihter_capitan = 1
and not I_CharacterExists Rihter
set_event_counter rihter_capitan 0
historic_event rihter_recruitment_end
terminate_monitor
end_monitor


monitor_event SettlementTurnStart SettlementName Mordheim
and not I_CharacterExists Rihter
and  SettlementIsLocal
and I_IsFactionAIControlled hungary
and I_IsFactionAIControlled novgorod
and I_IsFactionAIControlled lithuania
and I_IsFactionAIControlled norway
and I_IsFactionAIControlled teutonic_order
and I_IsFactionAIControlled england
and I_IsFactionAIControlled turks
and I_IsFactionAIControlled sicily
and I_IsFactionAIControlled byzantium
and I_IsFactionAIControlled kalmar_union
and I_IsFactionAIControlled poland
and I_IsFactionAIControlled russia
and I_IsFactionAIControlled moors
and I_IsFactionAIControlled mongols
and I_IsFactionAIControlled papal_states
if not I_IsFactionAIControlled spain
historic_event rihter_recruitment true
terminate_monitor
end_if
if not I_IsFactionAIControlled scotland
historic_event rihter_recruitment true
terminate_monitor
end_if
if not I_IsFactionAIControlled portugal
historic_event rihter_recruitment true
terminate_monitor
end_if
if not I_IsFactionAIControlled venice
historic_event rihter_recruitment true
terminate_monitor
end_if
if not I_IsFactionAIControlled hre
historic_event rihter_recruitment true
terminate_monitor
end_if
if not I_IsFactionAIControlled milan
historic_event rihter_recruitment true
terminate_monitor
end_if
if not I_IsFactionAIControlled saxons
historic_event rihter_recruitment true
terminate_monitor
end_if
if not I_IsFactionAIControlled france
historic_event rihter_recruitment true
end_if
end_monitor

	declare_counter rihter_ai 0
monitor_event  FactionTurnStart FactionType Slave
if I_EventCounter rihter_recruitment_declined = 1
generate_random_counter    rihter_ai 1 9
end_if

if I_IsFactionAIControlled hre
and I_IsFactionAIControlled spain
and I_IsFactionAIControlled scotland
and I_IsFactionAIControlled portugal
and I_IsFactionAIControlled venice
and I_IsFactionAIControlled milan
and I_IsFactionAIControlled saxons
and I_IsFactionAIControlled france
and RandomPercent = 1
generate_random_counter    rihter_ai 1 9
end_if

if I_EventCounter rihter_ai = 1
and I_IsFactionAIControlled spain
add_money spain -5000
spawn_army 
faction spain
character Rihter, named character, age 29, x 65, y 82, direction S, battle_model Kruger
traits Rihter 1
unit		Cursed Company bodygard			exp 9 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
unit		Cursed Company				exp 3 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
unit		Cursed Company				exp 3 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
unit		Cursed Company				exp 3 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
end

historic_event rihter_recruitment_ai
set_event_counter rihter_capitan 1
set_event_counter rihter_spain 1

terminate_monitor
end_if

;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;Krell;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;

		add_events
			event	counter	krell_hungary
			event	counter	krell_capitan
	 		date	0
	 	end_add_events

		set_event_counter krell_capitan 0

monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal
and not I_IsFactionAIControlled hungary
and not I_CharacterExists Krell
and RandomPercent = 1
and Treasury > 5000
and I_EventCounter krell_capitan = 0
historic_event krell_recruitment true
terminate_monitor
end_monitor

monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal
and I_EventCounter krell_capitan = 1
and not I_CharacterExists Krell
set_event_counter krell_capitan 0
historic_event krell_recruitment_end
terminate_monitor
end_monitor


monitor_event SettlementTurnStart SettlementName Blood
and not I_CharacterExists Krell
and  SettlementIsLocal
and not I_IsFactionAIControlled hungary
historic_event krell_recruitment true
terminate_monitor
end_monitor



monitor_conditions I_EventCounter krell_recruitment_accepted = 1
and I_EventCounter krell_capitan = 0


if not I_IsFactionAIControlled hungary
add_money hungary -5000
spawn_army 
faction hungary
character Krell, named character, age 29, x 107, y 53, direction S, battle_model Kruger
traits Krell 1
unit		Vampire count bodiguard			exp 9 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
unit		Vampire skeleton mount chaos				exp 3 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
unit		Vampire skeleton chaos				exp 3 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
unit		Vampire skeleton khorne warrior				exp 3 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
unit		Vampire skeleton chaos warrior				exp 3 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
unit		Vampire skeleton chaos warrior halberd				exp 3 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
unit		Vampire skeleton chaos axe				exp 3 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
end
historic_event krell_recruitment_player
set_event_counter krell_capitan 1
set_event_counter krellr_hungary 1
terminate_monitor
end_if
end_monitor




	declare_counter krellr_ai 0
monitor_event  FactionTurnStart FactionType Slave
if I_EventCounter krell_recruitment_declined = 1
generate_random_counter    krell_ai 1 2
end_if

if I_IsFactionAIControlled hungary
and RandomPercent = 1
generate_random_counter    krell_ai 1 2
end_if

if I_EventCounter krell_ai = 1
and I_IsFactionAIControlled hungary
add_money hungary -5000
spawn_army 
faction hungary
character Krell, named character, age 29, x 107, y 53, direction S, battle_model Kruger
traits Krell 1
unit		Vampire count bodiguar			exp 9 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
unit		Vampire skeleton mount chaos				exp 3 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
unit		Vampire skeleton chaos				exp 3 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
unit		Vampire skeleton khorne warrior				exp 3 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
unit		Vampire skeleton chaos warrior				exp 3 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
unit		Vampire skeleton chaos warrior halberd				exp 3 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
unit		Vampire skeleton chaos axe				exp 3 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
end
historic_event krell_recruitment_ai
set_event_counter krell_capitan 1
set_event_counter krellr_hungary 1
terminate_monitor
end_if
end_monitor





;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;Voland;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;

		add_events
			event	counter	voland_spain
			event	counter	voland_scotland
			event	counter	voland_portugal
			event	counter	voland_venice
			event	counter	voland_hre
			event	counter	voland_sicily
			event	counter	voland_milan
			event	counter	voland_saxons
			event	counter	voland_france
	 		date	0
	 	end_add_events

		set_event_counter voland_capitan 0

monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal
and I_IsFactionAIControlled hungary
and I_IsFactionAIControlled novgorod
and I_IsFactionAIControlled lithuania
and I_IsFactionAIControlled norway
and I_IsFactionAIControlled teutonic_order
and I_IsFactionAIControlled england
and I_IsFactionAIControlled turks
and I_IsFactionAIControlled byzantium
and I_IsFactionAIControlled kalmar_union
and I_IsFactionAIControlled poland
and I_IsFactionAIControlled russia
and I_IsFactionAIControlled moors
and I_IsFactionAIControlled mongols
and I_IsFactionAIControlled papal_states
and not I_CharacterExists Voland
and RandomPercent = 1
and Treasury > 5000
and I_EventCounter voland_capitan = 0
historic_event voland_recruitment true
terminate_monitor
end_monitor

monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal
and I_EventCounter voland_capitan = 1
and not I_CharacterExists Voland
set_event_counter voland_capitan 0
historic_event voland_recruitment_end
terminate_monitor
end_monitor

and I_EventCounter voland_capitan = 0

;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;Ragnar;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;

		add_events
			event	counter	ragnar_spain
			event	counter	ragnar_scotland
			event	counter	ragnar_portugal
			event	counter	ragnar_venice
			event	counter	ragnar_hre
			event	counter	ragnar_sicily
			event	counter	ragnar_milan
			event	counter	ragnar_saxons
			event	counter	ragnar_france
			event	counter	ragnar_russia
	 		date	0
	 	end_add_events

		set_event_counter ragnar_capitan 0

monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal
and I_IsFactionAIControlled hungary
and I_IsFactionAIControlled novgorod
and I_IsFactionAIControlled lithuania
and I_IsFactionAIControlled norway
and I_IsFactionAIControlled teutonic_order
and I_IsFactionAIControlled england
and I_IsFactionAIControlled turks
and I_IsFactionAIControlled byzantium
and I_IsFactionAIControlled kalmar_union
and I_IsFactionAIControlled poland
and I_IsFactionAIControlled moors
and I_IsFactionAIControlled mongols
and I_IsFactionAIControlled papal_states
and not I_CharacterExists Erik Ragnar
and RandomPercent = 1
and Treasury > 5000
and I_EventCounter ragnar_capitan = 0

historic_event ragnar_recruitment true
terminate_monitor
end_monitor

monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal
and I_EventCounter ragnar_capitan = 1
and not I_CharacterExists Erik Ragnar
set_event_counter ragnar_capitan 0
historic_event ragnar_recruitment_end
terminate_monitor
end_monitor


monitor_conditions I_EventCounter ragnar_recruitment_accepted = 1

unit		Ragnar wolves				exp 3 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0

and I_IsFactionAIControlled spain
and I_IsFactionAIControlled scotland
and I_IsFactionAIControlled portugal
and I_IsFactionAIControlled venice
and I_IsFactionAIControlled sicily
and I_IsFactionAIControlled milan
and I_IsFactionAIControlled saxons
and I_IsFactionAIControlled france
and I_IsFactionAIControlled russia
and RandomPercent = 1
generate_random_counter    ragnar_ai 2 4
end_if

and I_IsFactionAIControlled russia

end_monitor

		add_events
			event	counter	hernan_spain
			event	counter	hernan_scotland
			event	counter	hernan_portugal
			event	counter	hernan_venice
			event	counter	hernan_hre
			event	counter	hernan_sicily
			event	counter	hernan_milan
			event	counter	hernan_saxons
			event	counter	hernan_france
	 		date	0
	 	end_add_events

		set_event_counter hernan_capitan 0

monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal
and I_IsFactionAIControlled hungary
and I_IsFactionAIControlled novgorod
and I_IsFactionAIControlled lithuania
and I_IsFactionAIControlled norway
and I_IsFactionAIControlled teutonic_order
and I_IsFactionAIControlled england
and I_IsFactionAIControlled turks
and I_IsFactionAIControlled mongols
and I_IsFactionAIControlled byzantium
and I_IsFactionAIControlled kalmar_union
and I_IsFactionAIControlled poland
and I_IsFactionAIControlled russia
and I_IsFactionAIControlled moors
and I_IsFactionAIControlled papal_states
and not I_CharacterExists Hernan Cotrez
and RandomPercent = 1
and Treasury > 5000
and I_EventCounter hernan_capitan = 0
historic_event hernan_recruitment true
terminate_monitor
end_monitor

monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal
and I_EventCounter hernan_capitan = 1
and not I_CharacterExists Hernan Cotrez
set_event_counter hernan_capitan 0
historic_event hernan_recruitment_end
terminate_monitor
end_monitor

and I_EventCounter hernan_capitan = 0

	declare_counter hernan_ai 0
monitor_event  FactionTurnStart FactionType Slave
if I_EventCounter hernan_recruitment_declined = 1
generate_random_counter    hernan_ai 1 9
end_if

and I_IsFactionAIControlled spain

and I_IsFactionAIControlled sicily
and I_IsFactionAIControlled milan
and I_IsFactionAIControlled saxons
and I_IsFactionAIControlled france
and RandomPercent = 1

end_if

if I_EventCounter maximilian_recruitment_declined = 1
generate_random_counter    maximilian_ai 1 9
end_if

if I_IsFactionAIControlled hre
and I_IsFactionAIControlled spain
and I_IsFactionAIControlled scotland
and I_IsFactionAIControlled portugal
and I_IsFactionAIControlled venice
and I_IsFactionAIControlled sicily
and I_IsFactionAIControlled milan
and I_IsFactionAIControlled saxons
and I_IsFactionAIControlled france
and RandomPercent = 1

;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;Rikko;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;

		add_events
			event	counter	rikko_spain
			event	counter	rikko_scotland
			event	counter	rikko_portugal
			event	counter	rikko_venice
			event	counter	rikko_hre
			event	counter	rikko_sicily
			event	counter	rikko_milan
			event	counter	rikko_saxons
			event	counter	rikko_france
	 		date	0
	 	end_add_events

		set_event_counter rikko_capitan 0

monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal
and I_IsFactionAIControlled hungary
and I_IsFactionAIControlled novgorod
and I_IsFactionAIControlled lithuania
and I_IsFactionAIControlled norway
and I_IsFactionAIControlled teutonic_order
and I_IsFactionAIControlled england
and I_IsFactionAIControlled turks
and I_IsFactionAIControlled byzantium
and I_IsFactionAIControlled kalmar_union
and I_IsFactionAIControlled mongols
and I_IsFactionAIControlled poland
and I_IsFactionAIControlled russia
and I_IsFactionAIControlled moors
and I_IsFactionAIControlled papal_states
and not I_CharacterExists Rikko Ragged
and RandomPercent = 1
and Treasury > 5000
and I_EventCounter rikko_capitan = 0
historic_event rikko_recruitment true
terminate_monitor
end_monitor

monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal
and I_EventCounter rikko_capitan = 1
and not I_CharacterExists Rikko Ragged
set_event_counter rikko_capitan 0
historic_event rikko_recruitment_end
terminate_monitor
end_monitor


monitor_conditions I_EventCounter rikko_recruitment_accepted = 1
and I_EventCounter rikko_capitan = 0

if not I_IsFactionAIControlled spain
add_money spain -5000

end_monitor

unit		leopards				exp 3 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
end
historic_event leopoldo_recruitment_ai
set_event_counter leopoldo_capitan 1
set_event_counter leopoldo_scotland 1
terminate_monitor
end_if

if I_EventCounter leopoldo_ai = 3
and I_IsFactionAIControlled portugal
add_money portugal -5000
spawn_army 
faction portugal
character Leopoldo di_Lucci, named character, age 29, x 47, y 41, direction S, battle_model leopoldo, portrait Leopoldo
traits Leopoldo 1
unit		leopards bodyguard			exp 9 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
unit		leopards				exp 3 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
unit		leopards				exp 3 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
unit		leopards				exp 3 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
end
historic_event leopoldo_recruitment_ai
set_event_counter leopoldo_capitan 1
set_event_counter leopoldo_portugal 1
terminate_monitor
end_if

if I_EventCounter leopoldo_ai = 4
and I_IsFactionAIControlled venice
add_money venice -5000
spawn_army

character Leopoldo di_Lucci, named character, age 29, x 76, y 40, direction S, battle_model leopoldo, portrait Leopoldo

unit		leopards				exp 3 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
unit		leopards				exp 3 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
