;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;
;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;10. Seasons (Веремена года). Hick;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;
;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;

	;	1. 12 Turns per year.
declare_counter month
declare_counter winter_severity
set_counter winter_severity 1 ;normal winter, 2 = severe winter, 3 = mild winter
set_counter month 1 ;set to January 

monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal
		historic_event elven_sea_storm false factions { northern_european, }
terminate_monitor
end_monitor

monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal ; set the season for each month
	if I_CompareCounter month == 1 ;January
		and I_CompareCounter winter_severity == 1 ; normal winter
		console_command season winter
		set_event_counter winter 1
	end_if
	
	if I_CompareCounter month == 1 ;January
		and I_CompareCounter winter_severity == 2; severe winter
		console_command season winter
		set_event_counter winter 1
	end_if
	
	if I_CompareCounter month == 1 ;January
		and I_CompareCounter winter_severity == 3; mild winter
		console_command season winter
		set_event_counter winter 1
		set_event_counter summer_winter 1; next turn will be summer

	end_if
	
	if I_CompareCounter month == 2 ;February
		and I_CompareCounter winter_severity == 1; normal winter
		console_command season winter
		set_event_counter winter 1
		set_event_counter summer_winter 1; next turn will be summer
	end_if
	
	if I_CompareCounter month == 2 ;February
		and I_CompareCounter winter_severity == 2; severe winter
		console_command season winter
		set_event_counter winter 1
	end_if
	
	if I_CompareCounter month == 2 ;February
		and I_CompareCounter winter_severity == 3; mild winter
		console_command season summer
		set_event_counter winter 0
	end_if
	
	if I_CompareCounter month == 3 ;March
		and I_CompareCounter winter_severity == 1; normal winter
		console_command season summer
		set_event_counter winter 0
	end_if
	
	if I_CompareCounter month == 3 ;March
		and I_CompareCounter winter_severity == 2;severe winter
		console_command season winter
		set_event_counter winter 1
		set_event_counter summer_winter 1; next turn will be summer
	end_if
	
	if I_CompareCounter month == 3 ;March
		and I_CompareCounter winter_severity == 3; mild winter
		console_command season summer
		set_event_counter winter 0
	end_if
	
	if I_CompareCounter month == 4 ;April
		and I_CompareCounter winter_severity == 1; normal winter
		console_command season summer
		set_event_counter winter 0
	end_if
	
	if I_CompareCounter month == 4 ;April
		and I_CompareCounter winter_severity == 2; severe winter
		console_command season summer
		set_event_counter winter 0
	end_if
	
	if I_CompareCounter month == 4 ;April
		and I_CompareCounter winter_severity == 3; mild winter
		console_command season summer
		set_event_counter winter 0
	end_if

	if I_CompareCounter month == 5 ;May
		console_command season summer
		set_event_counter winter 0
	end_if
	
	if I_CompareCounter month == 6 ;June
		console_command season summer
		set_event_counter winter 0
	end_if
	
	if I_CompareCounter month == 7 ;July
		console_command season summer
		set_event_counter winter 0
	end_if
	
	if I_CompareCounter month == 8 ;August
		console_command season summer
		set_event_counter winter 0
	end_if
	if I_CompareCounter month == 8 ;August
		and I_CompareCounter winter_severity == 2 ; severe winter
		console_command season summer
		set_event_counter winter 0
	end_if

	if I_CompareCounter month == 9 ;September
		and I_CompareCounter winter_severity == 1; normal winter
		console_command season summer
		set_event_counter winter 0
	end_if
	
	if I_CompareCounter month == 9 ;September
		and I_CompareCounter winter_severity == 2; severe winter
		console_command season summer
		set_event_counter winter 0

	end_if
	
	if I_CompareCounter month == 9 ;September
		and I_CompareCounter winter_severity == 3; mild winter
		console_command season summer
		set_event_counter winter 0
	end_if
	
	if I_CompareCounter month == 10 ;October
		and I_CompareCounter winter_severity == 1; normal winter
		console_command season winter
		set_event_counter winter 1
	end_if
	
	if I_CompareCounter month == 10 ;October
		and I_CompareCounter winter_severity == 2; severe winter
		set_event_counter summer_winter 2;next turn will be winter
		console_command season winter
		set_event_counter winter 1
	end_if
	
	if I_CompareCounter month == 10 ;October
		and I_CompareCounter winter_severity == 3; mild winter
		console_command season winter
		set_event_counter winter 1

	end_if
	
	if I_CompareCounter month == 11 ;November
		and I_CompareCounter winter_severity == 1; normal winter
		console_command season winter
		set_event_counter winter 1
		set_event_counter summer_winter 2;next turn will be winter
	end_if
	
	if I_CompareCounter month == 11; November
		and I_CompareCounter winter_severity == 2; severe winter
		console_command season winter
		set_event_counter winter 1
		historic_event severe_winter
		historic_event elven_sea_storm false factions { northern_european, }
	end_if
	
	if I_CompareCounter month == 11 ;November
		and I_CompareCounter winter_severity == 3; mild winter
		console_command season summer
		set_event_counter winter 1

	end_if
	
	if I_CompareCounter month == 12 ;December
		and I_CompareCounter winter_severity == 1; normal winter
		console_command season winter
		set_event_counter winter 1
	end_if

	if I_CompareCounter month == 12; November
		and I_CompareCounter winter_severity == 2; severe winter
		console_command season winter
	end_if
	
	if I_CompareCounter month == 12 ;December
		and I_CompareCounter winter_severity == 3; mild winter
		console_command season summer
		set_event_counter winter 0
		historic_event mild_winter
		historic_event elven_sea_storm false factions { northern_european, }
		set_event_counter summer_winter 2;next turn will be winter
	end_if
	
	inc_counter month 1 ;advance the month
	if I_CompareCounter month == 13 ;start a new year
		set_counter month 1
	end_if
end_monitor



monitor_event FactionTurnEnd FactionType slave ; randomized winter
	and I_CompareCounter month == 6
	generate_random_counter random_winter 1 10
		if I_EventCounter random_winter >= 1
			and I_EventCounter random_winter <= 8
			set_counter winter_severity 1 ;80 percent chance of severe winter
		end_if

		if I_EventCounter random_winter == 9
			set_counter winter_severity 2 ;10 percent chance of severe winter
		end_if
		
		if I_EventCounter random_winter == 10
			set_counter winter_severity 3 ;10 percent chance of mild winter
		end_if		
end_monitor

;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;
;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;11. Battle models. Yomen;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;
;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;

	monitor_event BecomesFactionLeader FactionType hre
	
		change_battle_model hre leader Emperor
	
	end_monitor
	
	monitor_event BecomesFactionLeader FactionType saxons
	
		change_battle_model saxons leader Elector_count_stir

	end_monitor
	
	monitor_event BecomesFactionLeader FactionType france
	
		change_battle_model france leader Elector_count_oste
	
	end_monitor

		change_battle_model france heir Kessell
	
	end_monitor

		change_battle_model spain leader Helmut
	
	end_monitor

		change_battle_model scotland leader Todbringer
	
	end_monitor

		change_battle_model sicily leader Teoderik
	
	end_monitor

		change_battle_model byzantium leader Raukov
	
	end_monitor
	
	monitor_event BecomesFactionLeader FactionType portugal
	
		change_battle_model portugal leader Wiss_count
	
	end_monitor
	
	monitor_event BecomesFactionLeader FactionType russia
	
		change_battle_model russia leader kislev_tzar
	
	end_monitor
	
	monitor_event BecomesFactionLeader FactionType norway
	
		change_battle_model teutonic_order leader Lord_of_Khorne
	
	end_monitor

	monitor_event BecomesFactionHeir FactionType norway
	
		change_battle_model teutonic_order heir Khorne_geroldd
	
	end_monitor
	
	monitor_event BecomesFactionLeader FactionType teutonic_order
	
		change_battle_model teutonic_order leader Lord_of_Slaanesh
	
	end_monitor

	monitor_event BecomesFactionHeir FactionType teutonic_order
	
		change_battle_model teutonic_order heir Lord_of_Slaanesh
	
	end_monitor
	
	monitor_event BecomesFactionLeader FactionType lithuania
	
		change_battle_model lithuania leader Lord_of_Tzeentch
	
	end_monitor

	monitor_event BecomesFactionHeir FactionType lithuania
	
		change_battle_model lithuania heir Tzeent_geroldd
	
	end_monitor
	
	monitor_event BecomesFactionLeader FactionType novgorod
	
		change_battle_model novgorod leader Lord_of_Nurgl
	
	end_monitor

	monitor_event BecomesFactionLeader FactionType novgorod
	
		change_battle_model novgorod leader Lord_of_Nurgl
	
	end_monitor
	
	monitor_event BecomesFactionLeader FactionType mongols
	
		change_battle_model mongols leader DE_general
	
	end_monitor

	monitor_event BecomesFactionHeir FactionType mongols
	
		change_battle_model mongols heir DE_general
	
	end_monitor
	
	monitor_event BecomesFactionLeader FactionType kalmar_union
	
		change_battle_model kalmar_union leader rus_grand_duke_kiy
	
	end_monitor

	monitor_event BecomesFactionHeir FactionType kalmar_union
	
		change_battle_model kalmar_union heir rus_heir
	
	end_monitor

;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;13. Money script Hick.;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;
;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;
	
monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal
	and I_TurnNumber = 0
	and CampaignDifficulty = medium
		
		if I_IsFactionAIControlled hre
			increment_kings_purse hre 1200
		end_if

		if I_IsFactionAIControlled russia
			increment_kings_purse russia 1200
		end_if

		if I_IsFactionAIControlled turks
			increment_kings_purse turks 1200
		end_if

		if I_IsFactionAIControlled spain
			increment_kings_purse spain 1200
		end_if

		if I_IsFactionAIControlled scotland
			increment_kings_purse scotland 1200
		end_if

		if I_IsFactionAIControlled portugal
			increment_kings_purse portugal 1200
		end_if		


		if I_IsFactionAIControlled venice
			increment_kings_purse venice 1200
		end_if

		if I_IsFactionAIControlled milan
			increment_kings_purse milan 1200
		end_if

		if I_IsFactionAIControlled byzantium
			increment_kings_purse byzantium 1200
		end_if

		if I_IsFactionAIControlled france
			increment_kings_purse france 1200
		end_if
		
		if I_IsFactionAIControlled norway
			increment_kings_purse norway 1200
		end_if
		
		if I_IsFactionAIControlled teutonic_order
			increment_kings_purse teutonic_order 1200
		end_if
		
		if I_IsFactionAIControlled lithuania
			increment_kings_purse lithuania 1200
		end_if
		
		if I_IsFactionAIControlled novgorod
			increment_kings_purse novgorod 1200
		end_if
		
			if I_IsFactionAIControlled england
			increment_kings_purse england 1200
		end_if
		
		if I_IsFactionAIControlled poland
			increment_kings_purse poland 1200
		end_if
		
if I_IsFactionAIControlled 	sicily
			increment_kings_purse 	sicily 1200
		end_if
		
			if I_IsFactionAIControlled 	saxons
			increment_kings_purse 	saxons 1200
		end_if

				if I_IsFactionAIControlled 	mongols
			increment_kings_purse 	mongols 1200
		end_if

		
		
terminate_monitor
end_monitor

		end_if

	monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType hre
		and IsFactionAIControlled
		and Treasury < -500
		
			add_money hre 8000
		
	end_monitor

	monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType russia
		and IsFactionAIControlled
		and Treasury < -500
		
			add_money russia 8000
		
	end_monitor

	monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType turks
		and IsFactionAIControlled
		and Treasury < -500
		
			add_money turks 8000
		
	end_monitor

	monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType spain
		and IsFactionAIControlled
		and Treasury < -500
		
			add_money spain 8000
		
	end_monitor

	monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType scotland
		and IsFactionAIControlled
		and Treasury < -500
		
			add_money scotland 8000
		
	end_monitor

	monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType portugal
		and IsFactionAIControlled
		and Treasury < -500
		
			add_money portugal 8000
		
	end_monitor

	monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType venice
		and IsFactionAIControlled
		and Treasury < -500
		
			add_money venice 8000
		
	end_monitor

	monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType milan
		and IsFactionAIControlled
		and Treasury < -500
		
			add_money milan 8000
		
	end_monitor

	monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType byzantium
		and IsFactionAIControlled
		and Treasury < -500
		
			add_money byzantium 8000
		
	end_monitor

	monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType france
		and IsFactionAIControlled
		and Treasury < -500
		
			add_money france 8000
		
	end_monitor

	monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType norway
		and IsFactionAIControlled
		and Treasury < -500
		
			add_money norway 8000
		
	end_monitor

	monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType teutonic_order
		and IsFactionAIControlled
		and Treasury < -500
		
			add_money teutonic_order 8000
		
	end_monitor
	
		monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType lithuania
		and IsFactionAIControlled
		and Treasury < -500
		
			add_money lithuania 8000
		
	end_monitor
	
		monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType novgorod
		and IsFactionAIControlled
		and Treasury < -500
		
			add_money novgorod 8000
		
	end_monitor
	
		monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType england
		and IsFactionAIControlled
		and Treasury < -500
		
			add_money england 8000
		
	end_monitor
	
		monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType poland
		and IsFactionAIControlled
		and Treasury < -500
		
			add_money poland 8000
		
	end_monitor
	
	
			monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType sicily
		and IsFactionAIControlled
		and Treasury < -500
		
			add_money sicily 8000
		
	end_monitor
	
	
			monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType saxons
		and IsFactionAIControlled
		and Treasury < -500
		
			add_money saxons 8000
		
	end_monitor

					monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType denmark
		and IsFactionAIControlled
		and Treasury < -500
		
			add_money denmark 45000			
								
		
	end_monitor
	
	
						monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType mongols
		and IsFactionAIControlled
		and Treasury < -500
		
			add_money mongols 10000		
								
		
	end_monitor
	
	
	monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType spain
		and not IsFactionAIControlled
		and CampaignDifficulty = easy
		and I_TurnNumber = 1
	
		
			add_money spain 18000
			end_monitor
			
			
		monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType sicily
		and not IsFactionAIControlled
		and CampaignDifficulty = easy
		and I_TurnNumber = 1
	
		
			add_money sicily 18000
			end_monitor
			
			
		monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType scotland
		and not IsFactionAIControlled
		and CampaignDifficulty = easy
	    and I_TurnNumber = 1	
		
			add_money scotland 18000
			end_monitor
			
					monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType byzantium
		and not IsFactionAIControlled
		and CampaignDifficulty = easy
	    and I_TurnNumber = 1	
		
			add_money byzantium 18000
			end_monitor


				monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType france
		and not IsFactionAIControlled
		and CampaignDifficulty = easy
	    and I_TurnNumber = 1	
		
			add_money france 18000
			end_monitor








;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;
;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;14. INTRODUCTION;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;
;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;


monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal
	if I_LocalFaction byzantium
		historic_event introduction_ostland
	end_if
	if I_LocalFaction poland
		historic_event introduction_dwarfs
		end_if
	if I_LocalFaction denmark
		historic_event introduction_chaos
	end_if
	if I_LocalFaction england
		historic_event introduction_elves
	end_if
	if I_LocalFaction france
		historic_event introduction_ostermark
	end_if
	if I_LocalFaction hre
		historic_event introduction_reikland
		
	end_if
	if I_LocalFaction hungary
		historic_event introduction_silvania
	end_if
	if I_LocalFaction milan
		historic_event introduction_hochland
	end_if
	if I_LocalFaction saxons
		historic_event introduction_stirland
	end_if
	if I_LocalFaction norway
		historic_event introduction_khorn
	end_if
	if I_LocalFaction portugal
		historic_event introduction_viciland
	end_if
	if I_LocalFaction russia
		historic_event introduction_kislev
	end_if
	if I_LocalFaction lithuania
		historic_event introduction_tzinch
	end_if
	if I_LocalFaction sicily
		historic_event introduction_nordland
	end_if
	if I_LocalFaction spain
		historic_event introduction_talabakland
	end_if
	if I_LocalFaction turks
		historic_event introduction_orks
	end_if
	if I_LocalFaction venice
		historic_event introduction_averland
	end_if
	if I_LocalFaction kalmar_union
		historic_event introduction_kalmar_union
	end_if
	if I_LocalFaction novgorod
		historic_event introduction_nurgl
	end_if
	if I_LocalFaction teutonic_order
		historic_event introduction_slaanesh
	end_if
	if I_LocalFaction scotland
		historic_event introduction_middenland
	end_if
terminate_monitor
end_monitor

;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;15. Empire Heresy Script. Isilendil;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;
;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;

declare_counter ostland_heresy
declare_counter talabakland_heresy
declare_counter ostermark_heresy
declare_counter hochland_heresy
declare_counter stirland_heresy
declare_counter middenland_heresy
declare_counter viciland_heresy
declare_counter nordland_heresy
declare_counter averland_heresy

declare_counter ostland_heresy_start
declare_counter talabakland_heresy_start
declare_counter ostermark_heresy_start
declare_counter hochland_heresy_start
declare_counter stirland_heresy_start
declare_counter middenland_heresy_start
declare_counter viciland_heresy_start
declare_counter nordland_heresy_start
declare_counter averland_heresy_start

declare_counter ostland_heresy_end
declare_counter talabakland_heresy_end
declare_counter ostermark_heresy_end
declare_counter hochland_heresy_end
declare_counter stirland_heresy_end
declare_counter middenland_heresy_end
declare_counter viciland_heresy_end
declare_counter nordland_heresy_end
declare_counter averland_heresy_end

declare_counter ostland_chaos_god
declare_counter talabakland_chaos_god
declare_counter ostermark_chaos_god
declare_counter hochland_chaos_god
declare_counter stirland_chaos_god
declare_counter middenland_chaos_god
declare_counter viciland_chaos_god
declare_counter nordland_chaos_god
declare_counter averland_chaos_god

declare_counter chaos_union
set_event_counter chaos_union 0

;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;Шанс Ереси;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;
;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;

monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionType slave
	and I_TurnNumber > 10
;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;Остланд;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;
	if I_CompareCounter ostland_heresy = 0
		if I_FactionLeaderAttribute byzantium Piety = 5
		and RandomPercent <= 1
			set_counter ostland_heresy 1
		end_if
		if I_FactionLeaderAttribute byzantium Piety = 4
		and RandomPercent <= 1
			set_counter ostland_heresy 1
		end_if
		if I_FactionLeaderAttribute byzantium Piety = 3
		and RandomPercent <= 1
			set_counter ostland_heresy 1
		end_if
		if I_FactionLeaderAttribute byzantium Piety = 2
		and RandomPercent <= 1
			set_counter ostland_heresy 1
		end_if
		if I_FactionLeaderAttribute byzantium Piety = 1
		and RandomPercent <= 1
			set_counter ostland_heresy 1
		end_if
		if I_FactionLeaderAttribute byzantium Piety = 0
		and RandomPercent <= 99
			set_counter ostland_heresy 1
		end_if
	end_if
;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;Талабакленд;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;
	if I_CompareCounter talabakland_heresy = 0
		if I_FactionLeaderAttribute spain Piety = 5
		and RandomPercent <= 1
			set_counter talabakland_heresy 1
		end_if
		if I_FactionLeaderAttribute spain Piety = 4
		and RandomPercent <= 1
			set_counter talabakland_heresy 1
		end_if
		if I_FactionLeaderAttribute spain Piety = 3
		and RandomPercent <= 1
			set_counter talabakland_heresy 1
		end_if
		if I_FactionLeaderAttribute spain Piety = 2
		and RandomPercent <= 1
			set_counter talabakland_heresy 1
		end_if
		if I_FactionLeaderAttribute spain Piety = 1
		and RandomPercent <= 1
			set_counter talabakland_heresy 1
		end_if
		if I_FactionLeaderAttribute spain Piety = 0
		and RandomPercent <= 99
			set_counter talabakland_heresy 1
		end_if
	end_if
;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;Остермарк;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;
	if I_CompareCounter ostermark_heresy = 0
		if I_FactionLeaderAttribute france Piety = 5
		and RandomPercent <= 1
			set_counter ostermark_heresy 1
		end_if
		if I_FactionLeaderAttribute france Piety = 4
		and RandomPercent <= 1
			set_counter ostermark_heresy 1
		end_if
		if I_FactionLeaderAttribute france Piety = 3
		and RandomPercent <= 1
			set_counter ostermark_heresy 1
		end_if
		if I_FactionLeaderAttribute france Piety = 2
		and RandomPercent <= 1
			set_counter ostermark_heresy 1
		end_if
		if I_FactionLeaderAttribute france Piety = 1
		and RandomPercent <= 1
			set_counter ostermark_heresy 1

		if I_FactionLeaderAttribute france Piety = 0
		and RandomPercent <= 99
			set_counter ostermark_heresy 1

		and RandomPercent <= 1

		if I_FactionLeaderAttribute sicily Piety = 4

		if I_FactionLeaderAttribute portugal Piety = 5
		and RandomPercent <= 1
			set_counter viciland_heresy 1
		end_if
		if I_FactionLeaderAttribute portugal Piety = 4
		and RandomPercent <= 1

		end_if
		if I_FactionLeaderAttribute portugal Piety = 3
		and RandomPercent <= 1

		end_if
		if I_FactionLeaderAttribute portugal Piety = 2
		and RandomPercent <= 1

		end_if
		if I_FactionLeaderAttribute portugal Piety = 1
		and RandomPercent <= 1
			set_counter viciland_heresy 1
		end_if
		if I_FactionLeaderAttribute portugal Piety = 0
		and RandomPercent <= 99
			set_counter viciland_heresy 1
		end_if
	end_if

		if I_FactionLeaderAttribute scotland Piety = 5

			set_counter middenland_heresy 1
		end_if
		if I_FactionLeaderAttribute scotland Piety = 4

		and RandomPercent <= 99

	end_if
end_monitor



monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType slave
set_faction_standing papal_states scotland 9.9
set_faction_standing scotland papal_states 9.9
set_faction_standing papal_states saxons 9.9
set_faction_standing saxons papal_states 9.9
set_faction_standing papal_states portugal 9.9
set_faction_standing portugal papal_states 9.9
set_faction_standing papal_states sicily 9.9
set_faction_standing sicily papal_states 9.9
set_faction_standing papal_states spain 9.9
set_faction_standing spain papal_states 9.9
terminate_monitor
end_monitor 


















;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;
;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;Последствия Ереси;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;
;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;

monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType slave
;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;Остланд;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;
	if I_CompareCounter ostland_heresy = 1
	and I_CompareCounter ostland_heresy_start = 0
		set_counter ostland_heresy_start 1
		set_religion byzantium chaos
		change_population_religion byzantium chaos 100 catholic
		historic_event heresy_ostland
		add_money byzantium 50000
		set_faction_standing byzantium england -9.9	
		set_faction_standing byzantium hre -9.9	
		set_faction_standing byzantium russia -9.9	
		set_faction_standing byzantium poland -9.9	
		set_faction_standing papal_states byzantium -9.9	
		set_faction_standing byzantium papal_states -9.9	
		set_faction_standing england byzantium -9.9	
		set_faction_standing hre byzantium -9.9	
		set_faction_standing russia byzantium -9.9	
		set_faction_standing poland byzantium -9.9
		set_faction_standing kalmar_union byzantium -9.9
		set_faction_standing byzantium kalmar_union -9.9	
		console_command diplomatic_stance byzantium kalmar_union neutral
		console_command diplomatic_stance byzantium england neutral
		console_command diplomatic_stance byzantium hre neutral
		console_command diplomatic_stance byzantium russia neutral
		console_command diplomatic_stance byzantium poland neutral
		console_command diplomatic_stance byzantium papal_states neutral
		set_faction_standing byzantium spain 0.0
		set_faction_standing spain byzantium 0.0
		console_command diplomatic_stance byzantium spain neutral
		set_faction_standing byzantium france 0.0
		set_faction_standing france byzantium 0.0
		console_command diplomatic_stance byzantium france neutral
		set_faction_standing byzantium saxons 0.0
		set_faction_standing saxons byzantium 0.0
		console_command diplomatic_stance byzantium saxons neutral
		set_faction_standing byzantium milan 0.0
		set_faction_standing milan byzantium 0.0
		console_command diplomatic_stance byzantium milan neutral
		set_faction_standing byzantium sicily 0.0
		set_faction_standing sicily byzantium 0.0
		console_command diplomatic_stance byzantium sicily neutral
		set_faction_standing byzantium venice 0.0
		set_faction_standing venice byzantium 0.0
		console_command diplomatic_stance byzantium venice neutral
		set_faction_standing byzantium portugal 0.0
		set_faction_standing portugal byzantium 0.0
		console_command diplomatic_stance byzantium portugal neutral
		set_faction_standing byzantium scotland 0.0
		set_faction_standing scotland byzantium 0.0
		console_command diplomatic_stance byzantium scotland neutral
		console_command diplomatic_stance byzantium lithuania neutral
		console_command diplomatic_stance byzantium novgorod neutral
		console_command diplomatic_stance byzantium norway neutral
		console_command diplomatic_stance byzantium teutonic_order neutral
		set_faction_standing byzantium lithuania 0.0
		set_faction_standing byzantium novgorod 0.0
		set_faction_standing byzantium norway 0.0
		set_faction_standing byzantium teutonic_order 0.0
		set_faction_standing lithuania byzantium 0.0
		set_faction_standing novgorod byzantium 0.0
		set_faction_standing norway byzantium 0.0
		set_faction_standing teutonic_order byzantium 0.0
		console_command diplomatic_stance byzantium kalmar_union war
		console_command diplomatic_stance byzantium england war
		console_command diplomatic_stance byzantium hre war
		console_command diplomatic_stance byzantium russia war
		console_command diplomatic_stance byzantium poland war
		console_command diplomatic_stance byzantium papal_states war

		if I_CompareCounter talabakland_heresy = 0
			set_faction_standing byzantium spain -9.9
			set_faction_standing spain byzantium -9.9
			console_command diplomatic_stance byzantium spain war
		end_if	
		if I_CompareCounter ostermark_heresy = 0
			set_faction_standing byzantium france -9.9
			set_faction_standing france byzantium -9.9
			console_command diplomatic_stance byzantium france war
		end_if	
		if I_CompareCounter stirland_heresy = 0
			set_faction_standing byzantium saxons -9.9
			set_faction_standing saxons byzantium -9.9
			console_command diplomatic_stance byzantium saxons war
		end_if	
		if I_CompareCounter hochland_heresy = 0
			set_faction_standing byzantium milan -9.9
			set_faction_standing milan byzantium -9.9
			console_command diplomatic_stance byzantium milan war
		end_if	
		if I_CompareCounter nordland_heresy = 0
			set_faction_standing byzantium sicily -9.9
			set_faction_standing sicily byzantium -9.9
			console_command diplomatic_stance byzantium sicily war
		end_if	
		if I_CompareCounter averland_heresy = 0
			set_faction_standing byzantium venice -9.9
			set_faction_standing venice byzantium -9.9
			console_command diplomatic_stance byzantium venice war
		end_if	
		if I_CompareCounter viciland_heresy = 0
			set_faction_standing byzantium portugal -9.9
			set_faction_standing portugal byzantium -9.9
			console_command diplomatic_stance byzantium portugal war
		end_if	
		if I_CompareCounter middenland_heresy = 0
			set_faction_standing byzantium scotland -9.9
			set_faction_standing scotland byzantium -9.9
			console_command diplomatic_stance byzantium scotland war
		end_if	

		destroy_units byzantium Knight wolf mounted
		destroy_units byzantium Reiksguard
		destroy_units byzantium Black guard Morr
		destroy_units byzantium Knight Orden Panther
		destroy_units byzantium Knight Orden blazing sun
		destroy_buildings byzantium temple_sigmar true
		destroy_buildings byzantium white_wolf_order true
		destroy_buildings byzantium reiksguard_order true
		destroy_buildings byzantium panther_order true
		destroy_buildings byzantium morr_order true
		destroy_buildings byzantium blazing_sun_order true
		if I_EventCounter chaos_union = 0
			generate_random_counter    ostland_chaos_god 1 4
				if I_EventCounter ostland_chaos_god = 1
					set_faction_banner
						faction byzantium
						banner lithuania
					end_set_faction_banner
					console_command diplomatic_stance byzantium lithuania allied
					set_faction_standing byzantium lithuania 9.9
					set_faction_standing lithuania byzantium 9.9
					console_command diplomatic_stance byzantium novgorod war
					set_faction_standing byzantium novgorod -9.9
					set_faction_standing novgorod byzantium -9.9
				end_if
				if I_EventCounter ostland_chaos_god = 2
					set_faction_banner
						faction byzantium
						banner norway
					end_set_faction_banner
					console_command diplomatic_stance byzantium norway allied
					set_faction_standing byzantium norway 9.9
					set_faction_standing norway byzantium 9.9
					console_command diplomatic_stance byzantium teutonic_order war
					set_faction_standing byzantium teutonic_order -9.9
					set_faction_standing teutonic_order byzantium -9.9
				end_if
				if I_EventCounter ostland_chaos_god = 3
					set_faction_banner
						faction byzantium
						banner teutonic_order
					end_set_faction_banner
					console_command diplomatic_stance byzantium teutonic_order allied
					set_faction_standing byzantium teutonic_order 9.9
					set_faction_standing teutonic_order byzantium 9.9
					console_command diplomatic_stance byzantium norway war
					set_faction_standing byzantium norway -9.9
					set_faction_standing norway byzantium -9.9
				end_if
				if I_EventCounter ostland_chaos_god = 4
					set_faction_banner
						faction byzantium
						banner novgorod
					end_set_faction_banner
					console_command diplomatic_stance byzantium novgorod allied
					set_faction_standing byzantium novgorod 9.9
					set_faction_standing novgorod byzantium 9.9
					console_command diplomatic_stance byzantium lithuania war
					set_faction_standing byzantium lithuania -9.9
					set_faction_standing lithuania byzantium -9.9
				end_if
		end_if
		if I_EventCounter chaos_union = 1
			set_faction_banner
				faction byzantium
				banner denmark
			end_set_faction_banner
			console_command diplomatic_stance byzantium lithuania allied
			console_command diplomatic_stance byzantium novgorod allied
			console_command diplomatic_stance byzantium norway allied
			console_command diplomatic_stance byzantium teutonic_order allied
			set_faction_standing byzantium lithuania 9.9
			set_faction_standing byzantium novgorod 9.9
			set_faction_standing byzantium norway 9.9
			set_faction_standing byzantium teutonic_order 9.9
			set_faction_standing lithuania byzantium 9.9
			set_faction_standing novgorod byzantium 9.9
			set_faction_standing norway byzantium 9.9
			set_faction_standing teutonic_order byzantium 9.9
		end_if
	end_if	
;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;талабакленд;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;
	if I_CompareCounter talabakland_heresy = 1
	and I_CompareCounter talabakland_heresy_start = 0
		set_counter talabakland_heresy_start 1
		set_religion spain chaos
		change_population_religion spain chaos 100 catholic
		historic_event heresy_talabakland
		add_money spain 50000
		set_faction_standing spain england -9.9	
		set_faction_standing spain hre -9.9	
		set_faction_standing spain russia -9.9	
		set_faction_standing spain poland -9.9	
		set_faction_standing england spain -9.9	
		set_faction_standing spain papal_states -9.9	
		set_faction_standing papal_states spain -9.9	
		set_faction_standing hre spain -9.9	
		set_faction_standing russia spain -9.9	
		set_faction_standing poland spain -9.9
		set_faction_standing kalmar_union spain -9.9
		set_faction_standing spain kalmar_union -9.9	
		console_command diplomatic_stance spain kalmar_union neutral
		console_command diplomatic_stance spain england neutral
		console_command diplomatic_stance spain hre neutral
		console_command diplomatic_stance spain russia neutral
		console_command diplomatic_stance spain poland neutral
		console_command diplomatic_stance spain papal_states neutral
		set_faction_standing spain byzantium 0.0
		set_faction_standing byzantium spain 0.0
		console_command diplomatic_stance spain byzantium neutral
		set_faction_standing spain france 0.0
		set_faction_standing france spain 0.0
		console_command diplomatic_stance spain france neutral
		set_faction_standing spain saxons 0.0
		set_faction_standing saxons spain 0.0
		console_command diplomatic_stance spain saxons neutral
		set_faction_standing spain milan 0.0
		set_faction_standing milan spain 0.0
		console_command diplomatic_stance spain milan neutral
		set_faction_standing spain sicily 0.0
		set_faction_standing sicily spain 0.0
		console_command diplomatic_stance spain sicily neutral
		set_faction_standing spain venice 0.0
		set_faction_standing venice spain 0.0
		console_command diplomatic_stance spain venice neutral
		set_faction_standing spain portugal 0.0
		set_faction_standing portugal spain 0.0
		console_command diplomatic_stance spain portugal neutral
		set_faction_standing spain scotland 0.0
		set_faction_standing scotland spain 0.0
		console_command diplomatic_stance spain scotland neutral
		console_command diplomatic_stance spain lithuania neutral
		console_command diplomatic_stance spain novgorod neutral
		console_command diplomatic_stance spain norway neutral
		console_command diplomatic_stance spain teutonic_order neutral
		console_command diplomatic_stance spain england war
		console_command diplomatic_stance spain hre war
		console_command diplomatic_stance spain russia war
		console_command diplomatic_stance spain poland war
		console_command diplomatic_stance spain papal_states war
		console_command diplomatic_stance spain kalmar_union war
		set_faction_standing spain lithuania 0.0
		set_faction_standing spain novgorod 0.0
		set_faction_standing spain norway 0.0
		set_faction_standing spain teutonic_order 0.0
		set_faction_standing lithuania spain 0.0
		set_faction_standing novgorod spain 0.0
		set_faction_standing norway spain 0.0
		set_faction_standing teutonic_order spain 0.0

		if I_CompareCounter ostland_heresy = 0
			set_faction_standing spain byzantium -9.9
			set_faction_standing byzantium spain -9.9
			console_command diplomatic_stance spain byzantium war
		end_if	
		if I_CompareCounter ostermark_heresy = 0
			set_faction_standing spain france -9.9
			set_faction_standing france spain -9.9
			console_command diplomatic_stance spain france war
		end_if	
		if I_CompareCounter stirland_heresy = 0
			set_faction_standing spain saxons -9.9
			set_faction_standing saxons spain -9.9
			console_command diplomatic_stance spain saxons war
		end_if

			set_faction_standing spain milan -9.9
			set_faction_standing milan spain -9.9
			console_command diplomatic_stance spain milan war
		end_if	
		if I_CompareCounter nordland_heresy = 0
			set_faction_standing spain sicily -9.9
			set_faction_standing sicily spain -9.9
			console_command diplomatic_stance spain sicily war
		end_if	
		if I_CompareCounter averland_heresy = 0
			set_faction_standing spain venice -9.9
			set_faction_standing venice spain -9.9
			console_command diplomatic_stance spain venice war
		end_if	
		if I_CompareCounter viciland_heresy = 0
			set_faction_standing spain portugal -9.9
			set_faction_standing portugal spain -9.9
			console_command diplomatic_stance spain portugal war
		end_if	
		if I_CompareCounter middenland_heresy = 0
			set_faction_standing spain scotland -9.9
			set_faction_standing scotland spain -9.9
			console_command diplomatic_stance spain scotland war
		end_if	

		destroy_units spain Knight wolf mounted
		destroy_units spain Reiksguard
		destroy_units spain Black guard Morr
		destroy_units spain Knight Orden Panther
		destroy_units spain Knight Orden blazing sun
		destroy_buildings spain temple_sigmar true
		destroy_buildings spain white_wolf_order true
		destroy_buildings spain reiksguard_order true
		destroy_buildings spain panther_order true
		destroy_buildings spain morr_order true
		destroy_buildings spain blazing_sun_order true
		if I_EventCounter chaos_union = 0
			generate_random_counter    talabakland_chaos_god 1 4
				if I_EventCounter talabakland_chaos_god = 1
					set_faction_banner
						faction spain
						banner lithuania
					end_set_faction_banner
					console_command diplomatic_stance spain lithuania allied
					set_faction_standing spain lithuania 9.9
					set_faction_standing lithuania spain 9.9
					console_command diplomatic_stance spain novgorod war
					set_faction_standing spain novgorod -9.9
					set_faction_standing novgorod spain -9.9
				end_if
				if I_EventCounter talabakland_chaos_god = 2
					set_faction_banner
						faction spain
						banner norway
					end_set_faction_banner
					console_command diplomatic_stance spain norway allied
					set_faction_standing spain norway 9.9
					set_faction_standing norway spain 9.9
					console_command diplomatic_stance spain teutonic_order war
					set_faction_standing spain teutonic_order -9.9
					set_faction_standing teutonic_order spain -9.9
				end_if
				if I_EventCounter talabakland_chaos_god = 3
					set_faction_banner
						faction spain
						banner teutonic_order
					end_set_faction_banner
					console_command diplomatic_stance spain teutonic_order allied
					set_faction_standing spain teutonic_order 9.9
					set_faction_standing teutonic_order spain 9.9
					console_command diplomatic_stance spain norway war
					set_faction_standing spain norway -9.9
					set_faction_standing norway spain -9.9
				end_if
				if I_EventCounter talabakland_chaos_god = 4
					set_faction_banner
						faction spain
						banner novgorod
					end_set_faction_banner
					console_command diplomatic_stance spain novgorod allied
					set_faction_standing spain novgorod 9.9
					set_faction_standing novgorod spain 9.9
					console_command diplomatic_stance spain lithuania war
					set_faction_standing spain lithuania -9.9
					set_faction_standing lithuania spain -9.9
				end_if
		end_if
		if I_EventCounter chaos_union = 1
			set_faction_banner
				faction spain
				banner denmark
			end_set_faction_banner
			console_command diplomatic_stance spain lithuania allied
			console_command diplomatic_stance spain novgorod allied
			console_command diplomatic_stance spain norway allied
			console_command diplomatic_stance spain teutonic_order allied

			set_faction_standing spain novgorod 9.9
			set_faction_standing spain norway 9.9

		console_command diplomatic_stance saxons kalmar_union war

		if I_CompareCounter ostland_heresy = 0
			set_faction_standing saxons byzantium -9.9
			set_faction_standing byzantium saxons -9.9
			console_command diplomatic_stance saxons byzantium war
		end_if	
		if I_CompareCounter talabakland_heresy = 0
			set_faction_standing saxons spain -9.9
			set_faction_standing spain saxons -9.9
			console_command diplomatic_stance saxons spain war
		end_if	
		if I_CompareCounter ostermark_heresy = 0
			set_faction_standing saxons france -9.9
			set_faction_standing france saxons -9.9
			console_command diplomatic_stance saxons france war
		end_if	
		if I_CompareCounter hochland_heresy = 0
			set_faction_standing saxons milan -9.9
			set_faction_standing milan saxons -9.9
			console_command diplomatic_stance saxons milan war
		end_if	
		if I_CompareCounter nordland_heresy = 0
			set_faction_standing saxons sicily -9.9
			set_faction_standing sicily saxons -9.9
			console_command diplomatic_stance saxons sicily war
		end_if	
		if I_CompareCounter averland_heresy = 0
			set_faction_standing saxons venice -9.9
			set_faction_standing venice saxons -9.9
			console_command diplomatic_stance saxons venice war
		end_if	
		if I_CompareCounter viciland_heresy = 0
			set_faction_standing saxons portugal -9.9
			set_faction_standing portugal saxons -9.9
			console_command diplomatic_stance saxons portugal war
		end_if	
		if I_CompareCounter middenland_heresy = 0
			set_faction_standing saxons scotland -9.9
			set_faction_standing scotland saxons -9.9
			console_command diplomatic_stance saxons scotland war
		end_if	

		destroy_units saxons Knight wolf mounted
		destroy_units saxons Reiksguard
		destroy_units saxons Black guard Morr
		destroy_units saxons Knight Orden Panther
		destroy_units saxons Knight Orden blazing sun
		destroy_buildings saxons temple_sigmar true
		destroy_buildings saxons white_wolf_order true
		destroy_buildings saxons reiksguard_order true
		destroy_buildings saxons panther_order true
		destroy_buildings saxons morr_order true
		destroy_buildings saxons blazing_sun_order true
		if I_EventCounter chaos_union = 0
			generate_random_counter    stirland_chaos_god 1 4
				if I_EventCounter stirland_chaos_god = 1
					set_faction_banner
						faction saxons
						banner lithuania
					end_set_faction_banner
					console_command diplomatic_stance saxons lithuania allied
					set_faction_standing saxons lithuania 9.9
					set_faction_standing lithuania saxons 9.9
					console_command diplomatic_stance saxons novgorod war
					set_faction_standing saxons novgorod -9.9
					set_faction_standing novgorod saxons -9.9
				end_if
				if I_EventCounter stirland_chaos_god = 2
					set_faction_banner
						faction saxons
						banner norway
					end_set_faction_banner
					console_command diplomatic_stance saxons norway allied
					set_faction_standing saxons norway 9.9
					set_faction_standing norway saxons 9.9
					console_command diplomatic_stance saxons teutonic_order war
					set_faction_standing saxons teutonic_order -9.9
					set_faction_standing teutonic_order saxons -9.9
				end_if
				if I_EventCounter stirland_chaos_god = 3
					set_faction_banner
						faction saxons
						banner teutonic_order
					end_set_faction_banner
					console_command diplomatic_stance saxons teutonic_order allied
					set_faction_standing saxons teutonic_order 9.9
					set_faction_standing teutonic_order saxons 9.9
					console_command diplomatic_stance saxons norway war
					set_faction_standing saxons norway -9.9
					set_faction_standing norway saxons -9.9
				end_if
				if I_EventCounter stirland_chaos_god = 4
					set_faction_banner
						faction saxons
						banner novgorod
					end_set_faction_banner
					console_command diplomatic_stance saxons novgorod allied
					set_faction_standing saxons novgorod 9.9
					set_faction_standing novgorod saxons 9.9
					console_command diplomatic_stance saxons lithuania war
					set_faction_standing saxons lithuania -9.9
					set_faction_standing lithuania saxons -9.9
				end_if
		end_if
		if I_EventCounter chaos_union = 1
			set_faction_banner
				faction saxons
				banner denmark
			end_set_faction_banner
			console_command diplomatic_stance saxons lithuania allied
			console_command diplomatic_stance saxons novgorod allied
			console_command diplomatic_stance saxons norway allied
			console_command diplomatic_stance saxons teutonic_order allied
			set_faction_standing saxons lithuania 9.9
			set_faction_standing saxons novgorod 9.9
			set_faction_standing saxons norway 9.9
			set_faction_standing saxons teutonic_order 9.9
			set_faction_standing lithuania saxons 9.9
			set_faction_standing novgorod saxons 9.9
			set_faction_standing norway saxons 9.9
			set_faction_standing teutonic_order saxons 9.9
		end_if
	end_if	
;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;хочланд;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;
	if I_CompareCounter hochland_heresy = 1
	and I_CompareCounter hochland_heresy_start = 0
		set_counter hochland_heresy_start 1
		set_religion milan chaos
		change_population_religion milan chaos 100 catholic
		historic_event heresy_hochland
		add_money milan 50000
		set_faction_standing milan england -9.9	
		set_faction_standing milan hre -9.9	
		set_faction_standing milan russia -9.9	
		set_faction_standing milan poland -9.9	
		set_faction_standing england milan -9.9	
		set_faction_standing milan papal_states -9.9	
		set_faction_standing papal_states milan -9.9	
		set_faction_standing hre milan -9.9	
		set_faction_standing russia milan -9.9	
		set_faction_standing poland milan -9.9
		set_faction_standing kalmar_union milan -9.9
		set_faction_standing milan kalmar_union -9.9	
		console_command diplomatic_stance milan kalmar_union neutral
		console_command diplomatic_stance milan england neutral
		console_command diplomatic_stance milan hre neutral
		console_command diplomatic_stance milan russia neutral
		console_command diplomatic_stance milan poland neutral
		console_command diplomatic_stance milan papal_states neutral
		set_faction_standing milan byzantium 0.0
		set_faction_standing byzantium milan 0.0

		set_faction_standing england venice -9.9

		set_faction_standing papal_states venice -9.9	
		set_faction_standing hre venice -9.9	
		set_faction_standing russia venice -9.9	
		set_faction_standing poland venice -9.9
		set_faction_standing kalmar_union venice -9.9
		set_faction_standing venice kalmar_union -9.9	
		console_command diplomatic_stance venice kalmar_union neutral
		console_command diplomatic_stance venice england neutral
		console_command diplomatic_stance venice hre neutral
		console_command diplomatic_stance venice russia neutral
		console_command diplomatic_stance venice poland neutral
		console_command diplomatic_stance venice papal_states neutral
		set_faction_standing venice byzantium 0.0
		set_faction_standing byzantium venice 0.0
		console_command diplomatic_stance venice byzantium neutral
		set_faction_standing venice spain 0.0
		set_faction_standing spain venice 0.0

		set_faction_standing france venice 0.0

		set_faction_standing saxons venice 0.0
		console_command diplomatic_stance venice saxons neutral

		console_command diplomatic_stance venice milan neutral

		set_faction_standing sicily venice 0.0
		console_command diplomatic_stance venice sicily neutral

		set_faction_standing portugal venice 0.0
		console_command diplomatic_stance venice portugal neutral
		set_faction_standing venice scotland 0.0
		set_faction_standing scotland venice 0.0
		console_command diplomatic_stance venice scotland neutral
		console_command diplomatic_stance venice lithuania neutral
		console_command diplomatic_stance venice novgorod neutral
		console_command diplomatic_stance venice norway neutral
		console_command diplomatic_stance venice teutonic_order neutral
		console_command diplomatic_stance venice england war
		console_command diplomatic_stance venice hre war
		console_command diplomatic_stance venice russia war
		console_command diplomatic_stance venice poland war
		console_command diplomatic_stance venice papal_states war
		console_command diplomatic_stance venice kalmar_union war
		set_faction_standing venice lithuania 0.0
		set_faction_standing venice novgorod 0.0
		set_faction_standing venice norway 0.0
		set_faction_standing venice teutonic_order 0.0
		set_faction_standing lithuania venice 0.0
		set_faction_standing novgorod venice 0.0
		set_faction_standing norway venice 0.0
		set_faction_standing teutonic_order venice 0.0

		if I_CompareCounter ostland_heresy = 0
			set_faction_standing venice byzantium -9.9
			set_faction_standing byzantium venice -9.9
			console_command diplomatic_stance venice byzantium war
		end_if	
		if I_CompareCounter talabakland_heresy = 0
			set_faction_standing venice spain -9.9
			set_faction_standing spain venice -9.9
			console_command diplomatic_stance venice spain war
		end_if	
		if I_CompareCounter ostermark_heresy = 0
			set_faction_standing venice france -9.9
			set_faction_standing france venice -9.9
			console_command diplomatic_stance venice france war
		end_if	
		if I_CompareCounter stirland_heresy = 0
			set_faction_standing venice saxons -9.9
			set_faction_standing saxons venice -9.9
			console_command diplomatic_stance venice saxons war
		end_if	
		if I_CompareCounter hochland_heresy = 0
			set_faction_standing venice milan -9.9
			set_faction_standing milan venice -9.9
			console_command diplomatic_stance venice milan war
		end_if	
		if I_CompareCounter nordland_heresy = 0
			set_faction_standing venice sicily -9.9
			set_faction_standing sicily venice -9.9
			console_command diplomatic_stance venice sicily war
		end_if	
		if I_CompareCounter viciland_heresy = 0
			set_faction_standing venice portugal -9.9
			set_faction_standing portugal venice -9.9
			console_command diplomatic_stance venice portugal war
		end_if	
		if I_CompareCounter middenland_heresy = 0
			set_faction_standing venice scotland -9.9
			set_faction_standing scotland venice -9.9
			console_command diplomatic_stance venice scotland war
		end_if	

		destroy_units venice Knight wolf mounted
		destroy_units venice Reiksguard
		destroy_units venice Black guard Morr
		destroy_units venice Knight Orden Panther
		destroy_units venice Knight Orden blazing sun
		destroy_buildings venice temple_sigmar true
		destroy_buildings venice white_wolf_order true
		destroy_buildings venice reiksguard_order true
		destroy_buildings venice panther_order true
		destroy_buildings venice morr_order true
		destroy_buildings venice blazing_sun_order true
		if I_EventCounter chaos_union = 0
			generate_random_counter    averland_chaos_god 1 4
				if I_EventCounter averland_chaos_god = 1
					set_faction_banner
						faction venice
						banner lithuania
					end_set_faction_banner
					console_command diplomatic_stance venice lithuania allied
					set_faction_standing venice lithuania 9.9
					set_faction_standing lithuania venice 9.9
					console_command diplomatic_stance venice novgorod war
					set_faction_standing venice novgorod -9.9
					set_faction_standing novgorod venice -9.9
				end_if
				if I_EventCounter averland_chaos_god = 2
					set_faction_banner
						faction venice
						banner norway
					end_set_faction_banner
					console_command diplomatic_stance venice norway allied
					set_faction_standing venice norway 9.9
					set_faction_standing norway venice 9.9
					console_command diplomatic_stance venice teutonic_order war
					set_faction_standing venice teutonic_order -9.9
					set_faction_standing teutonic_order venice -9.9
				end_if
				if I_EventCounter averland_chaos_god = 3
					set_faction_banner
						faction venice
						banner teutonic_order
					end_set_faction_banner
					console_command diplomatic_stance venice teutonic_order allied
					set_faction_standing venice teutonic_order 9.9
					set_faction_standing teutonic_order venice 9.9
					console_command diplomatic_stance venice norway war
					set_faction_standing venice norway -9.9
					set_faction_standing norway venice -9.9
				end_if
				if I_EventCounter averland_chaos_god = 4
					set_faction_banner
						faction venice
						banner novgorod
					end_set_faction_banner
					console_command diplomatic_stance venice novgorod allied
					set_faction_standing venice novgorod 9.9
					set_faction_standing novgorod venice 9.9
					console_command diplomatic_stance venice lithuania war
					set_faction_standing venice lithuania -9.9
					set_faction_standing lithuania venice -9.9
				end_if
		end_if
		if I_EventCounter chaos_union = 1
			set_faction_banner
				faction venice
				banner denmark
			end_set_faction_banner
			console_command diplomatic_stance venice lithuania allied
			console_command diplomatic_stance venice novgorod allied
			console_command diplomatic_stance venice norway allied
			console_command diplomatic_stance venice teutonic_order allied
			set_faction_standing venice lithuania 9.9
			set_faction_standing venice novgorod 9.9
			set_faction_standing venice norway 9.9
			set_faction_standing venice teutonic_order 9.9
			set_faction_standing lithuania venice 9.9
			set_faction_standing novgorod venice 9.9
			set_faction_standing norway venice 9.9
			set_faction_standing teutonic_order venice 9.9
		end_if
	end_if

	and I_CompareCounter middenland_heresy_start = 0

				end_if
				if I_EventCounter middenland_chaos_god = 2
					set_faction_banner
						faction scotland
						banner norway
					end_set_faction_banner
					console_command diplomatic_stance scotland norway allied
					set_faction_standing scotland norway 9.9
					set_faction_standing norway scotland 9.9
					console_command diplomatic_stance scotland teutonic_order war
					set_faction_standing scotland teutonic_order -9.9
					set_faction_standing teutonic_order scotland -9.9
				end_if
				if I_EventCounter middenland_chaos_god = 3
					set_faction_banner
						faction scotland
						banner teutonic_order
					end_set_faction_banner
					console_command diplomatic_stance scotland teutonic_order allied
					set_faction_standing scotland teutonic_order 9.9
					set_faction_standing teutonic_order scotland 9.9
					console_command diplomatic_stance scotland norway war
					set_faction_standing scotland norway -9.9
					set_faction_standing norway scotland -9.9
				end_if
				if I_EventCounter middenland_chaos_god = 4
					set_faction_banner
						faction scotland
						banner novgorod
					end_set_faction_banner
					console_command diplomatic_stance scotland novgorod allied
					set_faction_standing scotland novgorod 9.9
					set_faction_standing novgorod scotland 9.9
					console_command diplomatic_stance scotland lithuania war
					set_faction_standing scotland lithuania -9.9
					set_faction_standing lithuania scotland -9.9
				end_if
		end_if
		if I_EventCounter chaos_union = 1
			set_faction_banner
				faction scotland
				banner denmark
			end_set_faction_banner
			console_command diplomatic_stance scotland lithuania allied
			console_command diplomatic_stance scotland novgorod allied
			console_command diplomatic_stance scotland norway allied
			console_command diplomatic_stance scotland teutonic_order allied
			set_faction_standing scotland lithuania 9.9
			set_faction_standing scotland novgorod 9.9
			set_faction_standing scotland norway 9.9
			set_faction_standing scotland teutonic_order 9.9
			set_faction_standing lithuania scotland 9.9
			set_faction_standing novgorod scotland 9.9
			set_faction_standing norway scotland 9.9
			set_faction_standing teutonic_order scotland 9.9
		end_if
	end_if	
end_monitor


;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;
;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;Конец Ереси;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;

monitor_event BecomesFactionLeader FactionType byzantium
and I_CompareCounter ostland_heresy = 1
and I_CompareCounter ostland_heresy_start = 1
set_counter ostland_heresy_end 1
set_event_counter ostland_chaos_god 0
end_monitor

and I_CompareCounter talabakland_heresy = 1
and I_CompareCounter talabakland_heresy_start = 1

	if I_LocalFaction spain
		set_faction_banner
			faction spain
			banner spain
		end_set_faction_banner
				if I_EventCounter talabakland_chaos_god = 1
					set_faction_banner

					end_set_faction_banner
				end_if

					end_set_faction_banner

				unit		Gor	exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
				unit		Gor Spear Thrower	exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
				unit		Gor Spear Thrower	exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
		end
end_if
if I_EventCounter beastmans_10 = 1
and RandomPercent < 6

			add_events
				event	emergent_faction	egypt
				date	0
			end_add_events
		spawn_army 
				faction egypt
				character	random_name, named character, x 104, y 79, battle_model Bestigor
				traits	LoyaltyStarter 1, Loyal 4
				unit		Bestigor bodyguard			exp 9 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
				unit		Gor spear				exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
				unit		Gor	exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
		end
end_if

end_monitor

and not I_WorldwideAncillaryExists diploma
if not I_IsFactionAIControlled hre

end_if

    and I_SettlementOwner Middenheim = scotland
    and not I_WorldwideAncillaryExists molbel
    generate_random_counter arulrik_election 1 10	
	if I_EventCounter arulrik_election = 5
	spawn_army 
				faction scotland
				character	random_name, named character, age 50, x 44, y 104, battle_model emil1
				traits	Arulrik 1, GoodAttacker 1, PublicFaith 2, man 1
					unit		Knight wolf mounted bodyguard				exp 9 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
		end

	end_if
	end_monitor

    and I_SettlementOwner Karak_Kadrin = poland
    generate_random_counter troll_slayer 0 200
	if I_EventCounter troll_slayer = 1
	spawn_army 
				faction poland
				character	random_name, named character, age 30, x 145, y 72, battle_model Slayers, portrait slayer_1
				traits	Slayer 1, Berserker 3, GoodCommander 1, Bloodthirsty 1, gnom 1
					unit		Gotrek Slayers				exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
		end
		historic_event NEW_TROLL_SLAYER false factions { poland, }
	end_if
	if I_EventCounter troll_slayer = 15
	spawn_army 
				faction poland
				character	random_name, named character, age 30, x 145, y 72, battle_model Slayers, portrait slayer_2
				traits	Slayer 1, Berserker 3, GoodCommander 1, Bloodthirsty 1, gnom 1
					unit		Gotrek Slayers				exp 1 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
		end
		historic_event NEW_TROLL_SLAYER false factions { poland, }
	end_if
	if I_EventCounter troll_slayer = 30
	spawn_army 
				faction poland
				character	random_name, named character, age 30, x 145, y 72, battle_model Slayers, portrait slayer_3
				traits	Slayer 1, Berserker 3, GoodCommander 1, Bloodthirsty 1, gnom 1
					unit		Gotrek Slayers				exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
		end
		historic_event NEW_TROLL_SLAYER false factions { poland, }
	end_if
	if I_EventCounter troll_slayer = 45
	spawn_army 
				faction poland

				traits	Slayer 1, Berserker 3, GoodCommander 1, Bloodthirsty 1, gnom 1
					unit		Gotrek Slayers				exp 3 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0

				faction poland

				traits	Slayer 1, Berserker 3, GoodCommander 1, Bloodthirsty 1, gnom 1
					unit		Gotrek Slayers				exp 4 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
		end

	end_if
	if I_EventCounter troll_slayer = 1
	spawn_army 
				faction poland
				character	random_name, named character, age 30, x 145, y 72, battle_model Slayers, portrait slayer_6
				traits	Slayer 1, Berserker 3, GoodCommander 1, Bloodthirsty 1, gnom 1

	if I_EventCounter troll_slayer = 50

				character	random_name, named character, age 30, x 145, y 72, battle_model Slayers, portrait slayer_7

;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;Вождь диких орков;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;
;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;
		add_events
			event	counter	SAVAGE_LEADER_LIVE
	 		date	0
	 	end_add_events
		
		set_event_counter SAVAGE_LEADER_LIVE 1


declare_counter SAVAGE_EX
set_counter SAVAGE_EX 0

monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType slave

if  I_WorldwideAncillaryExists dubvo
and I_CompareCounter SAVAGE_EX = 0
set_event_counter SAVAGE_LEADER_LIVE 1
set_counter SAVAGE_EX 1
end_if

if  not I_WorldwideAncillaryExists dubvo
and I_CompareCounter SAVAGE_EX = 1
set_event_counter SAVAGE_LEADER_LIVE 0
set_counter SAVAGE_EX 0
historic_event SAVAGE_IS_DEAD
destroy_units turks Savage Orcs boar boyz
destroy_units turks Savage Orcs boyz
destroy_units turks Savage Orcs arrer
end_if
end_monitor




monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType turks
if  not I_WorldwideAncillaryExists dubvo
    generate_random_counter SAVAGE_ELECTION 1 100

					unit		Savage Orcs boar boyz bodyguard				exp 9 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
		end

	end_if
	if I_EventCounter SAVAGE_ELECTION = 8

	if I_EventCounter SAVAGE_ELECTION = 9

	if I_EventCounter SAVAGE_ELECTION = 10

	end_monitor

		declare_counter silvania_resurected
		set_counter silvania_resurected 0

		monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType slave
		if I_NumberOfSettlements hungary = 0
		and RandomPercent < 51
		and not I_CharacterExists Mannfred Von_Carstein
		and not I_CharacterExists Markus Von_Carstein
		inc_counter silvania_resurected 1
		end_if

		if I_CompareCounter silvania_resurected >= 15
		and I_NumberOfSettlements hungary = 0
		and not I_CharacterExists Mannfred Von_Carstein
		and not I_CharacterExists Markus Von_Carstein

		date 0

monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal
and  I_TurnNumber = 49
and  I_IsFactionAIControlled teutonic_order
and  I_IsFactionAIControlled lithuania
and  I_IsFactionAIControlled novgorod
and  I_IsFactionAIControlled norway
and  I_IsFactionAIControlled england
and  I_IsFactionAIControlled russia
and  I_IsFactionAIControlled poland
and  I_IsFactionAIControlled turks
and  I_IsFactionAIControlled hungary
and  I_IsFactionAIControlled moors
and  I_IsFactionAIControlled egypt
and  I_IsFactionAIControlled papal_states
and  I_IsFactionAIControlled kalmar_union
set_counter bretonia 1
terminate_monitor
end_monitor

and I_TurnNumber = 50
and I_CompareCounter bretonia = 0
and  I_IsFactionAIControlled hre

and I_NumberOfSettlements hre > 0
historic_event bretonia false factions { southern_european, }

monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal
and I_LocalFaction teutonic_order
and I_CompareCounter money < 18
and  I_SettlementOwner Fort_of_phoenix_king = teutonic_order	
and  I_SettlementOwner Salzmund = teutonic_order
and  I_SettlementOwner Dietershafen = teutonic_order

set_faction_standing mongols teutonic_order 9.9
set_faction_standing teutonic_order mongols 9.9

set_counter money 2
if I_CompareCounter money >= 18
console_command diplomatic_stance teutonic_order mongols war
if I_NumberOfSettlements lithuania > 0
console_command diplomatic_stance lithuania mongols allied
set_faction_standing mongols lithuania 9.9
set_faction_standing lithuania mongols 9.9
end_if
end_if
terminate_monitor
end_monitor

monitor_event FactionTurnEnd FactionIsLocal
and I_TurnNumber = 10
and I_IsFactionAIControlled mongols
and I_IsFactionAIControlled lithuania

console_command diplomatic_stance teutonic_order mongols allied
end_if
if I_EventCounter darkelf = 2
console_command diplomatic_stance lithuania mongols allied
end_if
terminate_monitor
end_monitor

set_counter darkelf 0
declare_counter darkelfs
set_counter darkelfs 0

	and not I_SettlementOwner Norden = mongols		
	
	
	if I_CharacterExists darkaa
	and not I_SettlementOwner Norden = mongols
		siege_settlement darkaa,  Norden, maintain
		wait 3
	end_if
	if I_CharacterExists dark1aa
	and not I_SettlementOwner Norden = mongols
		siege_settlement dark1aa,  Norden, attack
		wait 3
	end_if	
	
	terminate_monitor
	end_monitor
	
	
	declare_counter Salkalten
set_counter Salkalten 0

monitor_event FactionTurnEnd FactionIsLocal
and I_TurnNumber = 6
and I_IsFactionAIControlled mongols

spawn_army 
				faction mongols
				character	random_name, named character, x 69, y 122,  label darkar  ;command 8, dread 9, loyalty 7, piety 1
				traits	LoyaltyStarter 1, ReligionStarter 1, Upright 2, GoodAttacker 1, PublicFaith 2, man 1, GoodCommander 4
unit		Cold one knights bodyguard				exp 3 armour 0 weapon_lvl 1
unit		Dark elf Executioner				exp 3 armour 3 weapon_lvl 1
unit		tortoise ram DE 			exp 3 armour 3 weapon_lvl 1
unit		Dark elfs Warriors 				exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
unit		DE mage 				exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
unit		Dark elfs corsairs				exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
unit		Dark elf Executioner				exp 3 armour 3 weapon_lvl 1
unit		tortoise ram DE 			exp 3 armour 3 weapon_lvl 1
unit		Dark elfs Warriors 				exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
unit		Dark elf Shades 				exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
unit		Dark elfs corsairs				exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
unit		Dark elfs Warriors 				exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
unit		Dark elf Shades 				exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
unit		Dark elfs corsairs				exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
unit		Dark elfs corsairs				exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
unit		Dark elfs Warriors 				exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
unit		Dark elf Shades 				exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
unit		Dark elfs corsairs				exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
end


set_counter Salkalten 1

terminate_monitor
end_monitor


monitor_event FactionTurnEnd FactionIsLocal
	and I_CompareCounter Salkalten = 1
	and not I_SettlementOwner Salkalten = mongols		
	

	if I_CharacterExists darkar
	and not I_SettlementOwner Salkalten = mongols
		siege_settlement darkar, Salkalten, attack
		end_if
terminate_monitor
	end_monitor

;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;Bright Wizard;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;
;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;
		declare_counter Bright_Wizard
		set_counter Bright_Wizard 0

monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal
and RandomPercent = 1
and  I_IsFactionAIControlled teutonic_order
and  I_IsFactionAIControlled lithuania
and  I_IsFactionAIControlled novgorod
and  I_IsFactionAIControlled norway
and  I_IsFactionAIControlled england
and  I_IsFactionAIControlled russia
and  I_IsFactionAIControlled poland
and  I_IsFactionAIControlled turks
and  I_IsFactionAIControlled kalmar_union
and  I_IsFactionAIControlled hungary
and  I_IsFactionAIControlled moors
and  I_IsFactionAIControlled egypt
set_counter Bright_Wizard 1
terminate_monitor
end_monitor

monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal
and I_TurnNumber = 60
and  I_IsFactionAIControlled teutonic_order
and  I_IsFactionAIControlled lithuania
and  I_IsFactionAIControlled novgorod
and  I_IsFactionAIControlled norway
and  I_IsFactionAIControlled england
and  I_IsFactionAIControlled kalmar_union
and  I_IsFactionAIControlled russia
and  I_IsFactionAIControlled poland
and  I_IsFactionAIControlled turks
and  I_IsFactionAIControlled hungary
and  I_IsFactionAIControlled moors
and  I_IsFactionAIControlled egypt
set_counter Bright_Wizard 1
terminate_monitor
end_monitor

monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal
and RandomPercent = 5
and I_TurnNumber > 30
and I_CompareCounter Bright_Wizard = 0
and  I_IsFactionAIControlled hre
and  I_IsFactionAIControlled spain
and  I_IsFactionAIControlled scotland
and  I_IsFactionAIControlled portugal
and  I_IsFactionAIControlled venice
and  I_IsFactionAIControlled sicily
and  I_IsFactionAIControlled milan
and  I_IsFactionAIControlled byzantium
and  I_IsFactionAIControlled saxons
and  I_IsFactionAIControlled france
and  I_IsFactionAIControlled papal_states
and I_NumberOfSettlements hre > 0
and not I_SettlementOwner Altdorf = turks
and not I_SettlementOwner Altdorf = moors
and not I_SettlementOwner Altdorf = mongols
and not I_SettlementOwner Altdorf = poland
and not I_SettlementOwner Altdorf = england
and not I_SettlementOwner Altdorf = egypt
and not I_SettlementOwner Altdorf = teutonic_order
and not I_SettlementOwner Altdorf = lithuania
and not I_SettlementOwner Altdorf = norway
and not I_SettlementOwner Altdorf = slave
and not I_SettlementOwner Altdorf = novgorod
and not I_SettlementOwner Altdorf = denmark
and not I_SettlementOwner Altdorf = russia
and not I_SettlementOwner Altdorf = hungary
spawn_army 
				faction hre
				character	random_name, named character, x 34, y 72,  label hreBright_Wizard, direction S, battle_model Lord_Bright_Wizard, portrait Bright_Wizard_1
				traits	Bright_Wizard 1, man 1
unit		Bright Wizard				exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
end
terminate_monitor
end_monitor

and  I_IsFactionAIControlled papal_states
and I_NumberOfSettlements hre > 0
and not I_SettlementOwner Nuln = turks
and not I_SettlementOwner Nuln = moors
and not I_SettlementOwner Nuln = mongols
and not I_SettlementOwner Nuln = poland
and not I_SettlementOwner Nuln = england
and not I_SettlementOwner Nuln = egypt
and not I_SettlementOwner Nuln = teutonic_order
and not I_SettlementOwner Nuln = lithuania
and not I_SettlementOwner Nuln = norway
and not I_SettlementOwner Nuln = slave
and not I_SettlementOwner Nuln = novgorod
and not I_SettlementOwner Nuln = denmark
and not I_SettlementOwner Nuln = russia
and not I_SettlementOwner Nuln = hungary
spawn_army 
				faction hre
				character	random_name, named character, x 45, y 45,  label hreNuln_engeners, direction S, battle_model Nuln_crew
				traits	Nuln_engeners 1, man 1
unit		Nuln enge with long rifle				exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
unit		Nuln enge				exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
end
terminate_monitor
end_monitor

;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;Sigmar war priest;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;

		declare_counter Warpriest
		set_counter Warpriest 0

monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal
and RandomPercent = 1
and  I_IsFactionAIControlled teutonic_order
and  I_IsFactionAIControlled lithuania
and  I_IsFactionAIControlled novgorod
and  I_IsFactionAIControlled norway
and  I_IsFactionAIControlled england
and  I_IsFactionAIControlled russia
and  I_IsFactionAIControlled poland
and  I_IsFactionAIControlled turks
and  I_IsFactionAIControlled hungary
and  I_IsFactionAIControlled moors
and  I_IsFactionAIControlled egypt
set_counter Warpriest 1
terminate_monitor
end_monitor

monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal
and I_TurnNumber = 60
and  I_IsFactionAIControlled teutonic_order
and  I_IsFactionAIControlled lithuania
and  I_IsFactionAIControlled novgorod
and  I_IsFactionAIControlled norway
and  I_IsFactionAIControlled england
and  I_IsFactionAIControlled russia
and  I_IsFactionAIControlled poland
and  I_IsFactionAIControlled turks
and  I_IsFactionAIControlled hungary
and  I_IsFactionAIControlled moors
and  I_IsFactionAIControlled egypt
set_counter Warpriest 1
terminate_monitor
end_monitor

monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal
and RandomPercent = 5
and I_TurnNumber > 30
and I_CompareCounter Warpriest = 0
and  I_IsFactionAIControlled hre
and  I_IsFactionAIControlled spain
and  I_IsFactionAIControlled scotland
and  I_IsFactionAIControlled portugal
and  I_IsFactionAIControlled venice
and  I_IsFactionAIControlled sicily
and  I_IsFactionAIControlled milan
and  I_IsFactionAIControlled byzantium
and  I_IsFactionAIControlled saxons
and  I_IsFactionAIControlled france
and  I_IsFactionAIControlled papal_states
and I_NumberOfSettlements hre > 0
and not I_SettlementOwner Castlesigmar = turks
and not I_SettlementOwner Castlesigmar = moors
and not I_SettlementOwner Castlesigmar = mongols
and not I_SettlementOwner Castlesigmar = poland
and not I_SettlementOwner Castlesigmar = england
and not I_SettlementOwner Castlesigmar = egypt
and not I_SettlementOwner Castlesigmar = teutonic_order
and not I_SettlementOwner Castlesigmar = lithuania
and not I_SettlementOwner Castlesigmar = norway
and not I_SettlementOwner Castlesigmar = slave
and not I_SettlementOwner Castlesigmar = novgorod
and not I_SettlementOwner Castlesigmar = denmark
and not I_SettlementOwner Castlesigmar = russia
and not I_SettlementOwner Castlesigmar = hungary
spawn_army 
				faction hre
				character	random_name, named character, x 34, y 72,  label hreWarpriest, direction S, battle_model Warpriest_book, portrait Warpriest
				traits	Warpriest 1, man 1
unit		Warpriests				exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
end
terminate_monitor
end_monitor
