;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;
;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;Blood_dragons_knights;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;
;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;
		add_events
			event	counter	Blood_dragons_knights
	 		date	0
	 	end_add_events
set_event_counter Blood_dragons_knights 0		
		
		

monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal
and RandomPercent = 1
set_event_counter Blood_dragons_knights 1
terminate_monitor
end_monitor

monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal
and I_TurnNumber = 0
set_event_counter Blood_dragons_knights 1
terminate_monitor
end_monitor

monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal
and I_EventCounter Blood_dragons_knights = 1
and I_NumberOfSettlements hungary > 0
spawn_army 
				faction hungary
				character	random_name, named character, x 110, y 52,  label hre_Blood_dragons_knights, direction S, portrait Blood_dragons_knights
				traits	vampir 1, Blood_dragons 1
unit		Vampire count bodiguard				exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
unit		Blood dragons knights				exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
unit		Blood dragons				exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
end
historic_event BLOOD_DRAGONS_KNIGHTS false factions { hungary, }
terminate_monitor
end_monitor


monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal
and I_EventCounter Blood_dragons_knights = 1
and not I_CharacterExists hre_Blood_dragons_knights
set_event_counter Blood_dragons_knights 0
historic_event diedragon false factions { hungary, }
terminate_monitor
end_monitor


;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;
;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;Wraith;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;
;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;
		declare_counter Wraith
		set_counter Wraith 0

monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal
and RandomPercent = 1
set_counter Wraith 1
terminate_monitor
end_monitor

monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal
and I_TurnNumber = 0
set_counter Wraith 1
terminate_monitor
end_monitor

monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal
and I_CompareCounter Wraith = 1
and I_NumberOfSettlements hungary > 0
spawn_army 
				faction hungary
				character	random_name, named character, x 110, y 52,  label hre_Wraith, direction S, battle_model never, portrait Wraith
				traits	Wraith 1
unit		Wraith				exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
end
historic_event WRAITH false factions { hungary, }
terminate_monitor
end_monitor




;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;
;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;Dark elf mage;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;
;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;
		declare_counter DE_mage
		set_counter DE_mage 0

monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal
and RandomPercent = 1
set_counter DE_mage 1
terminate_monitor
end_monitor

monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal
and I_TurnNumber = 60
set_counter DE_mage 1
terminate_monitor
end_monitor

monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal
and I_CompareCounter DE_mage = 1
and I_NumberOfSettlements mongols > 0
spawn_army 
				faction mongols
				character	random_name, named character, x 2, y 191,  label hre_DE_mage, direction S, battle_model DE_general_1
				traits	Darkelf 1, DE_mage 1
unit		DE mage				exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
end
historic_event DE_mage false factions { mongols, }
terminate_monitor
end_monitor


;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;
;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;Trolls;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;
;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;
		declare_counter Trolls
		set_counter Trolls 0

monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal
and RandomPercent = 1
set_counter Trolls 1
terminate_monitor
end_monitor

monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal
and I_TurnNumber = 50
set_counter Trolls 1
terminate_monitor
end_monitor

monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal
and I_CompareCounter Trolls = 1
and I_NumberOfSettlements turks > 0
if I_LocalFaction turks
spawn_army 
				faction turks
				character	random_name, named character, x 169, y 143,  label turks_trolls, direction S, battle_model never, portrait Troll
				traits	troll 1
unit		Trolls				exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
end
historic_event trolls false factions { turks, }
end_if
if not I_LocalFaction turks
spawn_army 
				faction turks
				character	random_name, named character, x 169, y 43,  label turks_trolls, direction S, battle_model never, portrait Troll
				traits	troll 1
unit		Trolls				exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
end
end_if
terminate_monitor
end_monitor


;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;
;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;Daemon Prince;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;
;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;
		declare_counter Daemon
		set_counter Daemon 0

monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal
and RandomPercent = 1
set_counter Daemon 1
terminate_monitor
end_monitor

monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal
and I_TurnNumber = 40
set_counter Daemon 1
terminate_monitor
end_monitor

monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal
and I_CompareCounter Daemon = 1
and I_NumberOfSettlements norway > 0
spawn_army 
				faction norway
				character	random_name, named character, x 141, y 236,  label norway_daemon, direction S, battle_model never, portrait Daemon ;
				traits	Daemon_prince 1
unit		Daemon Prince				exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
end
historic_event DAEMON false factions { norway, }
terminate_monitor
end_monitor


;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;
;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;24. Unique castles bonuses Hick;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;
;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;
declare_counter ruin
set_counter ruin 0
monitor_event GeneralCaptureSettlement FactionIsLocal
   and SettlementName Ruin   
   if not I_IsFactionAIControlled england
   and I_CompareCounter ruin = 0
   spawn_army 
				faction england
				character	random_name, named character, age 35, x 75, y 81, label zva
				traits	 GoodCommander 4, GoodCommander 2, elf 1
					unit		High elf bodyguard			exp 9 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
		end
		console_command give_ancillary zva klinp
		console_command give_ancillary zva dosza
		console_command give_ancillary zva lukdos
		add_money england 12000
		set_counter ruin 1
		end_if 
   
   if not I_IsFactionAIControlled hre
   and I_CompareCounter ruin = 0
   spawn_army 
				faction england
				character	random_name, named character, age 35, x 75, y 81, label zvaa
				traits	 GoodCommander 4, GoodCommander 2, elf 1
					unit		High elf bodyguard				exp 9 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
		end
		console_command give_ancillary zvaa klinp
		console_command give_ancillary zvaa dosza
		console_command give_ancillary zvaa lukdos
		add_money hre 12000
		set_counter ruin 1
		end_if 
		   if not I_IsFactionAIControlled russia
		   and I_CompareCounter ruin = 0
   spawn_army 
				faction england
				character	random_name, named character, age 35, x 75, y 81, label zvaaa
				traits	 GoodCommander 4, GoodCommander 2, elf 1
					unit		High elf bodyguard				exp 9 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
		end
		console_command give_ancillary zvaaa klinp
		console_command give_ancillary zvaaa dosza
		console_command give_ancillary zvaaa lukdos
		add_money russia 12000
		set_counter ruin 1
		end_if 
				   if not I_IsFactionAIControlled poland
				   and I_CompareCounter ruin = 0
   spawn_army 
				faction england
				character	random_name, named character, age 35, x 75, y 81, label zvaaaa
				traits	 GoodCommander 4, GoodCommander 2, elf 1
					unit		High elf bodyguard				exp 9 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
		end
		console_command give_ancillary zvaaaa klinp
		console_command give_ancillary zvaaaa dosza
		console_command give_ancillary zvaaaa lukdos
		add_money poland 12000
		set_counter ruin 1
		end_if 
						   if not I_IsFactionAIControlled turks
						   and I_CompareCounter ruin = 0
   spawn_army 
				faction england
				character	random_name, named character, age 35, x 75, y 81, label zvaaaaa
				traits	 GoodCommander 4, GoodCommander 2, elf 1
					unit		High elf bodyguard			exp 9 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
		end
		console_command give_ancillary zvaaaaa klinp
		console_command give_ancillary zvaaaaa dosza
		console_command give_ancillary zvaaaaa lukdos
		add_money turks 12000
		set_counter ruin 1
		end_if 
								   if not I_IsFactionAIControlled spain
								   and I_CompareCounter ruin = 0
   spawn_army 
				faction england
				character	random_name, named character, age 35, x 75, y 81, label zvaaaaaa
				traits	 GoodCommander 4, GoodCommander 2, elf 1

   spawn_army

declare_counter bash
set_counter bash 0
monitor_event GeneralCaptureSettlement FactionIsLocal
   and SettlementName Bash  
   if not I_IsFactionAIControlled england
   and I_CompareCounter bash = 0
		add_money england 12000
		set_counter bash 1
		end_if 
   
   if not I_IsFactionAIControlled hre
   and I_CompareCounter bash = 0
		add_money hre 12000
		set_counter bash 1
		end_if 
		   if not I_IsFactionAIControlled russia
		   and I_CompareCounter bash = 0
		add_money russia 12000
		set_counter bash 1
		end_if 
				   if not I_IsFactionAIControlled poland
				   and I_CompareCounter bash = 0
		add_money poland 12000
		set_counter bash 1
		end_if 
						   if not I_IsFactionAIControlled turks
						   and I_CompareCounter bash = 0
		add_money turks 12000
		set_counter bash 1
		end_if 
								   if not I_IsFactionAIControlled spain
								   and I_CompareCounter bash = 0
		add_money spain 12000
		set_counter bash 1
		end_if 
										   if not I_IsFactionAIControlled scotland
										   and I_CompareCounter bash = 0
		add_money scotland 12000
		set_counter bash 1
		end_if 
												   if not I_IsFactionAIControlled portugal
												   and I_CompareCounter bash = 0
		add_money portugal 12000
		set_counter bash 1
		end_if
														   if not I_IsFactionAIControlled venice
														   and I_CompareCounter bash = 0
		add_money venice 12000
		set_counter bash 1
		end_if
																   if not I_IsFactionAIControlled sicily
																   and I_CompareCounter bash = 0
		add_money sicily 12000
		set_counter bash 1
		end_if
																		   if not I_IsFactionAIControlled milan
																		   and I_CompareCounter bash = 0
		add_money milan 12000
		set_counter bash 1
		end_if
																				   if not I_IsFactionAIControlled byzantium
																				   and I_CompareCounter bash = 0
		add_money byzantium 12000
		set_counter bash 1
		end_if
																						   if not I_IsFactionAIControlled saxons
																						   and I_CompareCounter bash = 0

		add_money saxons 12000
		set_counter bash 1
		end_if
																								   if not I_IsFactionAIControlled france
																								   and I_CompareCounter bash = 0

		add_money france 12000
		set_counter bash 1
		end_if

																								   if not I_IsFactionAIControlled norway
																								   and I_CompareCounter bash = 0

		add_money norway 12000
		set_counter bash 1
		end_if
																										   if not I_IsFactionAIControlled lithuania
																										   and I_CompareCounter bash = 0

		add_money lithuania 12000
		set_counter bash 1
		end_if


																										   if not I_IsFactionAIControlled hungary
																										   and I_CompareCounter bash = 0

		add_money hungary 12000
		set_counter bash 1
		end_if


																										   if not I_IsFactionAIControlled moors
																										   and I_CompareCounter bash = 0

		add_money moors 12000
		set_counter bash 1
		end_if

																										   if not I_IsFactionAIControlled mongols
																										   and I_CompareCounter bash = 0

		add_money mongols 12000
		set_counter bash 1
		end_if



																										   if not I_IsFactionAIControlled teutonic_order
																										   and I_CompareCounter bash = 0

		add_money teutonic_order 12000
		set_counter bash 1
		end_if
if not I_IsFactionAIControlled novgorod
				   and I_CompareCounter bash = 0
		add_money novgorod 12000
		set_counter bash 1
		end_if 

terminate_monitor
end_monitor


declare_counter blood
set_counter blood 0
monitor_event GeneralCaptureSettlement FactionIsLocal
   and SettlementName Blood   
   if not I_IsFactionAIControlled england
   and I_CompareCounter blood = 0
   spawn_army 
				faction england
				character	random_name, named character, age 35, x 40, y 41, label gra
				traits	 GoodCommander 4, GoodCommander 2, elf 1
					unit		High elf bodyguard			exp 9 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
		end
		console_command give_ancillary gra valah
		console_command give_ancillary gra prokol
		console_command give_ancillary gra kolkar
		add_money england 12000
		set_counter blood 1
		end_if 
   
   if not I_IsFactionAIControlled hre
   and I_CompareCounter blood = 0
   spawn_army 
				faction england
				character	random_name, named character, age 35, x 40, y 41, label graa
				traits	 GoodCommander 4, GoodCommander 2, elf 1
					unit		High elf bodyguard				exp 9 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
		end
		console_command give_ancillary graa valah
		console_command give_ancillary graa prokol
		console_command give_ancillary graa kolkar
		add_money hre 12000
		set_counter blood 1
		end_if 
		   if not I_IsFactionAIControlled russia
		   and I_CompareCounter blood = 0
   spawn_army 
				faction england
				character	random_name, named character, age 35, x 40, y 41, label graaa
				traits	 GoodCommander 4, GoodCommander 2, elf 1
					unit		High elf bodyguard				exp 9 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
		end
		console_command give_ancillary graaa valah
		console_command give_ancillary graaa prokol
		console_command give_ancillary graaa kolkar
		add_money russia 12000
		set_counter blood 1
		end_if

				   and I_CompareCounter blood = 0
   spawn_army

				character	random_name, named character, age 35, x 40, y 41, label graaaa
				traits	 GoodCommander 4, GoodCommander 2, elf 1
					unit		High elf bodyguard				exp 9 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
		end
		console_command give_ancillary graaaa valah
		console_command give_ancillary graaaa prokol
		console_command give_ancillary graaaa kolkar
		add_money poland 12000
		set_counter blood 1
		end_if 
						   if not I_IsFactionAIControlled turks
						   and I_CompareCounter blood = 0
   spawn_army 
				faction england
				character	random_name, named character, age 35, x 40, y 41, label graaaaa
				traits	 GoodCommander 4, GoodCommander 2, elf 1
					unit		High elf bodyguard			exp 9 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
		end
		console_command give_ancillary graaaaa valah
		console_command give_ancillary graaaaa prokol
		console_command give_ancillary graaaaa kolkar
		add_money turks 12000

		end_if

								   and I_CompareCounter blood = 0
   spawn_army

declare_counter medness
set_counter medness 0
monitor_event GeneralCaptureSettlement FactionIsLocal
   and SettlementName Med   
   if not I_IsFactionAIControlled england
   and I_CompareCounter medness = 0
   spawn_army 
				faction england
				character	random_name, named character, age 35, x 59, y 105, label gre
				traits	 GoodCommander 4, GoodCommander 2, elf 1, svoboda 1
					unit		High elf bodyguard			exp 9 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
		end
		console_command give_ancillary gre swordem
		console_command give_ancillary gre runch
		console_command give_ancillary gre zamdu
		add_money england 12000
		set_counter medness 1
		end_if 
   
   if not I_IsFactionAIControlled hre
   and I_CompareCounter medness = 0
   spawn_army 
				faction england
				character	random_name, named character, age 35, x 59, y 105, label grea
				traits	 GoodCommander 4, GoodCommander 2, elf 1, svoboda 1
					unit		High elf bodyguard				exp 9 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
		end
		console_command give_ancillary grea swordem
		console_command give_ancillary grea runch
		console_command give_ancillary grea zamdu
		add_money hre 12000
		set_counter medness 1
		end_if 
		   if not I_IsFactionAIControlled russia
		   and I_CompareCounter medness = 0
   spawn_army

;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;25. Greenskinzzz union. Isilendil;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;
;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;
;monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal
;and I_TurnNumber = 1
;set_religion moors islam
;end_monitor


		add_events
			event	counter	greenskin_alliance
			event	counter	greenskin_alliance_offer
			event	counter	NIGHT_GOBLINS_IS_DEAD
	 		date	0
	 	end_add_events

		set_event_counter greenskin_alliance 0
		set_event_counter greenskin_alliance_offer 0
		set_event_counter NIGHT_GOBLINS_IS_DEAD 0		

				

monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal
and RandomPercent = 1
if I_LocalFaction moors
historic_event greenskin_alliance_gob true
set_event_counter greenskin_alliance_offer 1
end_if
if I_LocalFaction turks
historic_event greenskin_alliance_orc true
set_event_counter greenskin_alliance_offer 1
end_if
if I_IsFactionAIControlled moors
and I_IsFactionAIControlled turks
set_event_counter greenskin_alliance 1
set_event_counter greenskin_alliance_offer 1
end_if
terminate_monitor
end_monitor


monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal
and I_EventCounter greenskin_alliance_offer = 1
and I_NumberOfSettlements turks > 0
and I_NumberOfSettlements moors > 0

if I_EventCounter greenskin_alliance_orc_accepted = 1
set_event_counter greenskin_alliance 1
console_command diplomatic_stance turks moors allied
set_event_counter NIGHT_GOBLINS_IS_DEAD 1
set_faction_standing turks moors 9.9
set_faction_standing moors turks 9.9
terminate_monitor
end_if

if I_EventCounter greenskin_alliance_gob_accepted = 1
set_event_counter greenskin_alliance 1
console_command diplomatic_stance turks moors allied
set_event_counter NIGHT_GOBLINS_IS_DEAD 1
set_faction_standing turks moors 9.9
set_faction_standing moors turks 9.9
terminate_monitor
end_if

if I_EventCounter greenskin_alliance = 1
console_command diplomatic_stance turks moors allied
set_event_counter NIGHT_GOBLINS_IS_DEAD 1
set_faction_standing turks moors 9.9
set_faction_standing moors turks 9.9
terminate_monitor
end_if


end_monitor



monitor_event BecomesFactionLeader FactionType moors
and I_EventCounter greenskin_alliance = 0
		if I_FactionLeaderAttribute moors Authority = 5
		and RandomPercent <= 5
set_event_counter greenskin_alliance 1
set_event_counter greenskin_alliance_offer 1
set_event_counter NIGHT_GOBLINS_IS_DEAD 1
		end_if
		if I_FactionLeaderAttribute moors Authority = 4
		and RandomPercent <= 10
set_event_counter greenskin_alliance 1
set_event_counter greenskin_alliance_offer 1
set_event_counter NIGHT_GOBLINS_IS_DEAD 1
		end_if
		if I_FactionLeaderAttribute moors Authority = 3
		and RandomPercent <= 20
set_event_counter greenskin_alliance 1
set_event_counter greenskin_alliance_offer 1
set_event_counter NIGHT_GOBLINS_IS_DEAD 1
		end_if
		if I_FactionLeaderAttribute moors Authority = 2
		and RandomPercent <= 50
set_event_counter greenskin_alliance 1
set_event_counter greenskin_alliance_offer 1
set_event_counter NIGHT_GOBLINS_IS_DEAD 1
		end_if
		if I_FactionLeaderAttribute moors Authority = 1
		and RandomPercent <= 75
set_event_counter greenskin_alliance 1
set_event_counter greenskin_alliance_offer 1
set_event_counter NIGHT_GOBLINS_IS_DEAD 1
		end_if
		if I_FactionLeaderAttribute moors Authority = 0
		and RandomPercent <= 99
set_event_counter greenskin_alliance 1
set_event_counter greenskin_alliance_offer 1
set_event_counter NIGHT_GOBLINS_IS_DEAD 1
		end_if
end_monitor

monitor_event FactionTurnEnd FactionIsLocal
and I_TurnNumber = 27
and  I_IsFactionAIControlled hungary
and  not I_IsFactionAIControlled saxons
and I_NumberOfSettlements hungary > 1
if I_CharacterExists vamp
	reposition_character vamp, 73, 57
	character_flash_start vamp
	console_command	remove_trait vamp script
	end_if
	if I_CharacterExists camp
	console_command	 remove_trait camp script
	reposition_character camp, 71, 57
	character_flash_start camp
	point_at_settlement Wurtbad
		end_if	
			if I_CharacterExists vampi
	console_command	 remove_trait vampi script
	reposition_character vampi, 73, 53
	character_flash_start vampi	
		end_if						
	snap_strat_camera 71,57
	campaign_wait 10	
	if I_CharacterExists vamp
		character_flash_stop vamp
		end_if
		if I_CharacterExists vampi
character_flash_stop vampi
end_if
		if I_CharacterExists camp
character_flash_stop camp
end_if		
set_counter wure 1
terminate_monitor		
end_monitor

monitor_event FactionTurnEnd FactionIsLocal
	and I_CompareCounter wure = 1
	and not I_SettlementOwner Wurtbad = spain
	
		
	if I_CharacterExists vamp
	and not I_SettlementOwner Wurtbad = spain
		siege_settlement vamp, Wurtbad, maintain
		wait 3
	end_if
	if I_CharacterExists camp
	and not I_SettlementOwner Wurtbad = spain
		siege_settlement camp, Wurtbad, attack		
	end_if	
	
	terminate_monitor
	end_monitor

	end_monitor

monitor_event FactionTurnEnd FactionIsLocal
and I_TurnNumber = 31
and I_IsFactionAIControlled turks
and I_IsFactionAIControlled hre

	end_if

	reposition_character castle1ai, 43, 67

monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType turks
	and I_CompareCounter zamokai = 1
	and not I_SettlementOwner Castlesreiksguard = turks
	
		
	if I_CharacterExists castleai
	and not I_SettlementOwner Castlesreiksguard = turks
		siege_settlement castleai, Castlesreiksguard, maintain
		wait 3
	end_if
	if I_CharacterExists castle1ai
	and not I_SettlementOwner Castlesreiksguard = turks
		siege_settlement castle1ai, Castlesreiksguard, attack		
	end_if	
	
	terminate_monitor
	end_monitor

and not I_IsFactionAIControlled spain

and I_NumberOfSettlements norway > 0

and not I_IsFactionAIControlled spain

and I_NumberOfSettlements norway > 0

	reposition_character talab, 67, 81		
	character_flash_start talab
	console_command	remove_trait talab script
	end_if
	if I_CharacterExists talab2
	reposition_character talab2, 66, 81	
	character_flash_start talab2
	console_command	remove_trait talab2 script
	end_if

		end_if

	end_if

	character_flash_start talab6	
	end_if
	set_counter talabek 1
terminate_monitor		
end_monitor
	

monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType norway
	and I_CompareCounter talabek = 1
	and not I_SettlementOwner Talabheim = norway	

	if I_CharacterExists talab
	and not I_SettlementOwner Talabheim = norway
		siege_settlement talab, Talabheim, maintain
		wait 3
	end_if
	if I_CharacterExists talab2
	and not I_SettlementOwner Talabheim = norway
		siege_settlement talab2, Talabheim, attack
		end_if	
	terminate_monitor	
end_monitor

and I_TurnNumber = 2
and I_IsFactionAIControlled russia
and  I_IsFactionAIControlled england
and  not I_IsFactionAIControlled mongols
and I_NumberOfSettlements russia > 0
and I_NumberOfSettlements england > 0
and I_NumberOfSettlements mongols > 0
if I_CharacterExists dark
	reposition_character dark, 84, 151
		reveal_tile 84, 151
	character_flash_start dark	
	end_if
	if I_CharacterExists dark2
	reposition_character dark2, 85, 149
	reveal_tile 85, 149
	character_flash_start dark2	
	point_at_character dark2
	end_if	
		if I_CharacterExists dark3
	reposition_character dark3, 86, 149
	reveal_tile 86, 149
	character_flash_start dark3	
	end_if				
	campaign_wait 5
	snap_strat_camera 85, 149
	campaign_wait 10
	if I_CharacterExists dark
		character_flash_stop dark
		end_if
			if I_CharacterExists dark2
		character_flash_stop dark2
		end_if
			if I_CharacterExists dark3
		character_flash_stop dark3
		end_if			
hide_all_revealed_tiles		
historic_event arshavin
terminate_monitor		
end_monitor


monitor_event FactionTurnEnd FactionIsLocal
and I_TurnNumber = 3
and I_IsFactionAIControlled russia
and  I_IsFactionAIControlled england
and  not I_IsFactionAIControlled mongols
and I_NumberOfSettlements russia > 0
and I_NumberOfSettlements england > 0
and I_NumberOfSettlements mongols > 0

if I_CharacterExists dark
	reposition_character dark, 62, 155		
	character_flash_start dark
	console_command	remove_trait dark script
	end_if
	if I_CharacterExists dark2
	reposition_character dark2, 64, 156	
	character_flash_start dark2
	console_command	remove_trait dark2 script
	point_at_character dark2
	end_if	
		if I_CharacterExists dark3
	reposition_character dark3, 60, 155
		character_flash_start dark3
	console_command	remove_trait dark3 script
	end_if	
			
	campaign_wait 5
	snap_strat_camera 64, 156
	campaign_wait 10
	if I_CharacterExists dark
		character_flash_stop dark
		end_if
			if I_CharacterExists dark2
		character_flash_stop dark2
		end_if
			if I_CharacterExists dark3
		character_flash_stop dark3
		end_if			
set_counter darkcamp 1
terminate_monitor		
end_monitor

monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType england
	and I_CompareCounter darkcamp = 1
	and not I_SettlementOwner Getman = russia
	and not I_SettlementOwner Getman = england

	if I_CharacterExists dark
		and not I_SettlementOwner Getman = russia
	and not I_SettlementOwner Getman = england
		siege_settlement dark, Getman, maintain
		wait 3
	end_if
	if I_CharacterExists dark3
			and not I_SettlementOwner Getman = russia
	and not I_SettlementOwner Getman = england
		siege_settlement dark3, Getman, attack
		end_if	
	terminate_monitor	
end_monitor

	end_if
	if I_CharacterExists orcgeneral2b1
	and not I_SettlementOwner Nuln = turks

		wait 3
	end_if	
	
	if I_CharacterExists orcgeneral1c1
	and not I_SettlementOwner Nuln = turks
		siege_settlement orcgeneral1c1, Nuln, attack
	end_if

	terminate_monitor
	end_monitor

monitor_event FactionTurnEnd FactionIsLocal
	and I_CompareCounter hohs = 1
	and not I_SettlementOwner Heedenhof = mongols
		
	if I_CharacterExists nabeg
	and not I_SettlementOwner Heedenhof = mongols

		wait 3

	if I_CharacterExists nabeg2
	and not I_SettlementOwner Heedenhof = mongols
		siege_settlement nabeg2,  Heedenhof, attack
	end_if	
	
	terminate_monitor
	end_monitor

		add_events
			event	counter	border_alliance
			event	counter	border_alliance_offer
	 		date	0
	 	end_add_events

		set_event_counter border_alliance 0
		set_event_counter border_alliance_offer 0
	
monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal
and RandomPercent = 1
if I_LocalFaction hre
historic_event BORDER_ALLIANCE_REIK true
set_event_counter border_alliance_offer 1
end_if
if I_LocalFaction kalmar_union
historic_event BORDER_ALLIANCE_BORDER_PRINCES true
set_event_counter border_alliance_offer 1
end_if
if I_IsFactionAIControlled hre
and I_IsFactionAIControlled kalmar_union
set_event_counter border_alliance 1
set_event_counter border_alliance_offer 1
end_if
terminate_monitor
end_monitor

monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal
if I_NumberOfSettlements kalmar_union = 1
set_event_counter border_alliance 1
terminate_monitor
end_if
if I_NumberOfSettlements kalmar_union = 2
and RandomPercent < 15
set_event_counter border_alliance 1
terminate_monitor
end_if
if I_NumberOfSettlements kalmar_union = 3
and RandomPercent < 5
set_event_counter border_alliance 1
terminate_monitor
end_if
end_monitor

and I_EventCounter border_alliance_offer = 1
and I_NumberOfSettlements hre > 0
and I_NumberOfSettlements kalmar_union > 0

if I_EventCounter BORDER_ALLIANCE_REIK_accepted = 1
set_event_counter border_alliance 1

set_faction_standing kalmar_union hre 9.9	
set_faction_standing kalmar_union russia 9.9

set_faction_standing russia kalmar_union 9.9

set_faction_standing kalmar_union byzantium -9.9
set_faction_standing byzantium kalmar_union -9.9
console_command diplomatic_stance kalmar_union byzantium war
end_if

set_faction_standing poland kalmar_union 9.9
set_faction_standing kalmar_union papal_states 9.9	
set_faction_standing papal_states kalmar_union 9.9
if I_CompareCounter ostland_heresy = 1
set_faction_standing kalmar_union byzantium -9.9
set_faction_standing byzantium kalmar_union -9.9
console_command diplomatic_stance kalmar_union byzantium war
end_if	
if I_CompareCounter talabakland_heresy = 1
set_faction_standing kalmar_union spain -9.9
set_faction_standing spain kalmar_union -9.9
console_command diplomatic_stance kalmar_union spain war
end_if	
if I_CompareCounter ostermark_heresy = 1
set_faction_standing kalmar_union france -9.9
set_faction_standing france kalmar_union -9.9
console_command diplomatic_stance kalmar_union france war
end_if	
if I_CompareCounter stirland_heresy = 1
set_faction_standing kalmar_union saxons -9.9
set_faction_standing saxons kalmar_union -9.9
console_command diplomatic_stance kalmar_union saxons war
end_if	
if I_CompareCounter hochland_heresy = 1
set_faction_standing kalmar_union milan -9.9
set_faction_standing milan kalmar_union -9.9
console_command diplomatic_stance kalmar_union milan war
end_if	
if I_CompareCounter nordland_heresy = 1
set_faction_standing kalmar_union sicily -9.9
set_faction_standing sicily kalmar_union -9.9
console_command diplomatic_stance kalmar_union sicily war
end_if	
if I_CompareCounter averland_heresy = 1
set_faction_standing kalmar_union venice -9.9
set_faction_standing venice kalmar_union -9.9
console_command diplomatic_stance kalmar_union venice war
end_if	
if I_CompareCounter viciland_heresy = 1
set_faction_standing kalmar_union portugal -9.9
set_faction_standing portugal kalmar_union -9.9
console_command diplomatic_stance kalmar_union portugal war
end_if	
if I_CompareCounter middenland_heresy = 1
set_faction_standing kalmar_union scotland -9.9
set_faction_standing scotland kalmar_union -9.9
console_command diplomatic_stance kalmar_union scotland war
end_if	
if I_CompareCounter ostland_heresy = 0
set_faction_standing kalmar_union byzantium 9.9
set_faction_standing byzantium kalmar_union 9.9
console_command diplomatic_stance kalmar_union byzantium allied
end_if	
if I_CompareCounter talabakland_heresy = 0
set_faction_standing kalmar_union spain 9.9
set_faction_standing spain kalmar_union 9.9
console_command diplomatic_stance kalmar_union spain allied
end_if	
if I_CompareCounter ostermark_heresy = 0
set_faction_standing kalmar_union france 9.9
set_faction_standing france kalmar_union 9.9
console_command diplomatic_stance kalmar_union france allied
end_if	
if I_CompareCounter stirland_heresy = 0
set_faction_standing kalmar_union saxons 9.9
set_faction_standing saxons kalmar_union 9.9
console_command diplomatic_stance kalmar_union saxons allied
end_if	
if I_CompareCounter nordland_heresy = 0
set_faction_standing kalmar_union sicily 9.9
set_faction_standing sicily kalmar_union 9.9
console_command diplomatic_stance kalmar_union sicily allied
end_if	
if I_CompareCounter averland_heresy = 0
set_faction_standing kalmar_union venice 9.9
set_faction_standing venice kalmar_union 9.9
console_command diplomatic_stance kalmar_union venice allied
end_if	
if I_CompareCounter viciland_heresy = 0
set_faction_standing kalmar_union portugal 9.9
set_faction_standing portugal kalmar_union 9.9
console_command diplomatic_stance kalmar_union portugal allied
end_if	
if I_CompareCounter middenland_heresy = 0
set_faction_standing kalmar_union scotland 9.9
set_faction_standing scotland kalmar_union 9.9
console_command diplomatic_stance kalmar_union scotland allied
end_if	
if I_CompareCounter hochland_heresy = 0
set_faction_standing kalmar_union milan 9.9
set_faction_standing milan kalmar_union 9.9
console_command diplomatic_stance kalmar_union milan allied
end_if	


console_command diplomatic_stance kalmar_union england allied
console_command diplomatic_stance kalmar_union hre allied
console_command diplomatic_stance kalmar_union russia allied
console_command diplomatic_stance kalmar_union poland allied
console_command diplomatic_stance kalmar_union papal_states allied

terminate_monitor
end_if

end_monitor



		declare_counter shaduf
		set_counter shaduf 0

monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal
and RandomPercent = 1
and  I_IsFactionAIControlled teutonic_order
and  I_IsFactionAIControlled lithuania
and  I_IsFactionAIControlled novgorod
and  I_IsFactionAIControlled norway
and  I_IsFactionAIControlled england
and  I_IsFactionAIControlled russia
and  I_IsFactionAIControlled poland
and  I_IsFactionAIControlled turks
and  I_IsFactionAIControlled hungary
and  I_IsFactionAIControlled moors
and  I_IsFactionAIControlled egypt
set_counter shaduf 1
terminate_monitor
end_monitor

monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal
and I_TurnNumber = 60
and  I_IsFactionAIControlled teutonic_order
and  I_IsFactionAIControlled lithuania
and  I_IsFactionAIControlled novgorod
and  I_IsFactionAIControlled norway
and  I_IsFactionAIControlled england
and  I_IsFactionAIControlled russia
and  I_IsFactionAIControlled poland
and  I_IsFactionAIControlled turks
and  I_IsFactionAIControlled hungary
and  I_IsFactionAIControlled moors
and  I_IsFactionAIControlled egypt
set_counter shaduf 1
terminate_monitor
end_monitor

monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal
and RandomPercent = 5
and I_TurnNumber > 30
and I_CompareCounter shaduf = 0
and  I_IsFactionAIControlled hre
and  I_IsFactionAIControlled spain
and  I_IsFactionAIControlled scotland
and  I_IsFactionAIControlled portugal
and  I_IsFactionAIControlled venice
and  I_IsFactionAIControlled sicily
and  I_IsFactionAIControlled milan
and  I_IsFactionAIControlled byzantium
and  I_IsFactionAIControlled saxons
and  I_IsFactionAIControlled france
and  I_IsFactionAIControlled papal_states
and I_NumberOfSettlements hre > 0

spawn_character hre Shadufboren, spy, age 30, x 38, y 71


console_command give_ancillary Shadufboren brosh
console_command give_trait "Shadufboren" Bio 1
console_command give_trait "Shadufboren" GoodSpy 5

terminate_monitor
end_monitor

;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;28. Empire provinces resurrection;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;

;nordland resurrection

declare_counter nordlandr
set_counter nordlandr 0
declare_counter nordlanderror
set_counter nordlanderror 0

monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal
and I_IsFactionAIControlled sicily
and not I_IsFactionAIControlled scotland
and I_NumberOfSettlements scotland > 0
and I_NumberOfSettlements sicily = 0
and  I_SettlementOwner Salzmund = scotland
and not I_SettlementUnderSiege Salzmund
and not I_CompareCounter middenland_heresy = 1
inc_counter nordlanderror 1
if I_CompareCounter nordlanderror < 2
historic_event nordland true
set_counter nordlandr 1
end_if
end_monitor

monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal
and I_IsFactionAIControlled sicily
and not I_IsFactionAIControlled spain
and I_NumberOfSettlements spain > 0
and I_NumberOfSettlements sicily = 0
and  I_SettlementOwner Salzmund = spain
and not I_SettlementUnderSiege Salzmund
and not I_CompareCounter talabakland_heresy = 1
inc_counter nordlanderror 1
if I_CompareCounter nordlanderror < 2
historic_event nordland true
set_counter nordlandr 1
end_if
end_monitor

monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal
and I_IsFactionAIControlled sicily
and not I_IsFactionAIControlled france
and I_NumberOfSettlements france > 0
and I_NumberOfSettlements sicily = 0
and  I_SettlementOwner Salzmund = france
and not I_SettlementUnderSiege Salzmund
and not I_CompareCounter ostermark_heresy = 1
inc_counter nordlanderror 1

historic_event nordland true
set_counter nordlandr 1
end_if
end_monitor

monitor_conditions I_EventCounter nordland_accepted = 1
and I_IsFactionAIControlled hungary
and I_IsFactionAIControlled novgorod
and I_IsFactionAIControlled lithuania
and I_IsFactionAIControlled norway
and I_IsFactionAIControlled teutonic_order
and I_IsFactionAIControlled england
and I_IsFactionAIControlled turks
and I_IsFactionAIControlled byzantium
and I_IsFactionAIControlled kalmar_union
and I_IsFactionAIControlled poland
and I_IsFactionAIControlled mongols
and I_IsFactionAIControlled russia
and I_IsFactionAIControlled moors
and I_IsFactionAIControlled papal_states
and I_IsFactionAIControlled kalmar_union
and I_IsFactionAIControlled sicily
and not I_SettlementUnderSiege Salzmund
historic_event vonizsalzmunda
set_counter nordlandr 2
set_counter nordlanderror 3
terminate_monitor
end_monitor



monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal
and I_CompareCounter nordlanderror = 2
and I_IsFactionAIControlled hungary
and I_IsFactionAIControlled novgorod
and I_IsFactionAIControlled lithuania
and I_IsFactionAIControlled norway
and I_IsFactionAIControlled teutonic_order
and I_IsFactionAIControlled england
and I_IsFactionAIControlled turks
and I_IsFactionAIControlled byzantium
and I_IsFactionAIControlled kalmar_union
and I_IsFactionAIControlled poland
and I_IsFactionAIControlled mongols
and I_IsFactionAIControlled russia
and I_IsFactionAIControlled moors
and I_IsFactionAIControlled papal_states
and I_IsFactionAIControlled kalmar_union
and I_IsFactionAIControlled sicily
and not I_IsFactionAIControlled scotland
and not I_SettlementUnderSiege Salzmund
historic_event midvrag
change_population_religion scotland chaos 50 catholic
add_money scotland - 15000
		destroy_units scotland Knight wolf mounted
		destroy_units scotland Reiksguard
		destroy_units scotland Black guard Morr
		destroy_units scotland Knight Orden Panther
		destroy_units scotland Knight Orden blazing sun
		destroy_buildings scotland temple_sigmar true
		destroy_buildings scotland white_wolf_order true
		destroy_buildings scotland reiksguard_order true
		destroy_buildings scotland panther_order true
		destroy_buildings scotland morr_order true
		destroy_buildings scotland blazing_sun_order true
		destroy_units scotland Pistoliers
		destroy_units scotland Halberdmen
		destroy_units scotland Swordsmen of Empire
		destroy_units scotland Greatswords
		destroy_units scotland Empire crossbowmen
		destroy_units scotland Empire archers
		destroy_units scotland Handgunners
		set_counter nordlanderror 3
		
					spawn_army 
				faction slave
				character  random_name, named character, x 41, y 117, label revenge  ;command 8, dread 9, loyalty 7, piety 1
				traits	LoyaltyStarter 1,  Upright 2, GoodCommander 1, PublicFaith 2, orc 1
unit		Swordsmen of Empire mounted bodyguard				exp 9 armour 0 weapon_lvl 1

unit		Empire archers				exp 5 armour 0 weapon_lvl 1

unit		free company archers				exp 1 armour 1 weapon_lvl 0
unit		Halberdmen				exp 1 armour 1 weapon_lvl 0
unit		free company				exp 3 armour 0 weapon_lvl 1
unit		Empire Pikemen					exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
unit		Empire Pikemen				exp 5 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
unit		Halberdmen				exp 3 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
unit		Handgunners				exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
unit		Empire crossbowmen				exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
unit		Empire archers				exp 5 armour 0 weapon_lvl 1
unit		free company				exp 5 armour 0 weapon_lvl 1
unit		free company archers				exp 1 armour 1 weapon_lvl 0

		end	
		
		siege_settlement revenge, Salzmund, maintain
		
terminate_monitor
end_monitor

and I_IsFactionAIControlled byzantium

and I_IsFactionAIControlled poland
and I_IsFactionAIControlled mongols
and I_IsFactionAIControlled russia
and I_IsFactionAIControlled moors
and I_IsFactionAIControlled papal_states
and I_IsFactionAIControlled kalmar_union
and I_IsFactionAIControlled sicily
and not I_SettlementUnderSiege Salzmund

spawn_army 
				faction sicily
				character	random_name, named character, x 41, y 117, label nordland  ;command 8, dread 9, loyalty 7, piety 1
				traits	LoyaltyStarter 1,  Upright 2, GoodCommander 1, PublicFaith 2, man 1, GoodCommander 4

unit		Halberdmen				exp 2 armour 1 weapon_lvl 0

		;middenheim resurrection
declare_counter middenheimerror
set_counter middenheimerror 0
declare_counter middenheimr
set_counter middenheimr 0

monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal
and I_IsFactionAIControlled scotland
and not I_IsFactionAIControlled sicily
and I_NumberOfSettlements sicily > 0
and I_NumberOfSettlements scotland = 0
and  I_SettlementOwner Middenheim = sicily
and not I_SettlementUnderSiege Middenheim
and not I_CompareCounter nordland_heresy = 1
inc_counter middenheimerror 1
if I_CompareCounter middehneimerror < 2
historic_event middenheim true
set_counter middenheimr 1
end_if
end_monitor

monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal
and I_IsFactionAIControlled scotland
and not I_IsFactionAIControlled spain
and I_NumberOfSettlements spain > 0
and I_NumberOfSettlements scotland = 0
and  I_SettlementOwner Middenheim = spain
and not I_SettlementUnderSiege Middenheim
and not I_CompareCounter talabakland_heresy = 1
inc_counter middenheimerror 1
if I_CompareCounter middehneimerror < 2
historic_event middenheim true
set_counter middenheimr 1
end_if
end_monitor

monitor_conditions I_EventCounter middenheim_accepted = 1
and I_IsFactionAIControlled hungary
and I_IsFactionAIControlled novgorod
and I_IsFactionAIControlled lithuania
and I_IsFactionAIControlled norway
and I_IsFactionAIControlled teutonic_order
and I_IsFactionAIControlled england
and I_IsFactionAIControlled turks
and I_IsFactionAIControlled byzantium
and I_IsFactionAIControlled kalmar_union
and I_IsFactionAIControlled poland
and I_IsFactionAIControlled mongols
and I_IsFactionAIControlled russia
and I_IsFactionAIControlled moors
and I_IsFactionAIControlled papal_states
and I_IsFactionAIControlled kalmar_union
and I_IsFactionAIControlled scotland
historic_event middens
set_counter middenheimr 2
set_counter middenheimerror 3
terminate_monitor
end_monitor




monitor_event FactionTurnStar FactionIsLocal
and I_CompareCounter middenheimerror = 1
and I_IsFactionAIControlled hungary
and I_IsFactionAIControlled novgorod
and I_IsFactionAIControlled lithuania
and I_IsFactionAIControlled norway
and I_IsFactionAIControlled teutonic_order
and I_IsFactionAIControlled england
and I_IsFactionAIControlled turks
and I_IsFactionAIControlled byzantium
and I_IsFactionAIControlled kalmar_union
and I_IsFactionAIControlled poland
and I_IsFactionAIControlled mongols
and I_IsFactionAIControlled russia
and I_IsFactionAIControlled moors
and I_IsFactionAIControlled papal_states
and I_IsFactionAIControlled kalmar_union
and I_IsFactionAIControlled scotland
and not I_IsFactionAIControlled sicily
and not I_SettlementUnderSiege Middenheim
historic_event midvrag
change_population_religion sicily chaos 50 catholic
add_money sicily - 15000
		destroy_units sicily Knight wolf mounted
		destroy_units sicily Reiksguard
		destroy_units sicily Black guard Morr
		destroy_units sicily Knight Orden Panther
		destroy_units sicily Knight Orden blazing sun
		destroy_buildings sicily temple_sigmar true
		destroy_buildings sicily white_wolf_order true
		destroy_buildings sicily reiksguard_order true
		destroy_buildings sicily panther_order true
		destroy_buildings sicily morr_order true
		destroy_buildings sicily blazing_sun_order true
		destroy_units sicily Pistoliers
		destroy_units sicily Halberdmen
		destroy_units sicily Swordsmen of Empire
		destroy_units sicily Greatswords
		destroy_units sicily Empire crossbowmen
		destroy_units sicily Empire archers
		destroy_units sicily Handgunners
		set_counter middenheimerror 3
		
				spawn_army 
				faction slave
				character  random_name, named character, x 42, y 102, label revenge1  ;command 8, dread 9, loyalty 7, piety 1
				traits	LoyaltyStarter 1,  Upright 2, GoodCommander 1, PublicFaith 2, orc 1
unit		Swordsmen of Empire mounted bodyguard				exp 9 armour 0 weapon_lvl 1
unit		Empire Pikemen				exp 5 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
unit		Halberdmen				exp 3 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
unit		Handgunners				exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
unit		Empire crossbowmen				exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
unit		Empire archers				exp 5 armour 0 weapon_lvl 1
unit		free company				exp 5 armour 0 weapon_lvl 1
unit		free company archers				exp 1 armour 1 weapon_lvl 0
unit		Halberdmen				exp 1 armour 1 weapon_lvl 0
unit		free company				exp 3 armour 0 weapon_lvl 1
unit		Empire Pikemen					exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
unit		Empire Pikemen				exp 5 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
unit		Halberdmen				exp 3 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
unit		Handgunners				exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
unit		Empire crossbowmen				exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
unit		Empire archers				exp 5 armour 0 weapon_lvl 1
unit		free company				exp 5 armour 0 weapon_lvl 1
unit		free company archers				exp 1 armour 1 weapon_lvl 0

		end	
		
		siege_settlement revenge1, Middenheim, maintain
terminate_monitor
end_monitor

unit		free company archers				exp 1 armour 1 weapon_lvl 0

		end	
		
		siege_settlement revenge1, Middenheim, maintain
terminate_monitor

and I_IsFactionAIControlled hungary

		destroy_buildings portugal panther_order true
		destroy_buildings portugal morr_order true
		destroy_buildings portugal blazing_sun_order true
		destroy_units portugal Pistoliers
		destroy_units portugal Halberdmen
		destroy_units portugal Swordsmen of Empire
		destroy_units portugal Greatswords
		destroy_units portugal Empire crossbowmen

		destroy_units portugal Handgunners

unit		free company				exp 5 armour 0 weapon_lvl 1
unit		free company archers				exp 1 armour 1 weapon_lvl 0
unit		Halberdmen				exp 1 armour 1 weapon_lvl 0

and I_CompareCounter middenheimr = 2

		console_command diplomatic_stance byzantium saxons allied
		set_faction_standing byzantium milan 9.9

				set_faction_standing byzantium hre 9.9
		set_faction_standing hre byzantium 9.9
		console_command diplomatic_stance byzantium hre allied
		end_if
				if not I_IsFactionAIControlled saxons
set_faction_standing saxons england 9.9			
		set_faction_standing saxons russia 9.9	
		set_faction_standing saxons poland 9.9

		console_command diplomatic_stance saxons england neutral

		set_faction_standing scotland saxons 9.9

		set_faction_standing saxons byzantium 9.9
		set_faction_standing byzantium saxons 9.9
		console_command diplomatic_stance saxons byzantiums allied
				set_faction_standing saxons hre 9.9
		set_faction_standing hre saxons 9.9
		console_command diplomatic_stance saxons hre allied
			end_if
						if not I_IsFactionAIControlled hre

		set_faction_standing hre russia 9.9

				set_faction_standing hre saxons 9.9

			end_if
		if not I_IsFactionAIControlled scotland

		set_faction_standing scotland russia 9.9

		set_faction_standing scotland kalmar_union 9.9

		console_command diplomatic_stance scotland england neutral

		console_command diplomatic_stance scotland papal_states neutral
		set_faction_standing scotland spain 9.9

		set_faction_standing byzantium scotland 9.9
		console_command diplomatic_stance scotland scotland allied
		set_faction_standing scotland hre 9.9
		set_faction_standing hre scotland 9.9
		console_command diplomatic_stance scotland hre allied
		end_if
		set_counter middenheimr 50
		
		terminate_monitor
		end_monitor
		
		
		;ostland resurrection
declare_counter ostlanderror
set_counter ostlanderro 0
declare_counter ostlandr
set_counter ostlandr 0

monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal
and I_IsFactionAIControlled byzantium
and not I_IsFactionAIControlled scotland
and I_NumberOfSettlements scotland > 0
and I_NumberOfSettlements byzantium = 0
and  I_SettlementOwner Wolfenburg = scotland
and not I_CompareCounter middenland_heresy = 1
and not I_SettlementUnderSiege Wolfenburg
inc_counter ostlanderror 1
if I_CompareCounter ostlanderror < 2
historic_event ostland true
set_counter ostlandr 1
end_if
end_monitor

monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal
and I_IsFactionAIControlled byzantium
and not I_IsFactionAIControlled spain
and I_NumberOfSettlements spain > 0
and I_NumberOfSettlements byzantium = 0
and  I_SettlementOwner Wolfenburg = spain
and not I_SettlementUnderSiege Wolfenburg
and not I_CompareCounter talabakland_heresy = 1
inc_counter ostlanderror 1
if I_CompareCounter ostlanderror < 2
historic_event ostland true
set_counter ostlandr 1
end_if
end_monitor

monitor_conditions I_EventCounter ostland_accepted = 1
and I_IsFactionAIControlled hungary
and I_IsFactionAIControlled novgorod
and I_IsFactionAIControlled lithuania
and I_IsFactionAIControlled norway
and I_IsFactionAIControlled teutonic_order
and I_IsFactionAIControlled england
and I_IsFactionAIControlled turks
and I_IsFactionAIControlled byzantium
and I_IsFactionAIControlled kalmar_union
and I_IsFactionAIControlled poland
and I_IsFactionAIControlled mongols
and I_IsFactionAIControlled russia
and I_IsFactionAIControlled moors
and I_IsFactionAIControlled papal_states
and I_IsFactionAIControlled kalmar_union
and I_IsFactionAIControlled byzantium
and not I_SettlementUnderSiege Wolfenburg
historic_event ost
set_counter ostlandr 2
set_counter ostlanderror 3
terminate_monitor
end_monitor



monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal
and I_CompareCounter ostlanderror = 2
and I_IsFactionAIControlled hungary
and I_IsFactionAIControlled novgorod
and I_IsFactionAIControlled lithuania
and I_IsFactionAIControlled norway
and I_IsFactionAIControlled teutonic_order
and I_IsFactionAIControlled england
and I_IsFactionAIControlled turks
and I_IsFactionAIControlled byzantium
and I_IsFactionAIControlled kalmar_union
and I_IsFactionAIControlled poland
and I_IsFactionAIControlled mongols
and I_IsFactionAIControlled russia
and I_IsFactionAIControlled moors
and I_IsFactionAIControlled papal_states
and I_IsFactionAIControlled kalmar_union
and I_IsFactionAIControlled byzantium
and not I_IsFactionAIControlled sicily
and not I_SettlementUnderSiege Wolfenburg
historic_event midvrag
change_population_religion sicily chaos 50 catholic
add_money sicily - 15000
		destroy_units sicily Knight wolf mounted
		destroy_units sicily Reiksguard
		destroy_units sicily Black guard Morr
		destroy_units sicily Knight Orden Panther
		destroy_units sicily Knight Orden blazing sun
		destroy_buildings sicily temple_sigmar true
		destroy_buildings sicily white_wolf_order true
		destroy_buildings sicily reiksguard_order true
		destroy_buildings sicily panther_order true
		destroy_buildings sicily morr_order true
		destroy_buildings sicily blazing_sun_order true
		destroy_units sicily Pistoliers
		destroy_units sicily Halberdmen
		destroy_units sicily Swordsmen of Empire
		destroy_units sicily Greatswords
		destroy_units sicily Empire crossbowmen
		destroy_units sicily Empire archers
		destroy_units sicily Handgunners
		set_counter ostlanderror 3
		spawn_army
						faction slave
				character  random_name, named character, x 78, y 99, label revenge2  ;command 8, dread 9, loyalty 7, piety 1
				traits	LoyaltyStarter 1,  Upright 2, GoodCommander 1, PublicFaith 2, orc 1
unit		Swordsmen of Empire mounted bodyguard				exp 9 armour 0 weapon_lvl 1
unit		Empire Pikemen				exp 5 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
unit		Halberdmen				exp 3 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
unit		Handgunners				exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
unit		Empire crossbowmen				exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
unit		Empire archers				exp 5 armour 0 weapon_lvl 1
unit		free company				exp 5 armour 0 weapon_lvl 1
unit		free company archers				exp 1 armour 1 weapon_lvl 0
unit		Halberdmen				exp 1 armour 1 weapon_lvl 0
unit		free company				exp 3 armour 0 weapon_lvl 1
unit		Empire Pikemen					exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
unit		Empire Pikemen				exp 5 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
unit		Halberdmen				exp 3 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
unit		Handgunners				exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
unit		Empire crossbowmen				exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
unit		Empire archers				exp 5 armour 0 weapon_lvl 1
unit		free company				exp 5 armour 0 weapon_lvl 1
unit		free company archers				exp 1 armour 1 weapon_lvl 0

		end	
		
		siege_settlement revenge2, Wolfenburg, maintain
terminate_monitor
end_monitor

monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal
and I_CompareCounter ostlandr = 2
and I_IsFactionAIControlled hungary
and I_IsFactionAIControlled novgorod
and I_IsFactionAIControlled lithuania
and I_IsFactionAIControlled norway

				faction byzantium

		end_if
				if I_IsFactionAIControlled hre
		add_money hre 15000
		end_if

		end_if

		end_if

		add_money scotland 15000
		end_if

		end_if

		end_if

		end_if

		terminate_monitor
		end_monitor

monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal
and I_CompareCounter ostlandr = 3
if not I_IsFactionAIControlled sicily
set_faction_standing sicily england 9.9			
		set_faction_standing sicily russia 9.9	
		set_faction_standing sicily poland 9.9	
		set_faction_standing papal_states sicily 9.9	
		set_faction_standing sicily papal_states 9.9	
		set_faction_standing england sicily 9.9			
		set_faction_standing russia sicily 9.9	
		set_faction_standing poland sicily 9.9
		set_faction_standing kalmar_union sicily 9.9
		set_faction_standing sicily kalmar_union 9.9	
		console_command diplomatic_stance sicily kalmar_union neutral
		console_command diplomatic_stance sicily england neutral		
		console_command diplomatic_stance sicily russia neutral
		console_command diplomatic_stance sicily poland neutral
		console_command diplomatic_stance sicily papal_states neutral
		set_faction_standing sicily spain 9.9
		set_faction_standing spain sicily 9.9
		console_command diplomatic_stance sicily spain allied
		set_faction_standing sicily france 9.9
		set_faction_standing france sicily 9.9
		console_command diplomatic_stance sicily france allied
		set_faction_standing sicily saxons 9.9
		set_faction_standing saxons sicily 9.9
		console_command diplomatic_stance sicily saxons allied
		set_faction_standing sicily milan 9.9
		set_faction_standing milan sicily 9.9
		console_command diplomatic_stance sicily milan allied
		set_faction_standing sicily scotland 9.9
		set_faction_standing scotland sicily 9.9
		console_command diplomatic_stance sicily scotland allied
		set_faction_standing sicily venice 9.9
		set_faction_standing venice sicily 9.9
		console_command diplomatic_stance sicily venice allied
		set_faction_standing sicily portugal 9.9
		set_faction_standing portugal sicily 9.9
		console_command diplomatic_stance sicily portugal allied
		set_faction_standing sicily byzantium 9.9
		set_faction_standing byzantium sicily 9.9
		console_command diplomatic_stance sicily scotland allied
		set_faction_standing sicily hre 9.9
		set_faction_standing hre sicily 9.9
		console_command diplomatic_stance sicily hre allied
			end_if
		if not I_IsFactionAIControlled milan
set_faction_standing milan england 9.9			
		set_faction_standing milan russia 9.9	
		set_faction_standing milan poland 9.9	
		set_faction_standing papal_states milan 9.9	
		set_faction_standing milan papal_states 9.9	
		set_faction_standing england milan 9.9			
		set_faction_standing russia milan 9.9	
		set_faction_standing poland milan 9.9
		set_faction_standing kalmar_union milan 9.9
		set_faction_standing milan kalmar_union 9.9	
		console_command diplomatic_stance milan kalmar_union neutral
		console_command diplomatic_stance milan england neutral		
		console_command diplomatic_stance milan russia neutral
		console_command diplomatic_stance milan poland neutral
		console_command diplomatic_stance milan papal_states neutral
		set_faction_standing milan spain 9.9
		set_faction_standing spain milan 9.9
		console_command diplomatic_stance milan spain allied
		set_faction_standing milan france 9.9
		set_faction_standing france milan 9.9
		console_command diplomatic_stance milan france allied
		set_faction_standing milan saxons 9.9
		set_faction_standing saxons milan 9.9
		console_command diplomatic_stance milan saxons allied
		set_faction_standing milan scotland 9.9
		set_faction_standing scotland milan 9.9
		console_command diplomatic_stance milan scotland allied
		set_faction_standing milan sicily 9.9
		set_faction_standing sicily milan 9.9
		console_command diplomatic_stance milan sicily allied
		set_faction_standing milan venice 9.9
		set_faction_standing venice milan 9.9
		console_command diplomatic_stance milan venice allied
		set_faction_standing milan portugal 9.9
		set_faction_standing portugal milan 9.9
		console_command diplomatic_stance milan portugal allied
		set_faction_standing milan byzantium 9.9
		set_faction_standing byzantium milan 9.9
		console_command diplomatic_stance milan byzantium allied
			set_faction_standing milan hre 9.9
		set_faction_standing hre milan 9.9
		console_command diplomatic_stance milan hre allied
			end_if
		if not I_IsFactionAIControlled portugal
set_faction_standing portugal england 9.9			
		set_faction_standing portugal russia 9.9	
		set_faction_standing portugal poland 9.9

		;talabek resurrection
declare_counter talabekerror
set_counter talabekerror 0
declare_counter talabekr
set_counter talabekr 0

monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal
and I_IsFactionAIControlled spain
and not I_IsFactionAIControlled scotland
and I_NumberOfSettlements scotland > 0
and I_NumberOfSettlements spain = 0
and  I_SettlementOwner Talabheim = scotland
and not I_SettlementUnderSiege Talabheim
and not I_CompareCounter middenland_heresy = 1
inc_counter talabekerror 1
if I_CompareCounter talabekerror < 2
historic_event talabek true
set_counter talabekr 1
end_if
end_monitor

monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal
and I_IsFactionAIControlled spain
and not I_IsFactionAIControlled byzantium
and I_NumberOfSettlements byzantium > 0
and I_NumberOfSettlements spain = 0
and  I_SettlementOwner Talabheim = byzantium
and not I_SettlementUnderSiege Talabheim
and not I_CompareCounter ostland_heresy = 1
inc_counter talabekerror 1
if I_CompareCounter talabekerror < 2
historic_event talabek true
set_counter talabekr 1
end_if
end_monitor

and I_IsFactionAIControlled hungary
and I_IsFactionAIControlled novgorod
and I_IsFactionAIControlled lithuania

and I_IsFactionAIControlled kalmar_union
and I_IsFactionAIControlled spain
historic_event talab
set_counter talabek 2
set_counter talabekerror 3
terminate_monitor
end_monitor


monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal
and I_CompareCounter talabekerror = 2
and I_IsFactionAIControlled hungary
and I_IsFactionAIControlled novgorod
and I_IsFactionAIControlled lithuania
and I_IsFactionAIControlled norway
and I_IsFactionAIControlled teutonic_order

		end

set_counter hohlanderror 0
declare_counter hohlandr
set_counter hohlandr 0

monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal
and I_IsFactionAIControlled milan
and not I_IsFactionAIControlled scotland
and I_NumberOfSettlements scotland > 0
and I_NumberOfSettlements milan = 0
and  I_SettlementOwner Hergig = scotland
and not I_CompareCounter middenland_heresy = 1
and not I_SettlementUnderSiege Hergig
inc_counter hohlanderror 1
if I_CompareCounter hohlanderror < 2
historic_event hohland true
set_counter hohlandr 1
end_if
end_monitor

monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal
and I_IsFactionAIControlled milan
and not I_IsFactionAIControlled byzantium
and I_NumberOfSettlements byzantium > 0
and I_NumberOfSettlements milan = 0
and  I_SettlementOwner Hergig = byzantium
and not I_CompareCounter ostland_heresy = 1
and not I_SettlementUnderSiege Hergig
inc_counter hohlanderror 1
if I_CompareCounter hohlanderror < 2
historic_event hohland true
set_counter hohlandr 1
end_if
end_monitor

monitor_conditions I_EventCounter hohland_accepted = 1
and I_IsFactionAIControlled hungary
and I_IsFactionAIControlled novgorod
and I_IsFactionAIControlled lithuania
and I_IsFactionAIControlled norway
and I_IsFactionAIControlled teutonic_order
and I_IsFactionAIControlled england
and I_IsFactionAIControlled turks
and I_IsFactionAIControlled byzantium
and I_IsFactionAIControlled kalmar_union
and I_IsFactionAIControlled poland
and I_IsFactionAIControlled mongols
and I_IsFactionAIControlled russia
and I_IsFactionAIControlled moors
and I_IsFactionAIControlled papal_states
and I_IsFactionAIControlled kalmar_union
and I_IsFactionAIControlled milan
historic_event hoh
set_counter hohlandr 2
set_counter hohlanderror 3
terminate_monitor
end_monitor

monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal
and I_CompareCounter hohlanderror = 2
and I_IsFactionAIControlled hungary
and I_IsFactionAIControlled novgorod
and I_IsFactionAIControlled lithuania
and I_IsFactionAIControlled norway
and I_IsFactionAIControlled teutonic_order
and I_IsFactionAIControlled england
and I_IsFactionAIControlled turks
and I_IsFactionAIControlled milan
and I_IsFactionAIControlled kalmar_union
and I_IsFactionAIControlled poland
and I_IsFactionAIControlled mongols
and I_IsFactionAIControlled russia
and I_IsFactionAIControlled moors
and I_IsFactionAIControlled papal_states
and I_IsFactionAIControlled kalmar_union
and I_IsFactionAIControlled milan
and not I_IsFactionAIControlled sicily
and not I_SettlementUnderSiege Hergig
historic_event midvrag
change_population_religion sicily chaos 50 catholic
add_money sicily – 15000
		destroy_units sicily Knight wolf mounted
		destroy_units sicily Reiksguard
		destroy_units sicily Black guard Morr
		destroy_units sicily Knight Orden Panther
		destroy_units sicily Knight Orden blazing sun
		destroy_buildings sicily temple_sigmar true
		destroy_buildings sicily white_wolf_order true
		destroy_buildings sicily reiksguard_order true
		destroy_buildings sicily panther_order true
		destroy_buildings sicily morr_order true
		destroy_buildings sicily blazing_sun_order true
		destroy_units sicily Pistoliers
		destroy_units sicily Halberdmen
		destroy_units sicily Swordsmen of Empire
		destroy_units sicily Greatswords
		destroy_units sicily Empire crossbowmen
		destroy_units sicily Empire archers
		destroy_units sicily Handgunners
		set_counter hohlanderror 3
		spawn_army 
				faction slave
				character  random_name, named character, x 69, y 86, label revenge5  ;command 8, dread 9, loyalty 7, piety 1
				traits	LoyaltyStarter 1,  Upright 2, GoodCommander 1, PublicFaith 2, orc 1
unit		Swordsmen of Empire mounted bodyguard				exp 9 armour 0 weapon_lvl 1
unit		Empire Pikemen				exp 5 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
unit		Halberdmen				exp 3 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
unit		Handgunners				exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
unit		Empire crossbowmen				exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
unit		Empire archers				exp 5 armour 0 weapon_lvl 1
unit		free company				exp 5 armour 0 weapon_lvl 1
unit		free company archers				exp 1 armour 1 weapon_lvl 0
unit		Halberdmen				exp 1 armour 1 weapon_lvl 0
unit		free company				exp 3 armour 0 weapon_lvl 1
unit		Empire Pikemen					exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
unit		Empire Pikemen				exp 5 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
unit		Halberdmen				exp 3 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
unit		Handgunners				exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
unit		Empire crossbowmen				exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
unit		Empire archers				exp 5 armour 0 weapon_lvl 1
unit		free company				exp 5 armour 0 weapon_lvl 1
unit		free company archers				exp 1 armour 1 weapon_lvl 0

		end	
		
		siege_settlement revenge5, Hergig, maintain

terminate_monitor
end_monitor

and I_CompareCounter hohlanderror = 1

				set_faction_standing scotland hre 9.9
		set_faction_standing hre scotland 9.9
		console_command diplomatic_stance scotland hre allied
		end_if
				if not I_IsFactionAIControlled saxons

		set_faction_standing saxons russia 9.9	
		set_faction_standing saxons poland 9.9

			end_if
		if not I_IsFactionAIControlled byzantium

		set_faction_standing byzantium russia 9.9

		set_faction_standing poland byzantium 9.9

		set_faction_standing byzantium kalmar_union 9.9

		console_command diplomatic_stance byzantium england neutral		
		console_command diplomatic_stance byzantium russia neutral
		console_command diplomatic_stance byzantium poland neutral
		console_command diplomatic_stance byzantium papal_states neutral
		set_faction_standing byzantium spain 9.9
		set_faction_standing spain byzantium 9.9

		set_faction_standing byzantium france 9.9
		set_faction_standing france byzantium 9.9
		console_command diplomatic_stance byzantium france allied
		set_faction_standing byzantium saxons 9.9
		set_faction_standing saxons byzantium 9.9
		console_command diplomatic_stance byzantium saxons allied
		set_faction_standing byzantium milan 9.9
		set_faction_standing milan byzantium 9.9
		console_command diplomatic_stance byzantium milan allied
		set_faction_standing byzantium scotland 9.9
		set_faction_standing scotland byzantium 9.9
		console_command diplomatic_stance byzantium scotland allied
		set_faction_standing byzantium venice 9.9
		set_faction_standing venice byzantium 9.9
		console_command diplomatic_stance byzantium venice allied
		set_faction_standing byzantium portugal 9.9
		set_faction_standing portugal byzantium 9.9
		console_command diplomatic_stance byzantium portugal allied
		set_faction_standing byzantium spain 9.9
		set_faction_standing spain byzantium 9.9
		console_command diplomatic_stance byzantium spain allied
		set_faction_standing byzantium hre 9.9
		set_faction_standing hre byzantium 9.9
		console_command diplomatic_stance byzantium hre allied
			end_if
			set_counter hohlandr 50

		
		terminate_monitor
		end_monitor
		
		
		
						;ostermark resurrection
declare_counter ostermarkerror
set_counter ostermarkerror 0
declare_counter ostermarkr
set_counter ostermarkr 0

monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal
and I_IsFactionAIControlled france
and not I_IsFactionAIControlled scotland
and I_NumberOfSettlements scotland > 0
and I_NumberOfSettlements france = 0
and  I_SettlementOwner Bechafen = scotland
and not I_CompareCounter middenland_heresy = 1
and not I_SettlementUnderSiege Bechafen
inc_counter ostermarkerror 1
if I_CompareCounter ostermarkerror < 2
historic_event ostermark true
set_counter ostermarkr 1
end_if
end_monitor

monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal
and I_IsFactionAIControlled france
and not I_IsFactionAIControlled byzantium
and I_NumberOfSettlements byzantium > 0
and I_NumberOfSettlements france = 0
and  I_SettlementOwner Bechafen = byzantium
and not I_CompareCounter ostland_heresy = 1
and not I_SettlementUnderSiege Bechafen
inc_counter ostermarkerror 1
if I_CompareCounter ostermarkerror < 2
historic_event ostermark true
set_counter ostermarkr 1
end_if
end_monitor

and I_IsFactionAIControlled france
and not I_IsFactionAIControlled sicily
and I_NumberOfSettlements sicily > 0
and I_NumberOfSettlements france = 0
and  I_SettlementOwner Bechafen = sicily
and not I_SettlementUnderSiege Bechafen
and not I_CompareCounter nordland_heresy = 1
inc_counter ostermarkerror 1
if I_CompareCounter ostermarkerror < 2
historic_event ostermark true
set_counter ostermarkr 1
end_if
end_monitor

monitor_conditions I_EventCounter ostermark_accepted = 1
and I_IsFactionAIControlled hungary
and I_IsFactionAIControlled novgorod
and I_IsFactionAIControlled lithuania
and I_IsFactionAIControlled norway
and I_IsFactionAIControlled teutonic_order
and I_IsFactionAIControlled england
and I_IsFactionAIControlled turks
and I_IsFactionAIControlled byzantium
and I_IsFactionAIControlled kalmar_union
and I_IsFactionAIControlled poland
and I_IsFactionAIControlled mongols
and I_IsFactionAIControlled russia
and I_IsFactionAIControlled moors
and I_IsFactionAIControlled papal_states
and I_IsFactionAIControlled kalmar_union
and I_IsFactionAIControlled france
historic_event oster
set_counter ostermarkr 2
set_counter ostermarkerror 3
terminate_monitor
end_monitor


monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal
and I_CompareCounter ostermarkerror = 2
and I_IsFactionAIControlled hungary
and I_IsFactionAIControlled novgorod
and I_IsFactionAIControlled lithuania
and I_IsFactionAIControlled norway
and I_IsFactionAIControlled teutonic_order
and I_IsFactionAIControlled england
and I_IsFactionAIControlled turks
and I_IsFactionAIControlled france
and I_IsFactionAIControlled kalmar_union
and I_IsFactionAIControlled poland
and I_IsFactionAIControlled mongols
and I_IsFactionAIControlled russia
and I_IsFactionAIControlled moors
and I_IsFactionAIControlled papal_states
and I_IsFactionAIControlled kalmar_union
and I_IsFactionAIControlled france
and not I_IsFactionAIControlled sicily
and not I_SettlementUnderSiege Bechafen
historic_event midvrag
change_population_religion sicily chaos 50 catholic
add_money sicily – 15000
		destroy_units sicily Knight wolf mounted
		destroy_units sicily Reiksguard
		destroy_units sicily Black guard Morr
		destroy_units sicily Knight Orden Panther
		destroy_units sicily Knight Orden blazing sun
		destroy_buildings sicily temple_sigmar true
		destroy_buildings sicily white_wolf_order true
		destroy_buildings sicily reiksguard_order true
		destroy_buildings sicily panther_order true
		destroy_buildings sicily morr_order true
		destroy_buildings sicily blazing_sun_order true
		destroy_units sicily Pistoliers
		destroy_units sicily Halberdmen
		destroy_units sicily Swordsmen of Empire
		destroy_units sicily Greatswords
		destroy_units sicily Empire crossbowmen
		destroy_units sicily Empire archers
		destroy_units sicily Handgunners
		set_counter ostermarkerror 3
		spawn_army 
				faction slave
				character  random_name, named character, x 101, y 88, label revenge6  ;command 8, dread 9, loyalty 7, piety 1
				traits	LoyaltyStarter 1,  Upright 2, GoodCommander 1, PublicFaith 2, orc 1
unit		Swordsmen of Empire mounted bodyguard				exp 9 armour 0 weapon_lvl 1
unit		Empire Pikemen				exp 5 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
unit		Halberdmen				exp 3 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
unit		Handgunners				exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
unit		Empire crossbowmen				exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
unit		Empire archers				exp 5 armour 0 weapon_lvl 1
unit		free company				exp 5 armour 0 weapon_lvl 1
unit		free company archers				exp 1 armour 1 weapon_lvl 0
unit		Halberdmen				exp 1 armour 1 weapon_lvl 0
unit		free company				exp 3 armour 0 weapon_lvl 1
unit		Empire Pikemen					exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
unit		Empire Pikemen				exp 5 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
unit		Halberdmen				exp 3 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
unit		Handgunners				exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
unit		Empire crossbowmen				exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
unit		Empire archers				exp 5 armour 0 weapon_lvl 1
unit		free company				exp 5 armour 0 weapon_lvl 1
unit		free company archers				exp 1 armour 1 weapon_lvl 0

		end	
		
		siege_settlement revenge6, Bechafen, maintain

terminate_monitor
end_monitor

and not I_IsFactionAIControlled milan
and not I_SettlementUnderSiege Bechafen

		destroy_buildings milan blazing_sun_order true

unit		free company				exp 5 armour 0 weapon_lvl 1
unit		free company archers				exp 1 armour 1 weapon_lvl 0
unit		Halberdmen				exp 1 armour 1 weapon_lvl 0

monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal
and I_CompareCounter ostermarkr = 3
if not I_IsFactionAIControlled sicily
set_faction_standing sicily england 9.9			
		set_faction_standing sicily russia 9.9	
		set_faction_standing sicily poland 9.9	
		set_faction_standing papal_states sicily 9.9	
		set_faction_standing sicily papal_states 9.9	
		set_faction_standing england sicily 9.9			
		set_faction_standing russia sicily 9.9	
		set_faction_standing poland sicily 9.9
		set_faction_standing kalmar_union sicily 9.9
		set_faction_standing sicily kalmar_union 9.9	
		console_command diplomatic_stance sicily kalmar_union neutral
		console_command diplomatic_stance sicily england neutral		
		console_command diplomatic_stance sicily russia neutral
		console_command diplomatic_stance sicily poland neutral
		console_command diplomatic_stance sicily papal_states neutral
		set_faction_standing sicily spain 9.9
		set_faction_standing spain sicily 9.9
		console_command diplomatic_stance sicily spain allied
		set_faction_standing sicily france 9.9
		set_faction_standing france sicily 9.9
		console_command diplomatic_stance sicily france allied
		set_faction_standing sicily saxons 9.9
		set_faction_standing saxons sicily 9.9
		console_command diplomatic_stance sicily saxons allied
		set_faction_standing sicily milan 9.9
		set_faction_standing milan sicily 9.9
		console_command diplomatic_stance sicily milan allied
		set_faction_standing sicily scotland 9.9
		set_faction_standing scotland sicily 9.9
		console_command diplomatic_stance sicily scotland allied
		set_faction_standing sicily venice 9.9
		set_faction_standing venice sicily 9.9
		console_command diplomatic_stance sicily venice allied
		set_faction_standing sicily portugal 9.9
		set_faction_standing portugal sicily 9.9
		console_command diplomatic_stance sicily portugal allied
		set_faction_standing sicily byzantium 9.9
		set_faction_standing byzantium sicily 9.9
		console_command diplomatic_stance sicily scotland allied
		set_faction_standing sicily hre 9.9
		set_faction_standing hre sicily 9.9
		console_command diplomatic_stance sicily hre allied
		end_if
		if not I_IsFactionAIControlled spain
set_faction_standing spain england 9.9			
		set_faction_standing spain russia 9.9	
		set_faction_standing spain poland 9.9	
		set_faction_standing papal_states spain 9.9	
		set_faction_standing spain papal_states 9.9	
		set_faction_standing england spain 9.9			
		set_faction_standing russia spain 9.9	
		set_faction_standing poland spain 9.9
		set_faction_standing kalmar_union spain 9.9
		set_faction_standing spain kalmar_union 9.9	
		console_command diplomatic_stance spain kalmar_union neutral
		console_command diplomatic_stance spain england neutral		
		console_command diplomatic_stance spain russia neutral
		console_command diplomatic_stance spain poland neutral
		console_command diplomatic_stance spain papal_states neutral
		set_faction_standing spain milan 9.9
		set_faction_standing milan spain 9.9
		console_command diplomatic_stance spain milan allied
		set_faction_standing spain france 9.9
		set_faction_standing france spain 9.9
		console_command diplomatic_stance spain france allied
		set_faction_standing spain saxons 9.9
		set_faction_standing saxons spain 9.9
		console_command diplomatic_stance spain saxons allied
		set_faction_standing spain scotland 9.9
		set_faction_standing scotland spain 9.9
		console_command diplomatic_stance spain scotland allied
		set_faction_standing spain sicily 9.9
		set_faction_standing sicily spain 9.9
		console_command diplomatic_stance spain sicily allied
		set_faction_standing spain venice 9.9
		set_faction_standing venice spain 9.9
		console_command diplomatic_stance spain venice allied
		set_faction_standing spain portugal 9.9
		set_faction_standing portugal spain 9.9
		console_command diplomatic_stance spain portugal allied
		set_faction_standing spain byzantium 9.9
		set_faction_standing byzantium spain 9.9
		console_command diplomatic_stance spain byzantium allied
			set_faction_standing spain hre 9.9
		set_faction_standing hre spain 9.9

declare_counter stirlanderror
set_counter stirlanderror 0
declare_counter stirlandr
set_counter stirlandr 0


monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal
and I_IsFactionAIControlled saxons
and not I_IsFactionAIControlled scotland
and I_NumberOfSettlements scotland > 0
and I_NumberOfSettlements saxons = 0
and  I_SettlementOwner Wurtbad = scotland
and not I_CompareCounter middenland_heresy = 1  
and not I_SettlementUnderSiege Wurtbad
inc_counter stirlanderror 1
if I_CompareCounter stirlanderror < 2
historic_event stirland true
set_counter stirlandr 1
end_if
end_monitor

monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal
and I_IsFactionAIControlled saxons
and not I_IsFactionAIControlled byzantium
and I_NumberOfSettlements byzantium > 0
and I_NumberOfSettlements saxons = 0
and  I_SettlementOwner Wurtbad = byzantium
and not I_CompareCounter ostland_heresy = 1
inc_counter stirlanderror 1
if I_CompareCounter stirlanderror < 2
historic_event stirland true
set_counter stirlandr 1
end_if
end_monitor

monitor_conditions I_EventCounter stirland_accepted = 1
and I_IsFactionAIControlled hungary
and I_IsFactionAIControlled novgorod
and I_IsFactionAIControlled lithuania
and I_IsFactionAIControlled norway
and I_IsFactionAIControlled teutonic_order
and I_IsFactionAIControlled england
and I_IsFactionAIControlled turks
and I_IsFactionAIControlled byzantium
and I_IsFactionAIControlled kalmar_union
and I_IsFactionAIControlled poland
and I_IsFactionAIControlled mongols
and I_IsFactionAIControlled russia
and I_IsFactionAIControlled moors
and I_IsFactionAIControlled papal_states
and I_IsFactionAIControlled kalmar_union
and I_IsFactionAIControlled saxons
historic_event stir
set_counter stirlandr 2
set_counter stirlanderror 3
terminate_monitor
end_monitor

monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal
and I_CompareCounter stirlanderror = 2
and I_IsFactionAIControlled hungary
and I_IsFactionAIControlled novgorod
and I_IsFactionAIControlled lithuania
and I_IsFactionAIControlled norway
and I_IsFactionAIControlled teutonic_order
and I_IsFactionAIControlled england
and I_IsFactionAIControlled turks
and I_IsFactionAIControlled saxons

and I_IsFactionAIControlled poland

and not I_IsFactionAIControlled sicily
and not I_SettlementUnderSiege Wurtbad
historic_event midvrag
change_population_religion sicily chaos 50 catholic
add_money sicily – 15000
		destroy_units sicily Knight wolf mounted
		destroy_units sicily Reiksguard
		destroy_units sicily Black guard Morr

		destroy_units sicily Greatswords

		destroy_units sicily Handgunners
